title: TITLE:  BLOODY MARY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Say  Bloody  Mary  three  times  before  bedtime. When  you
wake up in the morning, be sure to have one.

1 1/2 ounces vodka (or peppered vodka for spice)
3 ounces tomato juice
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
Dash or two Tabasco sauce
Dash or two Worcestershire sauce
Pinch of celery salt
Pinch of pepper
Dab of horseradish
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Chill a cocktail shaker.
 Add vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Tabasco

sauce, and Worcestershire sauce.

 Add salt, pepper, and horseradish to taste.
 Pour into a chilled collins glass or beer mug.
 Garnish with a lime slice or a celery stalk. Also

preferred as garnishes: pickled green beans, okra
pods, and garlic stuffed olives.

(See page 52 for original Bloody Mary mix.)

title: TITLE:  PEACH FUZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Soft and downy, the perfect serum for getting the dish on
your brother’s bride.

3 ripened peaches
6 ounces pink lemonade
6 ounces vodka
Ice cubes to fill blender
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put peaches, pink lemonade, vodka, and ice in a

blender.

 Blend until iced is crushed.
 Place in freezer for four hours.
 Scoop into highball glasses.
(Serves 6)

title: TITLE:  VODKA MINT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Caution: An oft-used tool for sweet-faced motherly inter-
rogators.

6 ounces frounceen limeade
6 ounces vodka
17 mint leaves
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Combine limeade, vodka, and mint leaves with

enough ice to fill blender.

 Blend at highest speed until slushy. Pour into

cocktail glasses.

 Top with thin slices of lime and mint leaves.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  BLOODY BULL
description:
DESCRIPTION: For  the  morning  after. Solves  problems  from  last  night’s
out-of-control bachelorette party.

10 1/2 ounces consommé 
24 ounces tomato juice
3 tablespoons lemon juice
2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
1 teaspoon celery salt
1 teaspoon garlic salt
2 teaspoons salt
9 ounces vodka
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Mix all ingredients in a pitcher.
 Serve in highball glasses with ice.
(Serves 6)

title: TITLE:  MILK PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: A truly  old-school  beverage—served  at  weddings  and
brunches through the decades.

8 ounces cold milk
1/2 ounce bourbon 
3/4 ounce crème de cacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add milk, bourbon, and crème de cacao.
 Shake.
 Pour into a goblet.

title: TITLE:  COFFEE FLIP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Wow. This makes the cobwebs run screaming.

1 ounce cognac
1 ounce tawny port
1 small egg
1 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add cognac, port, egg, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled delmonico glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  BRANDIED FLIP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tastes so good you’ll do cartwheels and somersaults until
four.

1 ounce brandy
1 ounce apricot flavored brandy
1 small egg
1 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandies, egg, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled delmonico glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  MADEIRA MINT FLIP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Another Madeira, my dear-a?

1 1/2 ounces Madeira 
1 ounce chocolate mint liqueur
1 small egg
1 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Madeira, liqueur, egg, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled delmonico glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  POLYNESIAN PICK ME UP
description:
DESCRIPTION: No, this does not involve carting a virgin off to the volcano.
Your fate is much more pleasant.

4 ounces pineapple juice
1 1/2 ounces vodka 
1/2 teaspoon curry powder 
1/2 teaspoon lemon juice 
1 tablespoon cream
2 dashes Tabasco sauce
4 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend for 10 seconds on high speed.
 Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.
 Dust with cayenne pepper.

title: TITLE:  CITRONELLA COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: For a guaranteed mosquito-free brunch.

1 ounce citrus vodka 
Dash of lime juice 
2 ounces chilled lemonade
1 ounce chilled cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build vodka, lime juice, lemonade, and cranberry

juice in a collins glass.

 Top with a squeeze of fresh lime.

title: TITLE:  MAY BLOSSOM FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: As sweetly intoxicating as springtime flowers. Your guests
just may frolic around the May Pole.

1 teaspoon grenadine
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
1 ounce club soda
2 ounces Punsch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add grenadine, lemon juice, club soda, and Punsch.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass.
 Top with soda.

title: TITLE:  SANGRIA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Perfect setting: pitcher for two, Melrose Avenue, a night of
endless possibilities.

1/5 dry red wine
1 ripe peach
6 slices lemon
1/2 ounce cognac 
1 ounce triple sec
1 ounce maraschino liqueur
1 tablespoon sugar
1 whole orange
6 ounces chilled club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour wine into a glass pitcher.
 Add peeled and sliced peach and lemon slices.
 Add cognac, triple sec, maraschino liqueur, and

sugar.

 Stir to dissolve sugar.
 Carefully place the orange in the pitcher. (See below.)
 Let mixture marinate at room temperature for at

least 1 hour.

 Add soda and 1 tray of ice cubes to pitcher.
 Stir.
 Pour into wine goblets.
(Serves 6) 

(For  orange:  cut  orange  peel  into  one  long  strip,
beginning  at  stem  end  and  continuing  until  spiral
reaches bottom of fruit. Make sure to expose the fruit
while cutting. Leave peel attached to orange bottom
to suspend fruit in pitcher.)

title:
TITLE:  MEXICAN WEDDING 
BREAKFAST COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Goes  well  with  huevos  rancheros  and  a  blushing  bridal
afterglow.

1 1/2 ounces sherry 
1 egg
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
Drop of Tabasco sauce or dash of cayenne pepper
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill  cocktail  shaker  with  sherry, egg, powdered

sugar, and Tabasco sauce or cayenne pepper.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PEACH MIMOSA
description:
DESCRIPTION: A sweet twist on the classic brunch favorite.

1 ounce peach schnapps
Orange juice
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour peach schnapps into a champagne flute.
 Add enough orange juice to fill half of the glass.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  PEACH BELLINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A favorite of the most discerning June brides.

1 peeled and pitted peach
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Puree peach and place in a champagne flute.
 Add champagne.

title:
TITLE:  TWIST OF A 

SCREWDRIVER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Everybody wants a turn.

3 1/2 cups orange juice 
4 ounces vodka
2 teaspoons lemon juice
2 teaspoons triple sec
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Combine all ingredients in a pitcher.
 Stir.
 Chill in refrigerator.
 Pour into highball glasses with ice.
 Garnish with orange slices.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  PERFECT PEACH JULEP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Even more Southern than the mint julep—if that’s possible.

1 medium fresh chilled peach
2 ounces bourbon
Crushed ice
Mint sprigs
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Peel, pit, and slice peach.
 Puree the peach in a blender.
 Add sugar and process.
 Stir in bourbon.
 Pour over crushed ice in silver julep cup.
 Garnish with mint springs.

title: TITLE:  BAY BREEZE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A nice compliment to lazy mornings on the Outer Banks.

1 ounce vodka
Splash of pineapple juice
Splash of cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka into a highball glass with ice.
 Splash with juices.

title: TITLE:  SEA BREEZE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink while watching America’s Cup. Wish for a sailboat
of your own.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
3/4 ounce apricot flavored brandy
1/4 ounce grenadine
1 ounce lemon juice
Club soda
Mint sprigs
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build gin, brandy, grenadine, and lemon juice in a

highball glass.

 Add ice.
 Fill with club soda.
 Add mint sprigs.

title: TITLE:  CAPE COD
description:
DESCRIPTION: Conjures up morning memories from Martha’s Vineyard.
Even if you’ve never visited.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
1/2 ounce lime juice 
1 ounce cranberry juice
1/2 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, juices, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BLOODY MARIA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ay Caramba! Tequila in the morning! 

1 1/2 ounces tequila
2 dashes Worcestershire sauce
Sprinkle of salt
Sprinkle of pepper
Sprinkle of celery salt
Tomato juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build tequila and Worcestershire sauce in a double

old-fashioned glass.

 Sprinkle salt, pepper, and celery salt.
 Fill with tomato juice and ice.

title: TITLE:  AZALEA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sip while swinging on a plantation veranda amidst a col-
orful burst of bloom.

3/4 ounce lime juice
3/4 ounce pineapple juice
2 1/4 ounces gin
4 dashes grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add juices, gin, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

(This  drink  can  be  made  frothier  by  adding  1  1/2
ounces  heavy  whipping  cream. If  adding  heavy
whipping cream, use a goblet as glassware.)

title: TITLE:  RAMOS GIN FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: Whenever legendary Louisiana governor Huey P.
Long  traveled  to  New  York  City, he  took  his  own  New
Orleans bartender so he could have this drink made right.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
2 tablespoons cream
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
1 egg white
1 tablespoon powdered sugar
3 to 4 drops of orange flower water
1/2 ounce lime juice 
1/4 ounce club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, cream, lemon juice, egg white, powdered

sugar, orange flower water, and lime juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a goblet.
 Top with chilled club soda.

title: TITLE:  CLAMDIGGER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Put on your short pants and grab the shovel and pail! 

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
3 ounces clam juice
3 ounces tomato juice
Dash of Tabasco sauce
Dash of Worcestershire sauce
Salt and pepper to taste
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a highball glass with ice.
 Pour in all ingredients.
 Stir.
 Garnish with a lime slice.

title: TITLE:  SUMMER RAIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: As refreshing as a surprise downpour in August.

3 ounces cranberry liqueur
Apple juice
Lime wedge
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour cranberry liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice.

 Top with apple juice.
 Add a squeeze of lime.
 Stir.
 Garnish with a lime slice.

title: TITLE:  SUNRISE MIMOSA
description:
DESCRIPTION: A reward for getting up earlier than the other guests.

1 tablespoon apricot nectar
1 tablespoon orange juice
2 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour apricot nectar and orange juice into a cham-pagne flute.

 Slowly add champagne.
 Garnish with an orange slice or two raspberries.

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE 

LEMON GRANITA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sinfully slushy and utterly satisfying. No way to go wrong
with this tangy one.

4 scoops lemon sorbet
2 ounces citrus vodka
2 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put lemon sorbet into a blender.
 Blend on low speed, slowly adding vodka.
 Add champagne.
 Pour into chilled highball glasses.
 Garnish with fresh mint.

title: TITLE:  RUSSIAN BRUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Try this one with a side of borscht. Or not.

8 ounces vodka
12 ounces orange juice 
8 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka and orange juice into a blender with

ice.

 Pour into a large pitcher.
 Add champagne.
 Stir.
 Pour into goblets.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  COUNTRY CLUB COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: No membership dues required. Drink up! It’s an open tab.

1/2 teaspoon grenadine 
2 ounces club soda
2 ounces dry vermouth
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour grenadine and club soda into a highball

glass.

 Stir.
 Fill glass with cracked ice.
 Add dry vermouth.
 Fill with ginger ale.
 Garnish with lemon and orange peel spirals.

title: TITLE:  PINEAPPLE COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tiiiiiiny bubbles…in the wiiiine… 

2 ounces pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar 
2 ounces club soda
2 ounces dry white wine
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour pineapple juice, powdered sugar, and club

soda in a highball glass.

 Stir.
 Fill glass with cracked ice.
 Add white wine.
 Fill with ginger ale.
 Garnish with lemon and orange peel spirals or

pineapple chunks.

title: TITLE:  PASSION FRUIT COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Everybody needs a little passion. Passion fruit cooler, that
is.

1 ounce orange juice
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce gin 
1 1/2 ounces light rum 
3 ounces passion fruit nectar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add juices, gin, rum, and passion fruit nectar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  BRUNCH PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: If  Mike  and  Carol  served  this, it  would  be  called  Brady
Bunch Brunch Punch.

3 quarts chilled tomato juice
1 liter light or dark rum
2 1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce
5 ounces lemon or lime juice
Salt and pepper to taste
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Combine all ingredients into a large pitcher.
 Stir.
 Pour into a punch bowl with a block of ice.
 Garnish with thinly sliced lemons and limes.
(Serves 40)

title: TITLE:  APRICOT FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: A sugary kick-start to chase away lingering drowsiness.

1 ounce lemon juice
3/4 ounce lime juice
1 teaspoon sugar
1 1/2 ounces apricot flavored brandy
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build ingredients in a highball glass.
 Fill with ice.
 Top with club soda.

title: TITLE:  FRAISE FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Start  the  morning  off  right  with  a  confectionery  straw-
berry and lemon combo.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1 ounce fraise liqueur
1/2 ounce fresh lemon juice
1 teaspoon sugar
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, fraise liqueur, lemon juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with ice.
 Top with soda.
 Garnish with a lemon twist and a strawberry.

title: TITLE:  GRAND ROYALE FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fit for a French king…or those still in their pajamas.

1/2 ounce orange juice
1 ounce lime juice
1 teaspoon sugar
2 ounces gin
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
1/2 ounce cream
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add orange juice, lime juice, sugar, gin, maraschino

liqueur, and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with ice and club soda.

title: TITLE:  APRICOT CREAM SPRITZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: A great change of pace for the adventurous brunch crowd.

6 ounces milk
4 ounces apricot nectar
2 tablespoons apricot flavored brandy
Sparkling wine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill chilled cocktail shaker with milk, apricot nec-tar, and apricot flavored brandy.

 Stir until smooth.
 Pour into 6 red wine glasses.
 Add equal amounts of wine into each glass.
(Serves 6)

title: TITLE:  FROSTY SOUR
description:
DESCRIPTION: Pleasantly cold and invigorating, yet quickly warms your
guests.

12-ounce can frounceen lemonade concentrate
1 tablespoon frounceen orange juice concentrate
6 ounces bourbon
12 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put lemonade and orange juice concentrate,

bourbon, and ice in a blender.

 Blend until liquefied.
 Strain into sour glasses.
 Garnish with orange slices and cherries.
(Serves 8)

title: TITLE:  MANGO COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Step 1. Get up. Step 2. Have these for brunch. Step 3. Race
each other back to the bedroom. An aphrodisiac delight.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce Cointreau
3 ounces mango nectar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build ingredients in a highball glass.
 Fill glass with ice.
 Garnish with a mango slice.

title: TITLE:  OJEN FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Lean  on  Ojen, a  sweet  anise-flavored  liqueur, to  get  the
morning going.

1 ounce Ojen
1/3 ounce sugar syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Ojen and sugar syrup.
 Shake.
 Pour into a highball glass.

title: TITLE:  OJEN COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A popular  choice  for  New  Orleans  carnival  revelers  who
need a pick-me-up to keep catching the beads.

2 1/2 ounces Ojen
2 dashes Peychaud bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Ojen and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ABSINTHE FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Some say absinthe is the devil’s tool. Lord, don’t let it be
so.

1/3 ounce sugar syrup
1 1/2 ounces Pernod
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sugar syrup and Pernod into a chilled high-ball glass with crushed ice.

 Stir vigorously until frost appears on sides of glass.

 AMBASSADOR’S 

MORNING LIFT

Even more effective than the embassy’s elevator.

32 ounces prepared dairy eggnog
6 ounces cognac
3 ounces Jamaican rum
3 ounces crème de cacao

 Pour all ingredients into a punch bowl.
 Stir.
 Dust each serving with nutmeg.
(Serves 10–12)

title: TITLE:  MORNING CALL COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sip  gently  while  reliving—or  forgetting—the  previous
night’s antics.

1 ounce pastis
3/4 ounce fresh lemon juice
3/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pastis, lemon juice, and maraschino liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PERNOD CLASSIQUE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The absinthe breakfast of champions.

1 ounce Pernod
5 ounces water
2 ice cubes
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour the Pernod in a tall glass.
 Add the water and ice cubes.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  ICED DANISH MARY
description:
DESCRIPTION: An  alternative  to  the  classic  Bloody  Mary. Guests  will
surely want to know the secret ingredient.

1 1/2 ounces aquavit
Bloody Mary mix (store-bought or freshly mixed; see
below.)
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour aquavit into a double old-fashioned glass

with ice.

 Add Bloody Mary mix.

title: TITLE:  BLOODY MARY MIX
description:
DESCRIPTION: You can buy something similar in a can, but why not be a
domestic diva and make it from scratch?

2 46-ounce cans tomato juice or V-8 juice*
1 teaspoon coarsely-ground fresh black pepper
1 teaspoon celery salt
4 ounces lemon juice
1 5-ounce bottle Worcestershire sauce
Tabasco sauce to taste (for heat)
Salt to taste
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Mix all ingredients thoroughly in a pitcher.
 Refrigerate.

* If you like it hot, use spicy V-

title: TITLE:  MADRAS
description:
DESCRIPTION: The quintessential preppy potable. Biff and Muffy can’t get
enough of these.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
4 ounces cranberry juice
1 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka and juices into a highball glass with

ice.

 Garnish with a lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  BREAKFAST COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sneak in a flask of this and even IHOP is bearable.

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce grenadine
1 egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, grenadine, and egg white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BREAKFAST EGGNOG
description:
DESCRIPTION: Most people don’t drink eggnog other than at Christmas.
But they should. An eye-opener for any day of winter.

1 egg
2 ounces brandy
1/2 ounce orange curacao
3 ounces milk
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add egg, brandy, curacao, and milk.
 Shake.
 Strain into a tumbler or goblet.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  GOOD MORNING FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Prepares you to face even the most annoyingly perky Susie
Sunshines.

1 ounce lemon juice
1 teaspoon sugar
2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce anisette
1 egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, sugar, gin, anisette, and egg

white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with ice and soda.

title: TITLE:  ROSE IN JUNE FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: The bride may choose a colorful bouquet of fresh-cut flow-
ers. But what she really wants is one of these.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1 ounce framboise liqueur
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
1 ounce fresh lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, framboise liqueur, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with ice and soda.

title: TITLE:  SHERRY FLIP
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink  that  is  perfect  for  winter  brunches  in  mountain
cabins when five feet of snow covers the ground. Blazing
fire, optional.

1 egg
1 teaspoon sugar
1 1/2 ounces sherry
1/2 ounce cream (optional)
1/4 ounce light crème de cacao (optional)
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add egg, sugar, sherry and optional ingredients, if

desired.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BIRD OF PARADISE FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: This bird of paradise will send you flying.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce blackberry brandy
1/2 ounce sugar syrup
1 egg white
4 ounces club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, lemon juice, blackberry brandy, sugar

syrup, and egg white.

 Shake.
 Strain into highball glass.
 Fill with club soda and ice.

title:
TITLE:  SPARKLING STRAWBERRY

MIMOSA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t dare serve these without a heaping helping of French
toast topped with whipped honey butter.

2 ounces orange juice
2 ounces strawberries
1/2 ounce strawberry syrup
4 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Blend orange juice, strawberries, and strawberry

syrup in a blender until smooth.

 Pour into a cocktail glass.
 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with a strawberry and an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  BREAKFAST MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: The high-roller’s breakfast drink of choice before he heads
back to the table.

1 1/2 ounces gin
3/4 ounce lemon juice
3/4 ounce Cointreau
1 teaspoon light marmalade
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, lemon juice, Cointreau, and light mar-malade.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE BLUES
description:
DESCRIPTION: I got  the  champagne  blues…I  got  nothin’  left  to  lose…I
need some more boouncee.

1/5 blue curacao
8 ounces lemon juice
4/5 dry champagne
Peel of two lemons
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Chill all ingredients.
 Pour curacao and lemon juice into a punch bowl

(with no ice).

 Stir.
 Add champagne.
 Stir gently.
 Float lemon peels in the bowl.
(Serves 25)

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE PUNCH

WITH KIRSCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: For  wedding  parties  that  strive  for  just  a  hint  above
ordinary.

4 fifths iced brut champagne
5 ounces iced Kirsch liqueur
5 ounces cream sherry
4 ounces iced lemon juice
16 ounces iced orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a chilled champagne

bowl.

 Stir.
(Serves 25)

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE DU

MARCO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Perfect for the decadent second marriage.

1 ounce vanilla ice cream
2 dashes maraschino liqueur
4 dashes orange curacao
2 dashes cognac
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour  ingredients  into  chilled  deep-saucer  cham-pagne glass.

 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with fruits in season.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE FLIP
description:
DESCRIPTION: The mother-of-the-bride sips this while the bride is getting
dressed. The mother of the groom downs two.

1 egg yolk
1/2 teaspoon sugar
3 ounces champagne
1/4 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add egg yolk, sugar, and champagne.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Float brandy on top.

title: TITLE:  SANGRIA ESPECIALE
description:
DESCRIPTION: When normal sangria just won’t do.

2/5 red wine
1/5 champagne
4 ounces gin
4 ounces cognac
Sugar to taste
Juice of 2 oranges
Juice of 2 lemons
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour ingredients into a punch bowl.
 Stir.
 Add ice.
 Garnish with orange and lemon slices.
(Serves 12–15)

title:
TITLE:  WHITE GRAPE, 

TANGERINE, AND
SPARKLING WINE PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Guests expecting the same old champagne punch? No way.
Zig and keep them guessing.

48 ounces unsweetened white grape juice
6 ounces frounceen tangerine juice concentrate, thawed
8 ounces club soda
3 ounces brandy
2 ounces lemon juice
1/5 sweet sparkling wine
Thin slices of tangerine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour ingredients into a punch bowl over a block of

ice.
 Stir.
 Cover punch bowl and refrigerate until cold.
 Add sparkling wine prior to serving.
 Float tangerine slices.
(Serves 15–20)

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE SHERBET

PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: The punch that has launched a thousand nuptials.

24 ounces chilled pineapple juice
2 ounces lemon juice
1 quart pineapple sherbet
1/5 chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour juices into a punch bowl.
 Add sherbet just prior to serving.
 Add champagne.
 Stir.
(Serves 20)

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Welcome Baby New Year with this bubbly brew.

Juice of 12 lemons
Powdered sugar
8 ounces maraschino liqueur
8 ounces triple sec
16 ounces brandy
2/5 chilled champagne
16 ounces club soda
16 ounces strong tea, optional
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Add enough powdered sugar to sweeten lemon

juice in a small bowl.

 Pour mixture in punch bowl over ice.
 Stir.
 Add maraschino liqueur, triple sec, brandy, cham-pagne, club soda, and strong tea, if desired.

 Stir.
 Decorate with seasonal fruits.
(Serves 20–25)

title: TITLE:  BACCIO PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: This happy-go-lucky concoction will make the gods bow to
you.

16 ounces champagne
16 ounces grapefruit juice
16 ounces dry gin
4 ounces anisette
Sugar to taste
16 ounces mineral water
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour ingredients into a punch bowl.
 Stir well.
 Surround bowl with ice cubes.
 Decorate with fruit.
 Serve in goblets.
 Garnish with several grapes.
(Serves 8)

title: TITLE:  HOT GOLD
description:
DESCRIPTION: Now we know what kept the 49ers going during the Gold
Rush.

6 ounces warmed orange juice
3 ounces amaretto
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour orange juice into a large mug.
 Add amaretto.
 Stir with a cinnamon stick.

title: TITLE:  COFFEE COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: This one is not on the Starbucks menu. But it can be on
yours.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 ounce cream
1 ounce coffee liqueur
1 teaspoon sugar
4 ounces cold black coffee
1 small scoop coffee ice cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, cream, coffee liqueur, sugar, coffee,

and coffee ice cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.

title: TITLE:  BULLDOG HIGHBALL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Arf! No need to save these for when you’re putting on the
dog.

1 1/4 ounces orange juice
2 ounces gin
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build orange juice and gin in a highball glass with

ice.

 Fill with ginger ale.

title: TITLE:  GINGER FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: You’ve got to think that the Gilligan’s Island starlet was
craving one of these after her first week on the island.

1 ounce lemon juice
1 teaspoon sugar
1 1/2 ounces gin
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, sugar, and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with ginger ale.

title: TITLE:  MORNING FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: For  the  rock  babe  who  needs  just  a  little  morning  glory
help from the bottle.

2 ounces blended whiskey
1/2 egg white
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
1 teaspoon sugar
1/2 teaspoon Pernod
Chilled club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, egg white, lemon juice, sugar, and

Pernod.
 Shake.
 Strain into a tall glass.
 Add splash of soda 
 Fill glass with ice.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  ORANGE OASIS
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Dissolve sugar in club soda in a collins glass.
 Add ice.
 Build lime juice, pastis, and gin.
 Fill with ginger ale.
 Garnish with lemon and orange spirals.

 ORANGE OASIS

No mirage here, thirsty traveler. Come on in, but leave the
camel outside.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce cherry liqueur
4 ounces orange juice
Ginger ale

 Build gin, cherry liqueur, and orange juice in a

collins glass with ice.

 Fill with ginger ale.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  STRAWBERRY SPARKLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A sprinkle of pink cheer for the most carefree of occasions.

1 cup sliced fresh strawberries
2 ounces frounceen strawberry daiquiri fruit juice con-centrate, thawed

6 ounces chilled champagne
4 ounces chilled lemon-flavored sparkling water
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put fresh strawberries into a blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour strawberry puree into a glass pitcher.
 Add juice concentrate.
 Stir well.
 Cover and refrigerate.
 Prior to serving, stir in champagne and sparkling

water.

 Pour into chilled champagne flutes.
 Garnish with fresh strawberries, if desired.

title: TITLE:  AFFAIR
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka, frounceen strawberries, cranberry juice,

and ice in a blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a large goblet.
 Garnish with a whole strawberry and a mint sprig.

 AFFAIR

Definitely to remember.

2 ounces strawberry schnapps
2 ounces cranberry juice
2 ounces orange juice
Club soda (optional)

 Pour schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice in

a highball glass with ice.

 Stir.
 Top with club soda, if desired.

title: TITLE:  FROZEN MINT JULEP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sultry summer days call for one of these. Make that two.

2 ounces bourbon
1 ounce lemon juice
1 ounce sugar syrup
6 mint leaves
6 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Muddle  bourbon, lemon  juice, sugar  syrup, and

mint leaves in a glass.

 Pour mixture and ice into a blender.
 Blend at high speed for 15 or 20 seconds.
 Pour into a chilled highball glass.
 Garnish with a mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  LAKE BREEZE
description:
DESCRIPTION: While the kids are gathering wood for the campfire, sneak
a few of these.

4 ounces cranberry juice
2 ounces pineapple juice
1 teaspoon coconut liqueur
Lemon-lime soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add juices, liqueur, and soda.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass with ice.
 Fill with soda.

title: TITLE:  FANCY FIX
description:
DESCRIPTION: The much-needed dose for those who like it posh.

Juice of 1/2 lemon or lime
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
1 teaspoon water
2 1/2 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Squeeze juice of lemon or lime into a collins glass.
 Add sugar and water.
 Stir.
 Fill glass with shaved ice.
 Add champagne.
 Stir well.
 Garnish with a slice of lemon and a straw.

 PIMM’S CUP

London Lucys love this classic British upper class libation.
Perfect for a day at Wimbledon, Ascot, or the Henley Royal
Regatta.

2 parts lemonade or ginger beer (Bartender’s choice)
1 part Pimms No.1
Slice of vodka-soaked orange; cucumber; lemon; 

apple; a strawberry

 Pour lemonade into a highball glass with ice. (Use

a pitcher if making more than one drink.)

 Add Pimm’s Cup No. 
 Drop in vodka soaked fruit.
 Garnish with a mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  PISCO SOUR
description:
DESCRIPTION: A Chilean favorite that always tastes better in Santiago.
But works fine in Santa Fe.

1 1/2 ounces pisco brandy
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1 teaspoon sugar
1/2 egg white
Dash of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pisco brandy, lemon juice, sugar, egg white,

and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MANGO BATIDA
description:
DESCRIPTION: A South  American  cooler  that  refreshes  the  weariest
globetrotter.

1 ounce orange juice
2 1/4 ounces mango juice
1 1/2 ounces cachaca
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour juices and cachaca into a cocktail shaker.
 Shake.
 Pour into highball glass with crushed ice.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  BLUE FIX
description:
DESCRIPTION: The absolute antidote for the funks. Kiss those blues good-
bye.

Juice of 1/2 lemon or lime
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
1 teaspoon water
2 1/2 ounces blue curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Squeeze juice of lemon or lime into a collins glass.
 Add sugar and water.
 Stir.
 Fill glass with shaved ice.
 Add blue curacao.
 Stir well.
 Garnish with a slice of lemon and a straw.

title: TITLE:  HAPPILY EVER AFTER
description:
DESCRIPTION: The wedding party essential for the toast that guests will
remember forever after.

1 ounce peach schnapps
1 ounce cranberry juice
1 ounce ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and ginger

ale into old-fashioned glass with ice.

 Stir.

title: TITLE:  ALOHA BUBBLY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  Fact:  Aloha  means  love, luck, and  happiness. Say
Aloha  Nui  to  those  you  really  love. That  means  lots  of
aloha.

2 ounces pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces club soda
2 ounces dry white wine
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour the pineapple juice, powdered sugar, and

club soda in a collins glass.

 Stir.
 Fill with crushed ice.
 Add white wine.
 Fill with club soda.
 Stir.
 Garnish with an orange or lemon peel spiral.

title: TITLE:  HOT SPRINGS COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hot Springs, Arkansas. Home to thermal springs, gangster
lore, and plenty of gambling. Oh, and Bill Clinton lived here
once. No word on whether he inhaled these.

1 1/2 ounces white wine
1 tablespoon pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon maraschino liqueur
Dash of orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add white wine, pineapple juice, maraschino

liqueur, and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CREAMY DRIVER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Go, speed racer, go. This one’s waiting for you in the win-
ner’s circle.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 egg yolk
4 ounces orange juice
1/2 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, egg yolk, orange juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.

title: TITLE:  BUNNY MOTHER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Multiplying rabbits? Now we know what they’re drinking.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 ounce orange juice
1 ounce lemon juice
1 teaspoon sugar
1/4 ounce grenadine
1/4 ounce Cointreau
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, juices, sugar, grenadine, and Cointreau.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with crushed ice.
 Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  NECTARINE COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Surely  this  nectarine  was served  on  Mount  Olympus  to
create a buzz at dawn.

2 ounces vodka
3 ounces orange juice
1 teaspoon sugar
Several pieces peeled ripe nectarine
Lemon-lime soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, orange juice, sugar, and nectarine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with lemon-lime soda.
 Garnish with nectarine slice.

title: TITLE:  DUKE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink equally at home in the palace or in your personal
fiefdom.

1 egg
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/4 ounce orange juice
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add egg, triple sec, juices, and maraschino liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a delmonico glass.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  GRAVEL GERTIE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ridden hard, hung up wet. Need we say more about our
old friend Gertie? We like her. A lot.

1 ounce vodka
1 ounce tomato juice
1 ounce clam juice
Dash of Tabasco sauce
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build vodka, juices, and Tabasco sauce into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

 Stir.

title: TITLE:  MAD BULL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Early  mornings  have  you  seeing  red?  Charge  after  this
one, Toro.

1 1/2 ounces aquavit
3/4 ounce lime juice 
2 ounces tomato juice
1 ounce beef bouillon
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build vodka, juices, and beef bouillon into a

highball with ice.

 Sprinkle with celery salt.

title: TITLE:  FRENCH WENCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: There once was a wench from Par-ee. Who climbed on a
horse next to me. She said with a grin as I tickled her chin,
if you offer me drinks, I say “Oui.”

2 ounces red Dubonnet
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Dubonnet in a highball glass with ice.
 Add ginger ale.
 Garnish with lime squeeze.

title: TITLE:  MONDAY MORNING
description:
DESCRIPTION: This little elixir takes the sting out of the first day of the
work week.

1 1/2 ounces Fernet Branca
1 1/2 ounces pineapple juice
Juice of 1 lime
Juice of 1 orange
Dash of absinthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Fernet Branca, juices, and absinthe.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GREYHOUND
description:
DESCRIPTION: Go Greyhound. Leave the driving to someone else.

1 1/4 ounces vodka
Grapefruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Add vodka.
 Fill with grapefruit juice.

title: TITLE:  GODFATHER
description:
DESCRIPTION: An offer no self-respecting swinger can refuse.

1 1/2 ounces scotch 
3/4 ounce amaretto
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Add scotch and amaretto.

title: TITLE:  TOM COLLINS
description:
DESCRIPTION: This drink is so good they named a glass after it.

2 to 2 1/2 ounces gin
1 to 2 teaspoons sugar
1/2 to 1 ounce lemon juice 
Iced club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, sugar, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass half-filled with ice.
 Add soda.
 Stir.
 Garnish with lemon slice and/or orange slice

and/or cherry. Serve with a straw.

title: TITLE:  JOHN COLLINS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tom’s low-profile cousin.

Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces blended whiskey
Club Soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon, powdered sugar, and whiskey.
 Strain into a collins glass.
 Add several cubes of ice.
 Fill with club soda.
 Stir.
 Garnish with lemon slice and/or orange slice

and/or cherry. Serve with a straw.

title: TITLE:  VODKA COLLINS
description:
DESCRIPTION: The tipsy aunt Tom and John don’t talk about.

Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces vodka
Club Soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon, powdered sugar, and vodka.
 Strain into a collins glass.
 Add several cubes of ice.
 Fill with club soda.
 Stir.
 Garnish  with  lemon  slice  and/or  orange  slice

and/or cherry. Serve with a straw.

title: TITLE:  MINT JULEP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Quintessentially Southern. Consumed by many a Scarlett
awaiting her Rhett.

12 mint leaves on stem
6 mint leaves on stem
1 teaspoon sugar
2 teaspoons water
2 1/2 ounces 86- or 100-proof bourbon
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Tear the 12 mint leaves partially while leaving

them on the stem.

 Place them in a silver julep mug or 12-ounce

glass with sugar and water.

 Muddle or stir until sugar is completely dissolved.
 Fill glass with cracked ice.
 Add bourbon.
 Stir until ice is partially dissolved.
 Add more ice to rim.
 Stir.
 Tear the remainder of the mint leaves to release

aroma and insert into ice with leaves on top.

title: TITLE:  WHITE RUSSIAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: The perfect nightcap to sip in an icy, abandoned dacha.

1 ounce coffee liqueur
2 ounces vodka
Milk or cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Add coffee liqueur and vodka.
 Fill with milk or cream.

title: TITLE:  SIDECAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: Needless to say, this one is for passengers only.

Juice of 1/4 lemon
1 ounce triple sec
1 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon, triple sec, and brandy.
 Strain into cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MANHATTAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Classic drink for a classic city.

1/4 ounce sweet vermouth
1 1/2 ounces blended whiskey
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth and whisky.
 Stir.
 Strain into cocktail glass.
 Serve with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  HARVEY WALLBANGER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Harvey is actually a pretty quiet guy—unless you forget to
bring his drink. Don’t test him.

1 ounce vodka
4 ounces orange juice
1/2 ounce Galliano
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill collins glass with ice.
 Add vodka and orange juice.
 Float Galliano on top.

title: TITLE:  GIBSON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun Fact: This drink was named in honor of Charles Gib-
son, the  artist  who  created  the  famed  “Gibson  Girls”
images in the early 1900s.

2 ounces gin
1/4 ounce Rose’s lime juice (or 1/2 ounce fresh lime

juice for substitution)
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into chilled old-fashioned glass.
 Garnish with skewered cocktail onions.

title: TITLE:  PINK LADY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Preferred  cocktail  for  Rizzo, Frenchy, and  all  of  you  cool
chick wannabees. It’s the one that you want.

1 1/2 ounces dry gin
1 teaspoon sweet cream
1 teaspoon grenadine
1 egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, sweet cream, grenadine, and egg white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  OLD FASHIONED
description:
DESCRIPTION: A flapper’s  favorite, this  one  gained  popularity  in 
Prohibition-era speakeasies.

1 sugar cube
Dash of Angostura bitters
1 teaspoon water
2 ounces blended whiskey
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Add sugar cube, bitters, and water in old-fashioned

glass and muddle well.

 Add whiskey.
 Stir.
 Add a twist of lemon peel and ice cubes.
 Garnish with orange and lemon slices and a

cherry.

 Serve with a swizzle stick.

title: TITLE:  ROB ROY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Named for a red-haired Scottish outlaw, renowned for his
daring prison breaks. Lift your glass and toast a true hero
of the Highlands.

3/4 ounce sweet vermouth
1 1/2 ounces scotch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth and scotch.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ABBEY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Happy hour at the monastery.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
Juice of 1/4 orange
Dash orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, orange juice, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  WHISKEY SOUR
description:
DESCRIPTION: The Popeye of drinks. It am what it am.

1 ounce whiskey
2 ounces sour mix
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey and sour mix.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sour glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  BLACK RUSSIAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Order one of these and kiss your troubles Do svidaniya.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes.
 Add vodka and coffee liqueur.

title: TITLE:  SAZERAC
description:
DESCRIPTION: Some  claim  this  was  truly  the  first  cocktail, made  by  a
West  Indian  apothecary  in  New  Orleans. New  Orleans,
birthplace of the cocktail? Go figure.

1/4 teaspoon absinthe
1/2 teaspoon sugar 
1/4 teaspoon bitters (Peychaud’s, if possible)
2 ounces bourbon
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Swirl absinthe in a chilled old-fashioned glass

until coated.

 Add sugar, bitters, and one tablespoon water.
 Stir until sugar dissolves.
 Add large ice cube and bourbon.
 Stir.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  GIMLET
description:
DESCRIPTION: A late  nineteenth  century concoction, the  gimlet  later
spawned the Kamikaze and the Cosmopolitan. Admire the
pedigree.

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce Rose’s lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and lime juice.
 Stir extremely well.
 Strain into sugar-frosted rim chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  GIN AND TONIC
description:
DESCRIPTION: Half price for those wearing seer-sucker.

2 ounces gin
Tonic water
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Add gin.
 Fill with tonic water.
 Stir.
 Garnish with lime slice.

title: TITLE:  SCREWDRIVER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Depending on which way you turn this one, you’ll either
get tight or get loose.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
Orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Add vodka.
 Fill with orange juice.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  CAIPIRINHA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Used to be Brazil’s best-kept secret but—luckily for us—
the cat is out of the bag.

2 to 3 lime wedges
Dash of sugar
3 ounces Brazilian rum
1/2 ounce sour mix
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Mash lime wedges with sugar in cocktail shaker.
 Add ice, rum, and sour mix.
 Shake.
 Pour into highball glass.
 Garnish with lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  BRONX
description:
DESCRIPTION: Raise a glass to the birthplace of Rat Packer Joey Bishop.

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
Juice of 1/4 orange
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, and juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  RUM SWIZZLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The most-treasured of all the pirate’s booty.

Juice of 1 lime
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces club soda
2 dashes of Angostura bitters
2 ounces rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a collins glass with shaved ice.
 Add lime, powdered sugar, and club soda.
 Stir with a swizzle stick.
 Add bitters and rum.
 Fill with club soda.
 Serve with swizzle stick.

title: TITLE:  BLACK DEVIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sometimes, it’s all about the olive.

2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a black olive.

title: TITLE:  FRENCH RIVIERA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Take a liquid trip to the Cote d’Azur.

1 ounce rye whiskey
1/2 ounce apricot brandy 
1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, brandy, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  GORDON COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Flash  Gordon?  Jeff  Gordon?  Commissioner  Gordon?  Gor-
don Sumner? All we know is, this one’s our favorite.

2 ounces Gordon’s gin
1/2 ounce sherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and sherry.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  HONEY BEE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A little bit o’ honey in every sip.

1/2 ounce honey 
2 1/2 ounces dark rum 
1/2 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add honey, rum, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  LONDON FOG
description:
DESCRIPTION: Elementary, my dear Watson. We order another round.

1 ounce white crème de menthe
1 ounce anisette
Dash of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de menthe, anisette, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  INTERNATIONAL 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Quick! Call the U.N.

1 1/2 ounces cognac 
splash of vodka
splash of anisette
1/3 ounce Cointreau
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add cognac, vodka, anisette, and Cointreau.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ORANGE BLOSSOM
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fragrant, timeless, and  truly  special. Mix  it  for  your
favorite flower.

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce triple sec 
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, triple sec, and orange juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  STINGER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ouch! That’s going to leave a mark.

1 1/2 ounces brandy 
1/2 ounce white crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy and crème de menthe.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  NEGRONI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Camillo Negroni of Florence never wavered from this aper-
itif. Why should you?

1 ounce gin
1 ounce Campari
1 ounce sweet vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Campari, and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a twist of lemon.

title: TITLE:  ALEXANDER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Patriarch of the proud Alexander family of cocktails.

1 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce gin
1 ounce heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, gin, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  GIN RICKEY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Rickey, don’t lose this recipe. You don’t want to drink noth-
ing else.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
Juice of 1/2 lime 
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Add gin and lime.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  LEAVE IT TO ME
description:
DESCRIPTION: …Not the Beaver. Ha. Just giving you the business.

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce apricot brandy 
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
3 dashes lemon juice 
3 dashes grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, brandy, vermouth, lemon juice, and

grenadine.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GIN FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: For those who like their gin on the softer side, this drink
offers less of a kick.

1 1/2 ounces dry gin 
1 tablespoon powdered sugar
3 ounces sour mix
1 ounce club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, powdered sugar, and sour mix.
 Shake.
 Pour over ice into collins glass.
 Add club soda.
 Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  CLOVER CLUB
description:
DESCRIPTION: Where leprechauns grab a quiet nip after a long day at the
end of the rainbow.

1 1/2 ounces dry gin 
Juice of 1/2 lemon 
2 teaspoons grenadine
1 egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, lemon, grenadine, and egg white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MARGUERITE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Marguerite, Marguerite...oh that life could be so sweet!

3/4 ounce dry vermouth
1 1/2 ounces dry gin
1/4 teaspoon curacao
Dash of orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth, gin, curacao, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  CLASSIC MARGARITA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Legend  says  Margarita  Sames, a  Dallas  socialite  who
spent time in Acapulco, created this drink in the late 1940s
for her international guests.

1 1/2 ounces tequila 
1/2 ounce triple sec 
1 1/2 ounces sour mix 
Several dashes of lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, triple sec, sour mix, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled salt-rimmed cocktail glass or

an old-fashioned glass.

title: TITLE:  MONTE CARLO
description:
DESCRIPTION: For  the  race-car  driving, Baccarat-playing,
super spy in all of us.

jet-setting

1 1/2 ounces rye whiskey 
1/2 ounce Benedictine 
3 or 4 dashes of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, Benedictine, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GOLDEN FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Plop, plop, fizz, fizz, oh what a relief this drink is.

1 ounce gin
2 ounces sour mix
1 egg yolk
1 ounce club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, sour mix, egg yolk, and club soda.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass filled with ice.
 Top with club soda.

title: TITLE:  CUBA LIBRE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Originated  near  the  end  of  the  Spanish-American  War.
Translated, it means “free Cuba.”

1 1/2 ounces light rum 
6 ounces cola
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Add rum and cola.
 Stir.
 Garnish with lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  DUBONNET COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: This sedate cocktail predates Prohibition, and its base was
once the preferred drink of the French Foreign Legion. Vive
La France!

1 ounce gin or vodka
1 ounce red Dubonnet
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin or vodka and Dubonnet.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CASINO COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Pace yourself, sport, or you’ll end up with snake eyes.

2 ounces gin
1/2 teaspoon lemon juice 
1/4 teaspoon maraschino liqueur
2 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and

bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Serve with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  MILLIONAIRE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy this seven-figure drink even if you are on a blue-
collar budget.

1 1/2 ounces bourbon 
1/2 ounce Pernod 
2 or 3 dashes curacao
2 or 3 dashes of grenadine
Half of an egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, Pernod, curacao, grenadine, and egg

white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BERMUDA ROSE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Delicate and dainty, but too many of these and you’ll be
lost in the Triangle.

1 1/4 ounces dry gin
1/4 ounce apricot liqueur
1/4 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apricot liqueur, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BISHOP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Say Hail Mary three times, kneel, and pour.

Juice of 1/4 lemon
Juice of 1/4 orange
1 teaspoon of powdered sugar
Burgundy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add juices and powdered sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Add two ice cubes.
 Fill with burgundy.
 Stir.
 Garnish with lemon and orange twists.

title: TITLE:  CHINESE COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ancient Chinese secret. See recipe below.

1 1/2 ounces Jamaican rum 
1 tablespoon grenadine
1 tablespoon maraschino liqueur
1 tablespoon triple sec
Dash of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, grenadine, maraschino liqueur, triple

sec, and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  KENTUCKY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Why you really had to carry him back to his old Kentucky
home…

2 ounces bourbon
1 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MARY PICKFORD
description:
DESCRIPTION: 1930’s international film superstar, known as “America’s
Sweetheart” as  much  for  her  movie  roles  as  for  her
romance  with  heartthrob  Douglas  Fairbanks. Pop  in  a
DVD of Coquette and drink up!

1/2 ounce rum 
1/2 ounce pineapple juice 
1 teaspoon grenadine
6 drops maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, pineapple juice, grenadine, and

maraschino liqueur.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SLOE GIN FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sloe…bartenders crossing.

1 ounce sloe gin
2 ounces sour mix 
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sloe gin and sour mix.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled collins glass.
 Fill with club soda.
 Garnish with cherry.

title: TITLE:  RUM COLLINS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tom, John, and Vodka’s long-lost Caribbean cousin.

2 ounces light rum
1 teaspoon sugar syrup
1/2 ounce lime juice 
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill collins glass with ice.
 Add rum, sugar syrup, and lime juice.
 Stir.
 Fill with club soda.
 Garnish with lime slice.

title: TITLE:  MINT COLLINS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tom, John, Vodka, and Rum’s cool older cousin.

2 ounces mint-flavored gin
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
Juice of 1/2 lemon 
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour gin, powdered sugar, and lemon into collins

glass.

 Add several ice cubes.
 Fill with club soda.
 Stir.
 Garnish with lemon, orange, and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  ALABAMA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Stars won’t be the only things falling on Alabama after a
few of these.

1 ounce brandy
1 ounce curacao 
1/2 ounce lime juice 
1/2 teaspoon sugar syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, curacao, lime juice, and sugar syrup.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel.

title: TITLE:  PHOEBE SNOW
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mysterious and enthralling, this cocktail leaves you want-
ing more.

1 1/4 ounces brandy
1 1/4 ounces red Dubonnet
1/4 teaspoon Pernod
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, Dubonnet, and Pernod.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GIN AND LIME
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ideal for sipping alfresco and watching the masses go by.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/2 ounce fresh lime juice 
1/2 ounce orange juice 
1 teaspoon Rose’s lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lime peel.

title: TITLE:  SALTY DOG
description:
DESCRIPTION: Let me drink your Salty Dog, or I won’t be your gal at all…

2 ounces vodka
1/2 unsweetened grapefruit juice 
1 teaspoon lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, grapefruit juice, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Sprinkle drink with several dashes of salt.

title: TITLE:  SINGAPORE SLING
description:
DESCRIPTION: First  concocted  at  Raffle’s  Hotel  in  Singapore, which  W.
Somerset  Maugham  once  claimed  held  “all  the  fables  of
the exotic East.” Sweet and indulgent.

Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces gin
Club soda
1/2 ounce cherry-flavored brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon, powdered sugar, gin, club soda, and

brandy.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass.
 Add ice cubes.
 Fill with club soda.
 Float cherry-flavored brandy on top.
 Garnish with fruits in season and serve with a straw.

title: TITLE:  RUSTY NAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Before drinking, prepare a tetanus “shot.”

3/4 ounce scotch
1/4 ounce Drambuie
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Pour scotch.
 Float Drambuie on top.

title: TITLE:  LONG ISLAND ICED TEA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Walk away from this one sober. I dare you.

1/2 ounce vodka 
1/2 ounce gin 
1/2 ounce light rum 
1/2 ounce tequila 
Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 dash cola
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Pour vodka, gin, rum, tequila, and lemon in high-ball glass.

 Add cola for cooler.
 Garnish with a slice of lemon.

title: TITLE:  MOSCOW MULE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Born  out  of  an  abundance  of  ginger  beer  at  Hollywood’s
Cock ‘n’ Bull, this one became huge in the 1950s. Kicks like
crazy.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
Juice of 1/2 lime 
Ginger beer
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka and lime juice into a copper mug or a

collins glass.

 Add ice cubes.
 Fill with ginger beer.
 Stir.
 Add a twist of lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  KING COLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: You brought me a drink? Bless your merry old soul.

1 slice orange
1 slice pineapple
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces blended whiskey
2 ice cubes
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Muddle orange, pineapple, and powdered sugar in

old-fashioned glass.

 Add whiskey and ice cubes.
 Stir well.

title: TITLE:  NEW YORK SOUR
description:
DESCRIPTION: All the bite of the big apple without the hassle.

Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 tablespoon powdered sugar
2 ounces blended whiskey
Claret
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon, powdered sugar, and whiskey.
 Shake.
 Strain into white wine glass, leaving half of inch

from top.

 Float claret.
 Garnish with half-slice of lemon and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  NEW YORK COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Start spreading the news, I’m having one today.

Juice of 1 lime or 1/2 lemon 
1 tablespoon powdered sugar
1 1/2 ounces blended whiskey 
1/2 teaspoon grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lime or lemon juice, powdered sugar, whiskey,

and grenadine.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Add a twist of lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  DAISY
description:
DESCRIPTION: After a few of these, Miss Daisy needed a driver.

2 ounces tequila
1 ounce lemon juice
2 teaspoons grenadine
Splash of club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, lemon juice, grenadine, and club soda.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass.
 Add ice.
 Top with a splash of club soda.

title: TITLE:  AMERICAN BEAUTY
description:
DESCRIPTION: The desperately-needed cocktail of suburban husbands.

3/4 ounce brandy
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce grenadine 
3/4 ounce orange juice
1/2 ounce crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add  brandy, dry  vermouth, grenadine, orange

juice, and crème de menthe.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BACARDI COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Okay, Smarty, drink  some  Bacardi. Call  up  your  friends
and have a little party.

1 1/2 ounces Bacardi light or gold rum 
1/2 ounce lime juice 
3 dashes grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, lime juice, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BETWEEN THE SHEETS
description:
DESCRIPTION: This drink is a pleasure...indulge.

3/4 ounce brandy
3/4 ounce triple sec
3/4 ounce light rum
3/4 ounce sour mix
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, triple sec, rum, and sour mix.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  CARROLL COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: As Lewis Carroll said: Down the rabbit hole. Drink me!

1 1/2 ounces brandy 
3/4 ounce sweet vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  FUZZY NAVEL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Less painful than a belly button piercing.

1 1/2 ounces peach schnapps 
6 ounces orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Add peach schnapps and orange juice.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  DESERT COOLER
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Southern Comfort and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a deep-shell champagne saucer.

 DESERT COOLER

Fun  fact:  The  Desert  Cooler  was  created  at  Las  Vegas’
famed  Desert  Inn, built  in   Who  owned  it  at  one
time? Billionaire Howard Hughes.

1 1/2 ounces Southern Comfort 
Pineapple-grapefruit juice

 Fill collins glass with ice.
 Add Southern Comfort.
 Fill with juice.
 Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

title: TITLE:  RED LION
description:
DESCRIPTION: Invented in the 1930s by an enterprising Brit, who cleverly
took  England’s  national  emblem  and  claimed  it  for  his
own.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1 1/2 ounces Grand Marnier 
3/4 ounce fresh orange juice
3/4 ounce fresh lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Grand Marnier, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Garnish with lemon or orange peel.

title: TITLE:  HARLEM COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Perfect for your own personal night at the Apollo.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1 ounce pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, pineapple juice, and maraschino liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with two pineapple chunks on toothpick

across glass.

title: TITLE:  PINK GIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fashionable  in  mid-nineteenth  century  Britain, it  spread
worldwide with the help of the roving British Navy. A no-
nonsense way of getting your daily gin requirement.

2 ounces gin
2 dashes of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a rocks glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  BRONX SILVER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Despite the name, this one is hardly second best.

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
3/4 ounce orange juice
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
1 egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, orange juice, and egg white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  SILVER FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: The right cocktail for a twenty-fifth wedding anniversary.

2 ounces dry gin
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 egg white
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, powdered sugar, lemon juice, and egg

white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  CLASSIC COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drinks  come  and  go, but  the  perfect  mix  of  sweet  and
strong has kept this one popular for decades. A must.

1 1/2 ounces brandy
1/4 ounce Cointreau
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
1 teaspoon lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add  brandy, Cointreau, maraschino  liqueur, and

lemon juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SOUTHSIDE
description:
DESCRIPTION: This drink was once popular with the notorious gangsters
of  Chicago’s  old  Southside. Think  speakeasies, big  deals,
and bathtub gin.

1 1/2 ounces gin
Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 sprigs fresh mint
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, lemon, powdered sugar, and mint.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  DAIQUIRI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: The daiquiri became popular at early twentieth
century Cuban hurricane watch parties.

2 ounces light rum
1 ounce lime juice
1 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, lime juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a champagne saucer.
 Garnish with a lime slice.

title: TITLE:  MARTINEZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Possible fore-father of the more famous martini. Created in
California in the 1800s. A favorite among gold miners.

2 ounces gin
3 ounces dry vermouth
3 or 4 drops maraschino liqueur
3 or 4 drops Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

title: TITLE:  MELBA
description:
DESCRIPTION: What is this mystery ingredient called Swedish punch? A
mixture  of  spices, tea, lemon, sugar, and  rum  with  wine
added after a few months of steeping.

1/2 ounce Swedish punch
1/2 ounce rum 
Juice of 1/4 lemon
2 dashes absinthe
2 dashes grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add  Swedish  punch, rum, lemon  juice, absinthe,

and grenadine.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  DELMONICO
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink named for the historic New York City restaurant
that made it famous.

3/4 ounce gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1/2 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, and brandy.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  MOJITO
description:
DESCRIPTION: James Bond’s preferred drink while capering in Cuba.

2 1/2 ounces light rum
1 tablespoon sugar syrup 
8 mint sprigs
Club soda
1 lime
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put the mint leaves and cooled sugar syrup into a

highball glass.

 Using  a  spoon, muddle  mint  leaves  with  sugar

syrup for about 20-30 seconds.

 Cut the lime in half and remove the seeds.
 Squeeze the juice from both halves into the glass.
 Add one-half of the lime to the glass.
 Pour in rum.
 Stir.
 Add ice.
 Top with club soda.
 Garnish with a mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  AMERICANO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Another  favorite  of  James  Bond;  he  drinks  it  in  the  first
Bond book Casino Royale.

1 ounce Campari
1 ounce sweet vermouth
3 ounces club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice
 Add Campari, vermouth, and club soda.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  MISSISSIPPI MULE
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Combine rum, vodka, brandy, grenadine, lime

juice, and ice in a blender.

 Blend at low speed.
 Pour into a champagne flute.
 Garnish with a lime peel.

 MISSISSIPPI MULE

Johnny Reb’s favorite drink. Watch out for the kick.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1 teaspoon crème de cassis
1 teaspoon lemon juice

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de cassis, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  NAPOLEON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Able was I, ere I saw Elba.

2 ounces gin
1/4 ounce red Dubonnet
1 ounce orange curacao
Dash of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Dubonnet, curacao, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  PETER PAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: For the boy who never grew up but still has legal I.D.

3/4 ounce gin
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
3/4 ounce orange juice
2 dashes of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, orange juice, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  PRESBYTERIAN 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A sure way to liven up the church picnic.

1 1/2 ounces bourbon 
Splash of club soda
Splash of ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build in a highball glass.
 Garnish with a lime twist.

title:
TITLE:  THUNDER AND 

LIGHTNING
description:
DESCRIPTION: The way this hits you is frightening. You better knock on
wood.

1 1/2 ounces brandy 
1 egg yolk
1 teaspoon sugar
Pinch of cayenne pepper
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, egg yolk, sugar, and cayenne pepper.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  WILL ROGERS 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Will Rogers never met a man he didn’t like. Drink these,
hug the guy on the next bar stool.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce orange juice 
1/4 ounce orange curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, orange juice, and curacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CHARLESTON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don the fringe flapper dress, pearls, and feather boa and
start gamboling.

1/2 ounce gin 
1/2 ounce Kirsch 
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
1/4 ounce orange curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Kirsch, vermouths, maraschino liqueur,

and curacao.

 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ORIENTAL COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Serve these to guests and let them pretend they are trav-
eling on the Orient Express.

1 ounce blended whiskey 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1/2 ounce triple sec 
Juice of 1/2 lime
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, vermouth, triple sec, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  DEMPSEY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Just try and go fifteen rounds with this heavy weight.

1 ounce gin
1 ounce apple brandy
1/4 ounce pastis
1/4 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apple brandy, pastis, and grenadine.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  TORPEDO COCKTAIL
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apple brandy, Benedictine, apricot brandy,

and maple syrup.

 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

 TORPEDO COCKTAIL

Sink another drink; it’ll give you time to think.

1 1/2 ounces apple brandy
3/4 ounce brandy 
1 to 2 dashes gin

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandies and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  NEW ORLEANS BUCK
description:
DESCRIPTION: What  the  locals  call  you  if  you  get  naked  on  Bourbon
Street.

1 1/2 ounces light rum 
1/2 ounce fresh lime juice
1/2 ounce orange juice
2 dashes Angostura bitters
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, juices, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice.
 Top with ginger ale.
 Stir.
 Garnish with a lime slice.

title: TITLE:  OPERA
description:
DESCRIPTION: The preferred choice after the fat lady sings.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce red Dubonnet
1/2 ounce maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Dubonnet, and maraschino liqueur.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  CLASSIC CHAMPAGNE

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Dorothy  Parker  said  it  best: “Three  be  the  things  I  shall
attain: envy, content, and sufficient champagne.”

1 sugar cube
2 dashes Angostura bitters
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Place sugar and bitters in a chilled champagne

flute.

 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE 
CORNUCOPIA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Forget the flute, pass the horn of plenty. Make that plenty
of bubbly.

1 ounce cranberry juice
2 scoops rainbow sherbet
1 ounce vodka
3/4 ounce peach schnapps
1 ounce champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour cranberry juice into an oversized red wine

glass.

 Pour rainbow sherbet, vodka, and peach schnapps

into a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour mixture over cranberry juice.
 Layer champagne on top.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  BELLINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Champagne and peaches! A dynamite duo, baby.

1 fresh peach
Chilled brut champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Puree peach in a blender.
 Pour into champagne glass.
 Add chilled champagne.

title: TITLE:  BELLINI PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Come  quickly  I’m  tasting  stars—the  immortal  words  of
the man himself…Dom Perignon.

Fresh peaches
Iced brut champagne
1 tablespoon lemon juice
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  In a blender, puree enough peaches to cover the

bottom of a punch bowl.

 Pour the peach mixture into a punch bowl.
 Add approximately three times as much cham-pagne to peach mixture.

 Add lemon juice and sugar to taste.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  IMPERIAL FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Conquer the empire. One glass at a time.

1 ounce bourbon
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
1/2 teaspoon sugar 
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled champagne glass.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  FROZEN BIKINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Icy and tingly in all the right places.

2 ounces vodka
1 ounce peach schnapps
3 ounces peach nectar
2 ounces orange juice
Splash of fresh lemon juice
1 ounce chilled champagne
4 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka, peach schnapps, peach nectar, juices,

and ice into a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a goblet.
 Top with champagne.

title:
TITLE:  CHAMBORD ROYALE

SPRITZER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Be a part of the court even if you don’t own a crown.

1 1/2 ounces Chambord
Chilled champagne
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Chambord into a wine glass.
 Add splash of champagne.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE CUP
description:
DESCRIPTION: My cup runneth over. Give me a bigger one.

4 teaspoons powdered sugar
6 ounces club soda
1 ounce triple sec
2 ounces brandy
16 ounces chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a pitcher with ice.
 Add powdered sugar, club soda, triple sec, and

brandy.

 Add champagne.
 Stir.
 Decorate with fruits in season and cucumber rind

on side of pitcher.

 Top with mint.
 Serve in red wine glasses.
(Serves 6)

title: TITLE:  MIMOSA
description:
DESCRIPTION: This  classic  brunch  drink  is  perfect  for  anytime  of  day;
enjoy it at breakfast, lunch, or dinner.

3 ounces chilled champagne
3 ounces chilled orange juice
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Pour champagne and orange juice into cham-pagne flute.

title: TITLE:  CARIBBEAN CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Isaac can’t make these fast enough on the Pacific Princess.

1/2 teaspoon light rum 
1/2 teaspoon banana liqueur 
Dash of orange bitters
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
1 banana slice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rum, banana liqueur, and bitters into a

chilled champagne glass.

 Add champagne.
 Stir gently.
 Float banana slice on top.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE FRAISE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Remember the first time someone dropped a strawberry in
your champagne? Delicious.

1/2 teaspoon strawberry liqueur 
1/2 teaspoon Kirsch 
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
1 large strawberry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour strawberry liqueur and Kirsch into a chilled

champagne glass.

 Swirl  the  glass, coating  with  strawberry  liqueur

and Kirsch.

 Top with champagne.
 Float strawberry on top.

title: TITLE:  TINTORETTO
description:
DESCRIPTION: A delightful and unexpected “pair” of flavors.

1 pear 
Chilled champagne
Dash of pear brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Puree pear in blender.
 Pour 1/2 ounce pear puree into a champagne glass.
 Top with champagne.
 Add pear brandy.

title: TITLE:  VALENCIA
description:
DESCRIPTION: A bubbly citrus bonanza.

2 ounces apricot brandy
1 ounce orange juice
2 to 3 dashes orange bitters
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apricot brandy, orange juice, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a goblet.
 Top with champagne.

title:
TITLE:  SPARKLING WINE

POLONAISE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A teaser that you can’t skirt.

1 teaspoon blackberry liqueur
1 teaspoon blackberry brandy
1/2 teaspoon cognac 
3 ounces chilled dry sparkling wine
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Moisten champagne glass with blackberry liqueur.
 Sugar frost rim.
 Add blackberry brandy, cognac, and sparkling

wine.

 Gently stir.

title:
TITLE:  SPARKLING WINE

JULEP
description:
DESCRIPTION: For the Frenchman at the Derby who shuns bourbon.

1 mint sprig
1 tablespoon sugar syrup
1 1/2 ounces brandy 
3 ounces chilled dry sparkling wine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sugar syrup and mint sprig into champagne

glass.

 Crush mint in sugar syrup.
 Fill glass with crushed ice.
 Add brandy.
 Fill with sparkling wine.
 Gently stir.
 Garnish with a mint sprig.

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE 
MANHATTAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Step One: Don top hat and tails. Step two: Hit the town.
Step three: Leave an empty bottle of champagne at every
stop.

1 ounce Canadian whiskey
1/4 ounce sweet vermouth
Dash of Angostura bitters
3 ounces chilled brut champagne
1 brandied cherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, vermouth, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled champagne glass.
 Top with champagne.
 Float brandied cherry on top.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE NORMANDE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Lord  Maynard  Keynes  said, “My  only  regret  is  that  I  did
not drink more champagne.” Don’t be like him.

1 teaspoon Calvados
1/2 teaspoon sugar 
Dash of Angostura bitters
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Calvados, sugar, and bitters into chilled

champagne glass.

 Stir.
 Top with champagne.
 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE NOYAUX
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t hold back. Go nuts.

1/2 ounce crème de noyaux
1 teaspoon lime juice
1 large toasted almond
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
Lime slice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour crème de noyaux and lime juice into a chilled

champagne glass.
 Add the almond.
 Top with champagne.
 Float a lime slice on top.

title: TITLE:  SAVOY SPRINGTIME
description:
DESCRIPTION: I’m stomping at the Savoy with a glass of champagne in
my hand. Life couldn’t be better.

1/4 ounce gin
1/4 ounce Cointreau
1/4 ounce fresh orange juice
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour gin, Cointreau, and orange juice into a

champagne glass.

 Top with champagne.
 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  MOSCOW MIMOSA
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill wine glass with ice cubes.
 Add cognac.
 Top with champagne.

 MOSCOW MIMOSA

What all the well-heeled Muscovites will be drinking this
season.

3 ounces chilled champagne
3 ounces orange juice
1/2 ounce vodka 

 Pour champagne, orange juice, and vodka into

wine glass.
 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  ROYAL SCREW
description:
