DESCRIPTION: A drink fit for a king, a queen, and a castle full of concubines.

2 ounces cognac
2 ounces orange juice
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour cognac into a champagne glass.
 Add orange juice.
 Stir gently.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  ROYAL PEACH FREEZE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Peaches and champagne never tasted so majestic.

1 1/2 ounces champagne 
2 ounces peach schnapps
2 ounces orange juice
1/2 ounce Rose’s lime juice 
3 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour champagne, peach schnapps, juices, and ice

into a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a goblet.

title: TITLE:  SPARKLING GALLIANO
description:
DESCRIPTION: “Champagne, if you are seeking the truth, is better than a
lie detector.” So said Graham Greene; try this and see if you
agree.

1/2 ounce Galliano 
1/2 teaspoon lemon juice 
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
Cucumber peel
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Galliano and lemon juice into a chilled

champagne glass.

 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with a cucumber peel.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: OLD-FASHIONED 

A trio of classic perennials that never goes out of style.

1/2 ounce Grand Marnier 
Dash of orange bitters
Chilled brut champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Grand Marnier and bitters into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

title:
TITLE:  CHARTREUSE 
CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Lime green bubbly for our favorite Irish holiday.

1/2 teaspoon green Chartreuse
1/2 teaspoon cognac
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour green Chartreuse, cognac, and champagne

into a chilled champagne glass.

 Stir gently.
 Garnish with twisted lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  ORANGE CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Knock, knock. Who’s there? Orange. Orange who? Orange
you glad you ordered another glass of this? 

Spiraled orange peel
2 teaspoons curacao
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Drop the spiraled orange peel into chilled cham-pagne glass.

 Add curacao and champagne.
 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  CHERRY CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: My cherie amour. This tastes great, so pour me some more.

1/2 ounce iced cherry liqueur 
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
1/2 pitted cherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour cherry liqueur into a chilled champagne

glass.

 Fill with champagne.
 Float cherry on top.

title: TITLE:  MELBA CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A delicate dessert that delights from head to toe.

1/2 ounce raspberry brandy 
4 ounces chilled brut champagne
1 fresh raspberry
Raspberry sherbet
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour raspberry brandy into a chilled champagne

glass.

 Add champagne and fresh raspberry.
 Use a melon baller to scoop a single ball of sherbet.
 Float sherbet on top.

title: TITLE:  GULF STREAM
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink that goes straight to your head. You might need a
co-pilot for this one.

1 ounce blue curacao
3 ounces champagne
1/2 ounce light rum 
1/2 ounce brandy 
6 ounces lemonade
1 ounce lime juice
3 ounces crushed ice 
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour curacao, champagne, light rum, brandy,
lemonade, lime juice, and ice into a blender.

 Pour into a sugar-rimmed parfait glass.
 Garnish with a whole strawberry.

title: TITLE:  ARISE MY LOVE
description:
DESCRIPTION: And bring me the bottle of fizzy.

1 teaspoon crème de menthe
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour crème de menthe into a champagne flute.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  NIJINSKI BLINI
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, sugar syrup, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain  into  a  sugar-rimmed  oversized  cocktail

glass.

 Top with champagne.

 NIJINSKI BLINI 

Lord Byron  said:  “A woman  should  never  be  eating  or
drinking, unless it be lobster salad and champagne.” Sign
me up! 

1 ounce vodka
2 ounces pureed peaches
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
Splash of peach schnapps
Splash of chilled champagne

 Pour  vodka, peach  puree,

lemon  juice, peach
schnapps, and champagne into champagne flute.

 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  SCOTCH ROYALE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hey there, Macbeth: I know that champagne gives you a
kick, but let’s keep the kilt on next time.

1 sugar cube
1 1/2 ounces scotch 
Dash of Angostura bitters
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Place sugar cube in a champagne flute.
 Add scotch and bitters.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  TYPHOON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Typhoon season is usually a cause for alarm except when
this libation blows in.

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce anisette 
1 ounce lime juice
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, anisette, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass with ice.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  DIAMOND FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Diamonds are a girl’s best friend, especially when they’re
paired with bubbly.

Juice of 1/2 lemon 
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces gin
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, powdered sugar, and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with champagne.
 Stir.

 FRENCH 75

Fun  fact:  Named  in  honor  of  a World War  I  French  field
gun. Indulge and make love, not war.

Juice of 1 lemon
2 teaspoons powdered sugar
2 ounces gin
Chilled champagne

 Pour lemon juice, powdered sugar, and gin into a

collins glass.

 Stir.
 Add ice.
 Fill with champagne.
 Stir.
 Garnish with a lemon or an orange slice and a cherry.
 Serve with straws.

title: TITLE:  LUXURY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Champagne wishes, caviar dreams…buy me a yacht and
hear me scream.

3 ounces brandy
2 dashes orange bitters
3 ounces chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with brandy, champagne,

and bitters.

 Stir.
 Pour into a champagne flute.

title: TITLE:  AMERICANA
description:
DESCRIPTION: President Dwight D. Eisenhower on America: “Some peo-
ple wanted champagne and caviar when they should have
had beer and hot dogs.” You know whose side we’re on.

1/4 ounce Tennessee whiskey
1/2 teaspoon sugar 
1 to 2 dashes Angostura bitters
Chilled champagne
Peach slice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour whiskey, sugar, and bitters into a collins glass.
 Stir until sugar dissolves.
 Fill with champagne.
 Add peach slice.

title: TITLE:  LONDON SPECIAL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Taking the posh down a peg or two, Clement Attlee once
said, “The House of Lords is like a glass of champagne that
has stood for five days.” Don’t keep this drink waiting; bot-
toms up! 

Orange peel
1 sugar cube
2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Drop orange peel into champagne flute.
 Add sugar cube and bitters.
 Fill with champagne.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  BLACK VELVET
description:
DESCRIPTION: An Irish favorite: one part pub, one part castle.

One part Guinness (preferably on draft)
One part champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Combine equal amounts of Guinness and cham-pagne in a chilled collins glass.

 Stir.

title: TITLE:  CHICAGO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sure to warm you up on the windiest of days.

1 1/2 ounces brandy 
Dash of curacao
Dash of Angostura bitters
Chilled brut champagne
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, curacao, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sugar-rimmed goblet or wine glass.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  CONCORDE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The Captain has turned on the “Drinking” sign. Please feel
free to move about the cabin.

2 ounces cognac
2 ounces chilled pineapple juice
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add cognac and pineapple juice.
 Stir.
 Strain into a champagne glass with cracked ice.
 Fill with champagne.

title:
TITLE:  DEATH IN THE 

AFTERNOON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Parlez-vous francais? The French refer to a climax as “le
petit mort” or “the little death.”

1 1/2 ounces Pernod 
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Pernod into a chilled champagne glass.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  EVE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink deeply from the Tree of Knowledge. Fig leaf optional.

1/2 teaspoon Pernod 
1 tablespoon cognac
2 teaspoons sugar
2 teaspoons curacao 
Chilled pink sparkling wine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Pernod into a large wine glass.
 Swirl to coat sides of glass with Pernod.
 Add cognac.
 In a bowl, combine sugar and curacao until sugar

dissolves.

 Add mixture to wine glass.
 Stir.
 Add ice cubes.
 Fill with sparkling wine.

title: TITLE:  FRENCH LIFT
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink popularized by Pierre Wonka. Fizzy lifting French
drink, indeed.

3 ounces chilled dry sparkling wine
1/2 ounce grenadine 
2 ounces Perrier water
3 or 4 fresh blueberries
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sparkling wine into a champagne glass.
 Add grenadine.
 Fill with Perrier water.
 Float blueberries on top.

title: TITLE:  FROBISHER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Named  for  a  famous  adventurer. Have  a  couple  of  these
and find out where they’ll take you.

2 ounces gin
3 dashes Angostura bitters
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour gin and bitters into highball glass with ice.
 Stir.
 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  PRINCE OF WALES
description:
DESCRIPTION: Strong enough for a king, but made for a prince.

1 ounce Madeira
1 ounce brandy
3 or 4 drops curacao
2 dashes Angostura bitters
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Madeira, brandy, curacao, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into champagne glass.
 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  AIRMAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Always delivers, right on time.

1 ounce white rum
1/2 ounce lime juice 
1/2 ounce honey syrup 
3 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, lime juice, and honey syrup.
 Shake.
 Strain into chilled champagne glass.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE BUCK
description:
DESCRIPTION: A few glasses of this concoction and you’ll want to dance
in the snow “buck” naked.

1/2 ounce gin 
1/4 ounce cherry brandy
1/4 ounce orange juice
Chilled champagne
Orange peel
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build gin, cherry brandy, and orange juice into a

highball glass.

 Fill with champagne.
 Add orange peel.

title:
TITLE:  BARBOTAGE OF 

CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: “When her guests were awash with champagne and with
gin, she was recklessly sober, as sharp as a pin.”

—William Plomer

Dash of Angostura bitters
1/2 teaspoon sugar 
Dash of lemon juice
Chilled champagne
Orange peel
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build bitters, sugar, and lemon juice in a collins

glass.

 Fill the glass half-full with crushed ice.
 Fill with champagne.
 Add orange peel.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE COBBLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: A snow cone for the posh kids.

1/4 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce orange curacao
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a double old-fashioned glass two-thirds full

with shaved ice.

 Add lemon juice and curacao.
 Stir.
 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink  this  while  enjoying  your  balcony  view  of  the  city
scape on a steamy summer night.

1/2 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce Cointreau 
Champagne
Mint sprig
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour brandy and Cointreau into a collins glass

with ice.

 Fill with champagne.
 Add mint sprig.

title:
TITLE:  LAST THOUGHT 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ensures that the night’s final ruminations are warm and
fuzzy. Need us to tuck you in?

1 ounce brandy
1 ounce champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with brandy and champagne.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE NUT

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sometimes you feel like a nut. Sometimes you feel like a
rich nut.

1/2 ounce crème de noyaux 
1/2 ounce crème de cacao 
Champagne
1 almond
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer crème de noyaux and crème de cacao in a

cocktail glass.

 Fill with champagne.
 Add almond.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE SIDECAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: Careful with that crystal flute—dangerous curves ahead!

1/4 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce brandy
1/4 ounce Cointreau
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, brandy, and Cointreau.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE SOUR
description:
DESCRIPTION: Not as bitter as the name suggests. But what champagne
drink is?

1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 teaspoon sugar 
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour lemon juice and sugar in a sour glass.
 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with a lemon slice or a cherry.

title: TITLE:  CUCUMBER CHAMPAGNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sure to get you pickled.

1 ounce Benedictine
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Benedictine and lemon juice in a collins

glass with ice.

 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with lemon peel.

title:
TITLE:  SOYER AU CHAMPAGNE

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: “How about a nightcap on the company. My company.”

—James Bond, The Spy Who Loved Me

1 tablespoon vanilla ice cream
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
1/4 ounce orange curacao 
1/4 ounce brandy
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put vanilla ice cream in a chilled champagne glass.
 Add maraschino liqueur, curacao, and brandy.
 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

title:
TITLE:  WALSH CHAMPAGNE

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mrs. Walsh  never  touches  champagne. Unless  she’s
thirsty.

1 teaspoon sugar
1 mint sprig
1 lemon twist
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build sugar, mint sprig, and lemon twist in a

collins glass with ice.
 Fill with champagne.
 Float a cherry on top.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE COMFORT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Silver  screen  icon  Bette  Davis  nailed  it  when  she  said:
“There comes a time in every woman’s life when the only
thing that helps is a glass of champagne.”

Splash of Southern Comfort
2 dashes Angostura bitters
Champagne
Peach slice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Southern Comfort and bitters in a champagne

glass.

 Fill with champagne.
 Add a peach slice.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE ISLAND
description:
DESCRIPTION: Where fantasies really do come true. The plane! The plane!

Splash of orange curacao
2 dashes Angostura bitters
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour curacao and bitters into a chilled cocktail

glass.

 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with a twist of lemon.

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE 
GREENBAUM
description:
DESCRIPTION: Bartender’s gonna set you up with the Spirit in the Sky.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
3/4 ounce melon liqueur
Dash of Rose’s lime juice
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer vodka, melon liqueur, lime juice, and

champagne in a champagne flute.

title:
TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE
NAPOLEON
description:
DESCRIPTION: The General once said, “I drink champagne when I win, to
celebrate…and I drink champagne when I lose, to console
myself.”

3/4 ounce Mandarine Napoleon
Splash of orange juice
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Mandarine Napoleon into a champagne flute.
 Add orange juice.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  VIRTUAL REALITY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sometimes, even better than the real thing.

1/3 ounce Calvados
1 ounce gin
3/4 ounce grenadine
3/4 ounce lemon juice
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Calvados, gin, grenadine, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  PICK ME UP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Off the floor, that is.

1 ounce cognac
2/3 ounce orange juice
1/3 ounce grenadine
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour cognac, orange juice, and grenadine into a

champagne flute.

 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  KIR ROYALE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Founding Father Benjamin Franklin’s wise words: “He who
drinks fast pays slow.”

6 ounces champagne
Splash of crème de cassis
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour champagne into champagne flute.
 Add splash of crème de cassis.

title: TITLE:  KIR IMPERIAL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Purple, the color of royalty.

3/4 ounce raspberry liqueur
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour raspberry liqueur in champagne flute.
 Fill with champagne.

 CHAMPS-ELYSEES

Puts extra sparkle in the City of Lights.

2/3 ounce Cointreau
2/3 ounce strawberry liqueur
Chilled champagne

 Pour Cointreau and strawberry liqueur into a

champagne flute.

 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with small strawberry.

title: TITLE:  CHAMPAGNE SUGARPOP
description:
DESCRIPTION: “Champagne is the only wine that leaves a woman beau-
tiful  after  drinking  it.” So  saith  Madame  de  Pompadour.
Don’t argue with her.

1 sugar cube
2 dashes Angostura bitters
1 ounce cognac
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Place sugar cube in a champagne flute.
 Add bitters and cognac.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  RITZ FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Dressed up like a million-dollar trouper? Accessorize with
this!

Dash of amaretto
Dash of blue curacao
Dash of lemon juice
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Add  the  dashes  of  amaretto, curacao, and  lemon
juice in a champagne flute.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  ROULETTE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Where she stops, nobody knows. Except the bartender.

1 ounce blue curacao
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour curacao into a champagne flute.
 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with a mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  POMME FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: An apple a day, you say? Just one? Perish the thought!

1/2 ounce vermouth 
1/2 ounce apple juice concentrate 
2 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth and apple juice concentrate.
 Shake.
 Strain into a champagne glass.
 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with an apple chip.

title: TITLE:  CHAM CHAM
description:
DESCRIPTION: Note the absence of “pagne” and “bord.” That’s not an acci-
dent.

5 ounces champagne
1/2 ounce Chambord 
Raspberries
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour champagne into a champagne glass.
 Add Chambord to taste.
 Float raspberries on top.

title: TITLE:  SLAMMER ROYALE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Aptly named.

6 ounces tequila
4 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila and champagne into a cocktail

shaker.

 Stir.
 Pour into shot glasses.
 Slam glasses on table to create fizz.
(Serves 5)

title: TITLE:  PUSH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hey barkeep–push another one of these my way.

1/2 ounce apricot brandy 
1/2 ounce amaretto 
3 ounces pineapple juice
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apricot brandy, amaretto, and pineapple juice.
 Stir.
 Strain into a collins glass with ice.
 Fill with champagne.
 Garnish with a lime wheel and cherry.

title: TITLE:  MONTE CARLO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Odds are you’ll like this one.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
3/4 ounce crème de menthe
3/4 ounce lemon juice
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de menthe, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  APPLE STRUDEL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tell Grandma you’re sneaking off to the kitchen for some
of this. She’ll be none the wiser.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
1/2 ounce honey liqueur 
1/2 ounce blackberry puree 
Dash of vanilla syrup
2 ounces apple juice
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, honey liqueur, blackberry puree,

vanilla syrup, and apple juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass with ice.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  LEMONHEAD
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sweet, fizzy, and tart, like your favorite candy in a glass.

1/2 fresh lemon
1 teaspoon powdered sugar 
1 teaspoon water
2 1/2 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Squeeze lemon into a chilled cocktail shaker.
 Add sugar and water to lemon.
 Stir.
 Pour into a cocktail glass.
 Fill cocktail glass with shaved ice.
 Add champagne.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  BORDEAUX BITTER
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sour mix, gin, white rum, tequila, Tia Maria,

and vodka into a zombie glass.

 Fill with champagne.

 BORDEAUX BITTER

The best of France and Italy, in the palm of your hand.

1 ounce Campari
Champagne 

 Pour Campari and champagne into deep-saucer

champagne glass.

 Stir.

title: TITLE:  DUBONNET FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: A splendid  combination  of  flavors, sure  to  liven  the
gathering.

1 ounce orange juice
2 ounces Dubonnet
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add orange juice and Dubonnet.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  CORPSE REVIVER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sure to jolt the most reticent party guest back to life.

2 dashes of grenadine 
2/3 ounce lemon juice
2/3 ounce orange juice
2/3 ounce brandy
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add grenadine, juices, and brandy.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  FONTANA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sip  on  this  while  basking  on  a  sun-drenched  Italian
piazza. Or just pretend you are.

1 ounce orange juice
1 ounce Campari
1/2 ounce Cointreau 
1/2 ounce Grand Marnier 
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add orange juice, Campari, Cointreau, and Grand

Marnier.

 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass.
 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with shredded lemon peel.

 FRENCH 90

“Gentlemen,
in  the  little  moment  that  remains  to  us
between  the  crisis  and  the  catastrophe, we  may  as  well
drink a glass of champagne.” —Paul Claudell, French play-
wright

2 ounces sour mix
1 ounce brandy
Champagne

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sour mix and brandy.
 Stir.
 Strain into a collins glass with ice.
 Fill with champagne.

title: TITLE:  LE PETIT FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: It’s not the size of the fizz that matters, it’s what you do
with it that counts.

1 ounce blue curacao
1/2 ounce vodka 
Champagne
Lime slice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pack a margarita glass with crushed ice.
 Pour blue curacao into the center of the glass.
 Add vodka.
 Top with champagne.
 Squeeze lime wedge on top and drop in.

title: TITLE:  SILVER REIGN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Although equally apt to make one dance, this drink should
not be confused with the Prince album of a slightly differ-
ent name.

1 1/3 ounces bourbon
1 ounce champagne
1 ounce Drambuie
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour bourbon, champagne, and Drambuie into an

old-fashioned glass with ice.

 Stir.

title: TITLE:  A GOOD NIGHT KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: If it’s done right, it lingers on the lips just a bit.

Drop of Angostura bitters
1 sugar cube
4 ounces champagne
Splash of Campari
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put one drop of bitters on a sugar cube.
 Drop into a champagne flute.
 Add champagne.
 Splash with Campari.

title: TITLE:  THE CAROLINA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Nothing  could  be  finer  than  to  drink  a  Carolina  in  the
morning. Or anytime.

2 ounces Strega
2 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Strega into a chilled wine glass.
 Add champagne.
 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  AMBROSIA
description:
DESCRIPTION: The drink of toga-wearing gods with expensive tastes.

1 ounce apple jack
1 ounce brandy
Dash of triple sec
Juice of 1 lemon
Chilled champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apple jack, brandy, triple sec, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with champagne.
 Stir lightly.

title: TITLE:  FRENCH PIRATE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Cheers  to  Jean  LaFitte, the  Gentleman  Pirate  of  New
Orleans! 

1/2 ounce orange curacao 
1 ounce dark rum
Champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour curacao into champagne flute.
 Add rum.
 Top with champagne.

title: TITLE:  ORIGINAL SIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Harder to resist than that first bite of the apple.

3/4 ounce triple sec
1 1/2 ounces brandy 
1 1/2 ounces cherry liqueur 
Splash of sour mix
Dash of grenadine
6 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a hurricane glass with crushed ice.
 Add triple sec, brandy, cherry liqueur, sour mix,

and grenadine.

 Stir.
 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with orange, lemon, and lime slices.

title: TITLE:  ORIGINAL MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Simple, classic, elegant. Your  dad  definitely  wants  one.
Make it a double.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
Dry vermouth to taste
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  VESPER MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fear  not, noble  churchgoer—this  is  not  a  mischievous
addition to your church potluck, but a libation that pays
homage  to  James  Bond’s  leggy  love  interest  in  Casino
Royale.

3 ounces gin
1 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce Lillet blonde
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vodka, and Lillet blonde.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a slice of lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  VODKA MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink  of  choice  for  a  certain  British  secret  agent. Order
this, and you have a license to swill.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
Dash dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  ALGONQUIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Best enjoyed while seated at a round table, arguing litera-
ture with your crowd’s Dorothy Parker.

1 1/2 ounces whiskey 
1 ounce dry vermouth to taste 
1 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice
 Add whiskey, vermouth, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title:
TITLE:  BLACK AND WHITE

MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  perfect  accompaniment  for  the  man  who  prefers  a
martini that matches his tuxedo.

3 ounces vanilla-flavored vodka 
1 ounce crème de cacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and crème de cacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with black and white licorice candies.

title: TITLE:  CABARET MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mix  them  up, pop  in  the  Liza  video, practice  your  Fosse
moves. Tuxedo tap pants? A must.

3 ounces gin 
1 1/2 ounces red Dubonnet 
4 dashes Angostura bitters 
4 dashes Pernod
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Dubonnet, bitters, and Pernod.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lime twist.

title: TITLE:  COLONY CLUB MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Perfect for the hidden British expatriate in all of us.

3 ounces gin 
1 teaspoon Pernod 
4 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Pernod, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange twist.

title: TITLE:  DEEP SEA MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Passing this one up would be unfathomable. Enjoy with a
viewing of Jaws or, if you’re parental, the 500th viewing of
Finding Nemo.

3 ounces gin 
1 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 teaspoon Pernod 
Dash orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, Pernod, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  DUSTY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ideal for long walks with the son of a preacher man.

2 ounces gin 
Dash dry vermouth 
Scotch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with an ice cube.
 Add gin and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with

scotch.

 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title:
TITLE:  FARE THEE WELL 

MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A nice touch for long, lingering goodbyes with your para-
mour. Mix well, and he might have to stay longer.

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
Dash Cointreau
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, and Cointreau.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  IMPERIAL MARTINI
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and vermouth with cracked ice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a martini cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive.

 IMPERIAL MARTINI

Drink this and watch a magic crown appear above your
head. Really! 

3 ounces gin
1 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 teaspoon maraschino liqueur 
4 dashes Angostura bitters 

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and bit-ters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  HOT AND DIRTY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ladies—when ordering this one, add a low, husky purr to
your voice. Shrinks your bar tab instantly.

3 ounces pepper vodka
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1 teaspoon olive brine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, vermouth, and olive brine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive stuffed with pickled

jalapeno pepper.

title: TITLE:  LONDON MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: I do say, old bean, let’s bend our elbows and toast Mother
England!  There’s  a  good  chap!  (Bowler  hats  sold  sepa-
rately.)

3 ounces gin
1/2 teaspoon maraschino liqueur 
4 dashes orange bitters 
1/2 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, maraschino liqueur, bitters, and sugar.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  LOW TIDE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Cape Cod in a martini glass. Who needs planes, trains, and
automobiles?

3 ounces vodka 
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1 teaspoon clam juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, vermouth, and clam juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive stuffed with smoked clam

and a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  OPAL MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A liquefied  birthstone  for  October  babies. Taste  this  and
you’ll wish for another when you blow out the candles.

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce triple sec 
1 ounce fresh orange juice
1/4 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice
 Add gin, triple sec, orange juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  PALL MALL MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Toss-off this fact to impress a date: the Pall Mall Martini is
named for a London thoroughfare in the St. James district,
home to Marlborough House. If your date asks a follow-up
question, make a toast and change the subject.

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1 teaspoon white crème de menthe 
Dash orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, crème de menthe, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  DEAN MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Rat Packers of the World, unite! Raise a toast to swingin’
daddy-o’s everywhere.

3 ounces vodka or gin (Bartender’s choice)
Splash red sweet vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka or gin and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange wheel.

title: TITLE:  SICILIAN MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Truly an offer he can’t refuse. Just don’t ask him about the
family business.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/4 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce dry Marsala
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and Marsala.
 Stir briskly.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Twist lemon over drink and drop into the glass.

title: TITLE:  RUDE COSMOPOLITAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: This  one  has  a  surprising  bite, as  if  Jose  Cuervo  took  a
wrong turn at Albuquerque and ended up in your glass.

1 1/4 ounces tequila
1/4 ounce Grand Marnier
Juice from whole lime
1 ounce cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, Grand Marnier, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel.

title: TITLE:  GOLF MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: So, this must explain golfer’s fashion choices.

4 ounces gin
1 ounce dry vermouth
4 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  VELVET BUNNY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Remember  your  favorite  stuffed  animal  from  childhood
while this warms you before bedtime.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
Dash banana liqueur 
Dash black sambuca
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, banana liqueur, and sambuca.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with banana slices.

title: TITLE:  PRINCESS MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: She’ll  feel  like  royalty  when  you  present  Her  Highness
with  this  libation. Make  it  a  double  and  she  just  might
knight you.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
Dash strawberry liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and strawberry liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Squeeze slice of orange over the glass and drop in.

title: TITLE:  NEW ORLEANS MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Iko, Iko! Shake off the workday voodoo with this taste of
the Big Easy.

3 ounces vanilla vodka
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce Pernod 
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, vermouth, Pernod, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  LEAP YEAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: This is The Official Drink of February 29th, but we urge
you to throw caution to the wind—make ’em on July 5th.
Or May 13th.

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1/2 ounce Grand Marnier 
1/4 teaspoon lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, Grand Marnier, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  PALM BEACH MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A favorite among wealthy Florida socialites.

3 ounces gin
1 teaspoon sweet vermouth 
2 ounces grapefruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and grapefruit juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  PARK AVENUE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: When Eva Gabor told Eddie Arnold, “Darling, I love you,
but give me Park Avenue,” she surely had this one in mind.
Mix, sip, and ponder what the commoners are doing today.

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and vermouths.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  WARSAW
description:
DESCRIPTION: Surely  the  preferred  choice  of  famous  Poles  like  Lech
Walesa and Count Pulaski.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1 ounce apple brandy
1 ounce sweet vermouth
1 teaspoon yellow Chartreuse
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apple brandy, vermouth, and Chartreuse.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  JOURNALIST
description:
DESCRIPTION: Stop the presses! This smooth libation will make even the
most reluctant source spill the beans.

2 ounces gin
1 teaspoon dry vermouth
1 teaspoon sweet vermouth
1 teaspoon triple sec
1 teaspoon lime juice
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, triple sec, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  ICEBERG
description:
DESCRIPTION: A nice  accompaniment  to  your  Titanic  viewing  parties.
Garnish with Kleenex.

2 ounces gin
Dash white crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and crème de menthe.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with fresh mint.

title: TITLE:  SMOKY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: They say smoke gets in your eyes, but this goes straight to
your head.

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
1 teaspoon scotch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and scotch.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  THIRD DEGREE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: For loosening the tongues of uncooperative suspects. Mix,
administer, repeat as needed.

3 ounces gin
1 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce Pernod
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and Pernod.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  BLENTON
description:
DESCRIPTION: As James Thurber said, “One martini is all right. Two are
too many, and three are not enough.”

1 1/2 ounces gin 
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  BLOODHOUND
description:
DESCRIPTION: Turn the tables on this canine detective—pursue doggedly.

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1/2 ounce strawberry liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, and strawberry liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Drop a whole strawberry into glass.

title: TITLE:  FINO MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: As Bob Hope said in The Cat and the Canary: “Let’s all
drink gin and make wry faces.”

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce fino sherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and sherry.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with olive or lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  FLYING DUTCHMAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Legend is that this drink’s namesake is a ghostly sea cap-
tain, doomed to sail the seas for all eternity. Can’t be all
bad. At  least  he’s  got  this  tasty  concoction  to  keep  him
company.

Curacao
2 ounces gin
1/4 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour enough curacao into prechilled cocktail glass

to coat sides.

 Twirl glass and coat with curacao.
 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into glass.

title: TITLE:  MARSALA MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Marsala—Italy’s  answer  to  sherry—makes  this  martini
an adventurous departure from the standard. Bongiorno!

3/4 ounce gin
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
3/4 ounce dry Marsala
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and Marsala.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Twist lemon above drink and drop in.

title: TITLE:  DUTCH MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Got a date who hates going Dutch? Change her mind with
these.

2 ounces Dutch genever gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Twist lemon above drink and drop in.

title: TITLE:  PERFECT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Once you taste one of these, you’ll quickly grasp the name.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and vermouths.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with olive or lemon.

title: TITLE:  PAISLEY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A blatant, and  highly  effective, attempt  to  attract  the
attention of thirsty hippies everywhere.

2 1/4 ounces gin
1/4 ounce dry vermouth
1 teaspoon scotch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and scotch.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  RACQUET CLUB MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: “Biff? Muffy? Shall I order us a round? Fabulous…”

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
2 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and bitters.
 Shake until outside of shaker is completely

frosted.

 Strain into a cold martini glass.

title: TITLE:  MORRO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Be like Little Orphan Annie and order “to.”

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce golden rum 
1/2 ounce lime juice 
1/2 ounce pineapple juice 
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, rum, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sugar-rimmed chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  POMPANO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  fact:  Pompano  racetrack  in  south  Florida  features
nighttime horse racing. Giddyup!

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1 ounce grapefruit juice
4 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, grapefruit juice, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail or old-fashioned

glass.

 Garnish with an orange slice.

 ST. LO

Named for the patron saint of the vertically challenged.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/2 ounce Calvados 
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
1 teaspoon sugar

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Calvados, lemon juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  PRINCETON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Adventurous  Ivy  Leaguers  will  enjoy  this  concoction. Sis
boom bah!

1 1/4 ounces gin
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  RED CLOUD
description:
DESCRIPTION: So named for the pleasant fog that envelops the drinker’s
brain.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/2 ounce apricot liqueur 
1/2 ounce lemon juice 
1 teaspoon grenadine
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apricot liqueur, lemon juice, grenadine,

and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  LAVA LAMP MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: An unusually tasty byproduct of “60s Night” at the coun-
try club.

Splash raspberry liqueur
Splash honey
3 ounces vodka
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Mix raspberry liqueur and honey in a shot glass.
 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka.
 Shake.
 Strain into a martini glass.
 Spoon in raspberry liqueur and honey mixture.

title: TITLE:  SECRET MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t tell anyone about this one. Keep the recipe to your-
self and indulge in covert actions.

3 ounces gin
1 ounce Lillet Blonde
2 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Lillet Blonde, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  MONTMARTRE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The ideal locale for consuming this drink? The tallest point
in Paris, of course.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1/2 ounce triple sec
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and triple sec.
 Shake.
 Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

title: TITLE:  MOULIN ROUGE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Can you make zees drink? Oui! Everybody can-can! 

1 1/2 ounces sloe gin 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
3 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sloe gin, vermouth, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  HELLFIRE CLUB MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Emma Peel surely downed one of these after escaping the
Hellfire Club’s sinister clutches.

1 1/2 ounces pepper vodka 
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pepper vodka and dry vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a jalapeno pepper and a dash of

cayenne pepper.

title: TITLE:  DIPLOMAT
description:
DESCRIPTION: The martini strong enough to solve the world’s problems.
Share liberally.

2 ounces dry vermouth
1 ounce sweet vermouth
2 dashes maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouths and maraschino liqueur.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel twist.

title: TITLE:  TRUFFLE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Raise  a  glass  to  toast  the  tireless  work  of  our  porcine
brethren, who  have  selflessly  sniffed  out  underground
truffle troves for generations.

3 1/2 ounces cognac 
Splash lime juice 
Splash Grand Marnier 
7 paper-thin slices black truffle
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add cognac, lime juice, and Grand Marnier and 2

slices of black truffle.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with remaining five slices of black truffle.

title: TITLE:  POMEGRANATE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Persephone, heroine of Greek mythology, was banished to
Hades  for  eating  an  other-worldly  pomegranate. Lucky
you—she took the fall, you get the drink.

2 ounces fresh squeezed pomegranate juice 
2 ounces vodka
1/4 ounce sugar syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pomegranate juice, vodka, and sugar syrup.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  COWBOY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A refreshing  respite  for  cowpunchers  both  urban  and
rural. Saddle up!

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
Dash sugar syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and sugar syrup.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a floating mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  COSMOPOLITAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: The drink that made Sex in the City chicks teeter in their
Jimmy Choos. Fruity and light, drink a few and get ready
to hear all about your friend’s Mr. Big.

2 ounces lemon-flavored vodka
1 ounce triple sec
1 ounce cranberry juice
1/2 ounce lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lime slice.

title: TITLE:  FLIRTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sure  to  make  you  think  the  bartender  is  cute  enough  to
deserve a wink or two.

1/2 ounce raspberry vodka 
1/2 ounce Cointreau 
Splash lime juice 
Splash pineapple juice 
Splash cranberry juice 
5 raspberries
Brut champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Muddle raspberries in bottom of slightly chilled

cocktail glass.

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, Cointreau, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Top with champagne.
 Garnish with a mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  WEMBLEY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Perhaps the reason soccer hooligans often riot at Wembley
is  that  the  bartender  has  run  out  of  this  tasty  treat?  A
promising theory.

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1 teaspoon apricot brandy
1 teaspoon Calvados
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, apricot brandy, and Calvados.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  NEWBURY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Like the British town and Boston street of the same name,
the Newbury is sweet, posh, and delicious. Perfect for the
parched Anglophile.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1 ounce sweet vermouth
1/4 teaspoon triple sec
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and triple sec.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  BLUE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: The perfect hand candy for the air traveler with a window
seat.

3 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce blue curacao 
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Half-fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, curacao, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  GIRLIE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Careful there, mister—order a “couple of girlies” too loudly,
and your barmates may eye you with suspicion. Proceed
with caution.

Splash dry vermouth 
4 ounces vodka
3 ounces chilled champagne
Dash maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Coat inside of martini glass with dry vermouth.
 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, champagne, and maraschino liqueur.
 Stir.
 Strain into the martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  SOHO
description:
DESCRIPTION: The decadent way to end a day of shopping and art gallery
exploration.

2 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce vanilla vodka 
1/2 ounce orange curacao 
Dash orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodkas, orange curacao, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a martini glass.
 Garnish with a flamed orange peel.

title:
TITLE:  LONG KISS GOODNIGHT

MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Like its namesake, this one is sweet and leaves you want-
ing more. Much more.

1/2 ounce vanilla vodka 
1 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce white crème de cacao 
Shaved white chocolate
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Freeze a martini glass with white chocolate on

rim.

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice
 Add vodkas and crème de cacao.
 Shake lightly.
 Strain into the glass.
 Garnish with a chocolate kiss.

title: TITLE:  BLUE LAGOON
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with vodka, maraschino

liqueur, and peach juice.

 Add ice.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

 BLUE LAGOON

So  you  weren’t  lucky  enough  to  be  shipwrecked  with  a
young Brooke Shields? Join the club. Drown your sorrows
while cursing the name of Christopher Atkins.

2 ounces vodka
1/4 ounce blue curacao
3 ounces pineapple juice 

 Fill cocktail shaker with vodka, curacao, and

pineapple juice.

 Add ice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  GIN AND SIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Want to really ruffle the petticoats of your teetotaling Aunt
Gladys? Offer her one of these aptly named combinations,
and  watch  her  scurry  for  the  safety  of  her  Prohibition
League meeting.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1 ounce orange juice
1 ounce lemon juice
1/2 teaspoon grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, juices, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title:
TITLE:  SPECIAL SWEET 

MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Make it for the girl in your life. Claim you invented it and
named it after her. We won’t tell.

Dash of orange bitters
1/2 ounce gin 
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bitters, gin, and vermouth.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  MEDIUM MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: If  Starbucks  was  a  bar, this  one  would  be  called  a
“Grande.”

1/4 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth 
1/3 ounce dry gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouths and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  PINK PUPPY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Roll over and fetch this one whenever possible. If you bring
me one, I promise to scratch your tummy.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
1 1/2 ounces gin 
4 1/2 ounces grapefruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, gin, and grapefruit juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  RAZMOPOLITAN
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, lemon juice, and lime cordial.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with twist of lemon and a cherry.

 RAZMOPOLITAN

It’s  the  raspberry  that  makes  this  drink  so  sinfully  deli-
cious. But don’t down too many and razz the patrons.

2 1/4 ounces raspberry vodka
1 1/8 ounces triple sec 
1 1/2 ounces cranberry juice 
3/4 ounce lime juice
1 teaspoon caster sugar

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, triple sec, juices, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Twist lime peel above glass and drop in.

title: TITLE:  SILVER BULLET
description:
DESCRIPTION: If  the  Lone  Ranger  ever  left  one  of  these  behind, Tonto
would have questioned the Masked Man’s sanity.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
Splash scotch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and scotch.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

(This  drink  may also  be  stirred  and  served  on  the
rocks.)

title: TITLE:  MARTINI NOIR
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink  this  at  the  beginning  of  a  beautiful  friendship,
preferably with a feisty—yet compliant—gun moll.

2 ounces vodka
1 ounce Chambord
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and Chambord.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  CREOLE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: My  great-uncle  Boudreaux  claims  that  this  drink  makes
him handsome, funny, and a really great dancer.

2 ounces gin
1/4 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with jalapeño pepper.

title: TITLE:  THE FIGGY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Get jiggy with the figgy.

2 ounces vodka
1/4 ounce fig vodka
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
1 ounce half and half
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodkas, maraschino liqueur, and cream into

cocktail shaker.

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Let stand for five seconds.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with dark chocolate kiss and a fig slice.

title: TITLE:  SAKETINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A few of these will have you singing like Aretha Franklin, to
the tune of “Respect.” “Saketini-saketini-saketini-saketini...”

1 1/2 ounces sake 
1 1/2 ounces gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sake and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title:
TITLE:  MILKY WAY MARTINI

FOR TWO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Bob had a problem. He was thirsty, AND he had missed
dessert. Milky Way Martini to the rescue! 

6 ounces vanilla vodka
1 Milky Way candy bar
1 tablespoon sweet chocolate shavings
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Slice Milky Way candy bar into pieces.
 Place candy bar slices in microwaveable bowl and

heat until melted.

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka.
 Shake.
 Spoon 1 teaspoon melted candy bar in bottom of

each chilled cocktail glasses.
 Strain vodka into the glasses.
 Garnish with chocolate shavings.

title:
TITLE:  CHOCOLATE ORANGE

DROP FOR TWO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Overheard near the ski lodge fireplace, “Baby, this drink is
just like you, sweet, but with a kick.”

3 ounces orange vodka
1 ounce chocolate vodka
1 ounce Cointreau
1 1/2 ounces white chocolate liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodkas, Cointreau, and white chocolate liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into two chilled martini glasses.
 Garnish with chocolate orange slices.

title:
TITLE:  WHITEOUT MARTINI

FOR TWO
description:
DESCRIPTION: No mistake here. Make this drink for your favorite secretary.

4 ounces vanilla vodka
1 ounce white crème de cacao 
2 ounces white chocolate liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka.
 Shake.
 Add white crème de cacao and white chocolate

liqueur.

 Swirl shaker for one minute.
 Rest shaker for one minute.
 Strain into two frounceen martini glasses.
 Dust with coconut flakes.

title: TITLE:  MINT PATTY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: All this great taste and fresh breath, too? What a country! 

3 ounces pepper vodka
2 ounces white crème de menthe
1 Starlight mint
1 ounce dark chocolate liqueur
1 tablespoon peppermint schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pepper vodka, crème de menthe, and

Starlight mint.

 Let shaker stand for one minute.
 Shake.
 Add dark chocolate liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into two chilled martini glasses.
 Top each glass with half of the peppermint

schnapps.

title: TITLE:  GIMLET LIMETINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Can’t get your date to pucker up? Order a couple of these,
and it’ll be next stop: Smoochville, Population: 2.

4 ounces key lime vodka
1/2 teaspoon dry vermouth
1 teaspoon bottled water
1 lime
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka.
 Stir.
 Add vermouth and water.
 Squeeze in half of lime.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with lime twist.

title: TITLE:  LEMON DROP MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Lemon  Drop, Lemon  Drop, Oh  Lemon-Lemon  Drop…easy
to make and the chicks dig it.

1 1/2 ounces citrus vodka 
1 teaspoon sugar
1/4 of a lemon
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Slice 1/4 lemon into wedges.
 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon wedges.
 Add vodka and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into sugar-rimmed chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  MELONTINI
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, Cointreau, lime juice, and cranberry

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

 MELONTINI

Livens  up  the  traditional  gin  martini  with  a  welcomed
fruity flavor.

2 ounces gin
Dash melon liqueur 

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and melon liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  UPTOWN GIN MARTINI
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, lemonade, and water.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

 UPTOWN GIN MARTINI

You  know  those  sharp-looking  guys  at  the  corner  table,
who  always  look  like  they  have  it  all  together?  This  is
what they’re drinking.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/8 ounce dry vermouth
1/4 ounce olive juice
Dash Angostura bitters 

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, olive juice, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  ROSE PETAL MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Big  Moe  behind  the  bar  will  not  make  you  one  of  these.
Don’t ask him.

2 ounces vodka
Dash rose water
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and rose water.
 Stir 10 times.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with rose petals.

title: TITLE:  GYPSY
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink so good, even nomads will stick around.

1 1/2 ounces sweet vermouth 
1 1/2 ounces gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth and gin.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with cherry.

title: TITLE:  AFTERBURNER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ahh...sweet mother alcohol with a healthy dose of Vitamin
C. Scurvy, begone! 

1 1/2 ounces triple sec 
3 ounces vodka
3/4 ounce grapefruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add triple sec, vodka, and grapefruit juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a strawberry slice.

title: TITLE:  BOUNTY MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Please pardon the reference to a paper towel slogan, but
this drink is indeed the “quicker picker upper.” Ouch.

1 1/2 ounces red vodka 
1 1/2 ounces vanilla vodka 
2 1/4 ounces cream of coconut
Dash sugar syrup 
Six drops orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Muddle vodkas, cream of coconut, sugar syrup,

and bitters in cocktail shaker.

 Add ice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with fresh strawberries.

title: TITLE:  EGG CUSTARD MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: One word: Flan-tastic!

3 ounces vodka
1 1/2 ounces Warnicks advocaat 
3/4 ounce vanilla vodka
3/4 ounce bourbon
1/8 ounce sugar syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, Warnicks advocaat, vanilla vodka,

bourbon, and sugar syrup.

 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  HIGH ROLLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: If  you  order  this  in  a  casino, the  pit  boss  comps  you  all
sorts of free stuff. Really. Give it a whirl.

1 1/2 ounces dry vermouth 
1 1/2 ounces gin 
3/4 ounce triple sec
3/4 ounce apricot brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth, gin, triple sec, and apricot brandy.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  JASMINE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Preferably served in a magic lamp on a flying carpet.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
3/4 Campari
3/4 ounce triple sec
Dash sugar syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Campari, triple sec, and sugar syrup.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  KNICKERBOCKER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hard to get much more old school than this one. Good any-
where, but especially in a dark, wood-paneled haunt.

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1/4 teaspoon sweet vermouth
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and vermouths.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  MANGOTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  libidinous  taste  of  mango  combined  with  the  spirit-
lifting effects of vodka.

1 1/2 ounces mango vodka 
3/4 ounce triple sec
Splash mango juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, triple sec, and mango juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a mango slice.

title: TITLE:  ORANGE COSMO
description:
DESCRIPTION: A flavorful burst that cries for a second round.

2 ounces vodka
1 ounce Grand Marnier
1/4 ounce lime juice
1 ounce cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, Grand Marnier, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel.

title:
TITLE:  PRINCE EDWARD 

MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: First cigars, now a martini. Are there any vices that Prince
Edward didn’t endorse? My kind of guy.

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce Drambuie
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and Drambuie.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title:
TITLE:  QUEEN ELIZABETH

MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Royally delicious. God Save The Queen! 

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
2 teaspoons Benedictine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and Benedictine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  CHOCOLATE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  perfect  gateway  drink  for  beginning  lushes. It’s  the
candy cigarette of the alcohol world.

1 1/2 ounces vodka 
3/4 ounce white crème de cacao
Cocoa powder
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and crème de cacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocoa powder-rimmed chilled martini

glass.

 Garnish with a chocolate kiss—tip up—in the

glass.

title: TITLE:  BLUE ANGEL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ever wonder why those Air Force stunt pilots defy death
for  your  viewing  pleasure?  It’s  because  they  get  to  sip
these little Top Guns when they return to the hangar.

1/2 ounce blue curacao
1/2 ounce parfait amour
1/2 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add curacao, parfait amour, brandy, lemon juice,

and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GOLDEN DREAM
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sip a few of these and slip into a fantastic sleep.

1 ounce Galliano
1/2 ounce triple sec
1 tablespoon orange juice
1 tablespoon light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Galliano, triple sec, orange juice, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BANANA SLIP
description:
DESCRIPTION: What would Freud say about this one?

1 1/2 ounces crème de banana
1 1/2 ounces Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer crème de banana and Irish Cream in a cor-dial glass.

 CRÈME DE CACAO

NIGHTCAP

Just what a nightcap should be: sweet, silky, and smooth.
Be sure to brush before turning in.

1/4 cup cream
2 teaspoons sugar
1 tablespoon crème de cacao
10 ounces milk
4 ounces crème de cacao
2 ounces brandy
3 tablespoons sugar
Powdered cocoa

 Beat cream until whipped.
 Stir in 2 teaspoons sugar and 1 tablespoon crème

de cacao.

 Store in refrigerator.
 Heat  milk, 4 ounces  crème  de  cacao, brandy, and

sugar until hot.

 Pour into 4 small goblets.
 Top  with  whipped  cream, sugar, and  crème  de

cacao mixture.

 Sprinkle cocoa on top.
(Serves 4)

title:
TITLE:  CHOCOLATE ORANGE

FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A sinful liquid bonbon to be indulged in slowly.

3/4 ounce crème de cacao
3/4 ounce orange juice
1 teaspoon Galliano
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour crème de cacao, orange juice, and Galliano

into cocktail shaker.

 Stir without ice.
 Pour over crushed ice in deep saucer champagne

glass.

title: TITLE:  FOXY LADY
description:
DESCRIPTION: A throwback  to  the  days  of  disco  balls, satin  hot  pants,
and glitter eyeshadow. Let’s pretend it’s 1976 again.

1 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add amaretto, crème de cacao, and heavy cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  FLYING GRASSHOPPER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Higher octane for high-performing grasshoppers.

3/4 ounce crème de menthe
3/4 ounce crème de cacao
3/4 ounce vodka
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de menthe, crème de cacao, and vodka.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  CAPRI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A magical concoction like the dreamy island that bears its
name.

3/4 ounce crème de cacao
3/4 ounce crème de banana
3/4 ounce light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, crème de banana, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  SUISSESSE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A popular drink in Switzerland and France. The Swiss and
French know what time it is. Suissesse time.

1 1/2 ounces Pernod
1/2 ounce anisette
1/4 ounce cream
1/2 ounce egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Pernod, anisette, cream, and egg white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  COFFEE GRAND

MARNIER
description:
DESCRIPTION: No better drink than this one to sip while prattling about
life’s little nuisances.

1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/2 ounce Grand Marnier
1/2 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour coffee liqueur, Grand Marnier, and orange

juice into cocktail shaker.

 Pour over crushed ice in deep saucer champagne

glass.

 Garnish with orange slice.

title: TITLE:  MIXED MOCHA FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: All  the  taste  of  coffee  with  all  the  discernment  of  full-
bodied liqueurs.

3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
1/4 ounce white crème de menthe
1/4 ounce crème de cacao
1/4 ounce triple sec
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour coffee liqueur, crème de menthe, crème de

cacao, and triple sec into cocktail shaker.

 Stir without ice.
 Fill sugar-rimmed deep saucer champagne glass

with crushed ice.

 Pour mixture over ice.

title: TITLE:  SAMBUCA FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mix two and slip into something silky. Enjoy a night full of
secrets.

1 ounce sambuca
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sambuca and coffee liqueur into cocktail

shaker.

 Stir without ice.
 Fill deep saucer champagne glass with crushed ice.
 Pour mixture over ice.

title: TITLE:  DUTCH VELVET
description:
DESCRIPTION: If the Dutch masters had partaken in this, they might have
discovered the beauty of velvet as a canvas.

1/2 ounce chocolate mint liqueur
1/2 ounce banana liqueur
2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add chocolate mint liqueur, banana liqueur, and

cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with shaved chocolate.

title: TITLE:  DUTCH COFFEE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t let the evening end without this one.

1 1/2 ounces Vandermint liqueur
Hot coffee
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Vandermint liqueur into a coffee mug.
 Add hot coffee.
 Top with whipped cream.

title: TITLE:  VELVET KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: A kiss is just a kiss unless it’s lined with velvet.

1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce banana liqueur
1/2 ounce pineapple juice
1 ounce heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, banana liqueur, pineapple juice, and

heavy cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

 MILLIONAIRE’S COFFEE

Rich, just  like  the  name  suggests. A  nightcap  for  high
rollers and those who can only dream.

1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce Grand Marnier
1/2 ounce Frangelico
Hot coffee

 Pour coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, Grand

Marnier, and Frangelico into a deep coffee mug.

 Add hot coffee.
 Top with whipped cream.

title: TITLE:  CADIZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: Cadiz, Spain is thought by many to be the oldest
city in Europe.

3/4 ounce sherry
3/4 ounce blackberry liqueur
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/2 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sherry, blackberry liqueur, triple sec, and

cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

title: TITLE:  PEACH MELBA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Dessert in a glass never tasted so good. Take a pass on the
cheesecake and indulge in this.

1 ounce peach schnapps
1/2 ounce black raspberry liqueur
3 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add peach schnapps, black raspberry liqueur, and

heavy cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.
 Garnish with a peach slice.

title: TITLE:  PANAMA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tastes  best  when  you’re  wearing  a  white  suit  and  a  big
straw hat.

1 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce light cream
1 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, cream, and brandy.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 LOVER’S KISS

Gentlemen: Check your shirt collars for tell-tale traces of
this sweet treat. Dead giveaway.

1/2 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce cherry brandy
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce cream

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add amaretto, cherry brandy, crème de cacao, and

cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a parfait glass.
 Top with whipped cream, chocolate shavings, and

a cherry.

title: TITLE:  BRANDY ALEXANDER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink  and  dessert, all  in  one  glass. The  best  of  the
Alexander family.

1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, brandy, and heavy cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 GARZA’S NIGHTCAP

Tossing and turning? Tiptoe into the kitchen and toss back
one of these hot milk treasures.

6 ounces milk
1 ounce coffee liqueur
1 teaspoon powdered sugar

 Heat milk on stove.
 Add sugar and coffee liqueur.
 Pour into a coffee mug.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  SHERRIED COFFEE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A touch of sherry never hurt anyone.

1 1/4 ounces sherry
1 1/4 ounces coffee liqueur
2 teaspoons cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sherry and coffee liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.
 Float cream on top.

title: TITLE:  COFFEE GRASSHOPPER
description:
DESCRIPTION: How Jiminy Cricket ends his day.

3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
3/4 ounce white crème de menthe
3/4 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add coffee liqueur, white crème de menthe, and

cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PINK ALMOND
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t reach for that pretty bowl of pastel almonds at the
next wedding reception. Choose this instead.

1/2 ounce crème de noyaux
1/2 ounce orgeat
1 ounce blended whiskey
1/2 ounce Kirsch
1/2 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de noyaux, orgeat, blended whiskey,

Kirsch, and lemon juice.

 Shake.
 Strain over ice in a chilled old-fashioned glass.
 Garnish with lemon slice.

title: TITLE:  MOCHA MINT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Like that ice cream you loved as a child—plus the added
bonus that comes with adulthood.

3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
3/4 ounce crème de menthe
3/4 ounce crème de cacao
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add coffee liqueur, crème de menthe, and crème

de cacao.

 Shake.
 Moisten cocktail glass rim with coffee liqueur.
 Dip rim in sugar.
 Strain mixture into glass.

title: TITLE:  COFFEE ALEXANDER
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour anisette, crème de menthe, crème de cacao,

and lemon juice into cocktail shaker.

 Stir without ice.
 Pour over crushed ice in deep saucer champagne

glass.

 COFFEE ALEXANDER

What the Alexander family drinks by moonlight.

1 ounce brandy
1 ounce coffee liqueur
1 ounce cream

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, coffee liqueur, and cream.
 Shake.
 Pour into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PEPPERMINT TWIST
description:
DESCRIPTION: Let’s twist again like we did last winter.

1 1/2 ounces peppermint schnapps
1/2 ounce white crème de cacao
3 scoops vanilla ice cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour peppermint schnapps, crème de cacao, and

vanilla ice cream into blender.

 Mix low speed.
 Pour into large parfait glass.
 Garnish with mint sprig and peppermint candy

stick.

 Serve with a straw.

title: TITLE:  QUAALUDE
description:
DESCRIPTION: While  under  its  influence, please  refrain  from  driving  or
operating heavy machinery.

1 ounce vodka
1 ounce Frangelico
1 ounce coffee liqueur
Splash milk
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Add vodka, Frangelico, coffee liqueur, and milk.

title: TITLE:  TOASTED ALMOND
description:
DESCRIPTION: Finally:  A  signature  drink  for  drunken  nut  jobs  every-
where.

1 1/2 ounces coffee liqueur
1 ounce amaretto
1 1/2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Add coffee liqueur, amaretto, and cream.

title: TITLE:  BANANA BANSHEE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Much less frightening than its name would indicate. Noth-
ing spooky here, but you just might scream...with delight.

1 ounce crème de banana
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de banana, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  DIANA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ideal  for  bringing  out  your  inner  princess, or  huntress  if
you prefer mythology.

1 1/2 ounces white crème de menthe
3/4 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour crème de menthe into an old-fashioned glass.
 Add crushed ice.
 Float brandy on top.

title: TITLE:  FRENCH DREAM
description:
DESCRIPTION: Pepé Le Pew’s go-to drink. For when he is playing hard to
get, no?

1 1/2 ounces Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce raspberry liqueur
2 ounces half and half
4 ounces ice cubes
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Irish cream liqueur, raspberry liqueur, half

and half, and ice cubes into a blender.

 Blend at low speed for 30 seconds.
 Pour into a parfait glass.

title: TITLE:  IRISH COFFEE
description:
DESCRIPTION: No blarney—this is an outstanding end to the evening.

1 1/2 ounces Irish whiskey
Hot coffee
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Irish whiskey into coffee mug.
 Add hot coffee.
 Top with whipped cream, if desired.

title: TITLE:  IRISH ANGEL
description:
DESCRIPTION: She  had  wings  of  green  and  flaming  red  hair  when  she
appeared  to  Paddy  and  whispered  sweet  nothings  in  his
ear.

3/4 ounce Irish whiskey
1/4 ounce crème de cacao
1/4 ounce white crème de menthe
1 1/2 ounces heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, crème de cacao, crème de menthe,

and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or in old-fashioned glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  IRISH NIGHTCAP
description:
DESCRIPTION: When in Ireland, do as the Irish do.

4 ounces hot milk
1 1/2 ounces Irish whiskey
1 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour hot milk into coffee mug.
 Add whiskey and sugar.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  BANK HOLIDAY
description:
DESCRIPTION: What the Brits drink on their holidays from work.

1/2 ounce bourbon 
1/2 ounce Galliano 
1/2 ounce crème de cacao 
1/2 ounce brandy 
1 to 2 ounces sweet cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, Galliano, crème de cacao, brandy,

and sweet cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PRINCESS MARY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Before bedtime, don a tiara and sip one of these.

1/3 ounce dry gin
1/3 ounce crème de cacao
1/3 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  GOLDEN CADILLAC
description:
DESCRIPTION: Boss  Lady  likes  them  pink, but  you’ll  like  them  golden.
Crush velvet seats, indeed.

1 ounce Galliano
1 ounce white crème de cacao
2 ounces heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Galliano, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  RUSSIAN BEAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: For  decades, smaller  countries  cowered  in  the  Russian
Bear’s  shadow. Feel  the  power  of  the  Motherland  in  the
palm of your hand.

1 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  COFFEE COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: For sultry summer nights that are too good to end.

4 ounces cold coffee
1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 ounce cream
1 ounce coffee liqueur
1 teaspoon sugar
1 small scoop coffee ice cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add coffee, vodka, cream, coffee liqueur, and

sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a tall glass.
 Add coffee ice cream.

title: TITLE:  BANANA RUM FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Add beach chair, sand, setting sun on the horizon. Repeat
as needed.

1/2 ounce banana liqueur
1/2 ounce light rum
1/2 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour banana liqueur, rum, and orange juice into

cocktail shaker.
 Stir without ice.
 Pour over crushed ice in deep saucer champagne

glass.

title:
TITLE:  BANANA APRICOT

FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Nobody says no to a second one of these, even when it’s
time to say good night.

3/4 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce apricot-flavored brandy
1/4 ounce crème de noyaux
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour brandies and crème de noyaux into cocktail

shaker.

 Stir without ice.
 Pour over crushed ice in deep saucer champagne

glass.

title:
TITLE:  CHARTREUSE COGNAC

FRAPPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A glowing mix of herbal flavors and a strong brandy base.

3/4 ounce yellow Chartreuse
3/4 ounce cognac
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Chartreuse and cognac into cocktail shaker.
 Stir without ice.
 Pour over crushed ice in deep saucer champagne

glass.

title: TITLE:  PINK SQUIRREL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t  miss  out  on  this  one—it’ll  have  you  hopping  from
tree to tree.

1 ounce crème de noyaux
1 ounce crème de cacao
3/4 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de noyaux, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glasses.

title: TITLE:  RUSSIAN COFFEE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Warm enough to ward off even the worst Siberian winter
nights.

3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
3/4 ounce vodka
3/4 ounce cream
1/3 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour coffee liqueur, vodka, cream, and crushed

ice into a blender.

 Blend low for 15 seconds.
 Pour into chilled deep saucer champagne glass.

title: TITLE:  DULCET
description:
DESCRIPTION: dul cet [adj] : Sweet to the taste, pleasing to the ear. Never
was a truer definition written.

1 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce curacao
1/2 ounce anisette
1/2 ounce apricot liqueur
1 teaspoon lemon juice
