1/2 brandied apricot
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, curacao, anisette, apricot liqueur, and

lemon juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into chilled old-fashioned glass on ice.
 Drop in brandied apricot half.

title: TITLE:  GRASSHOPPER
description:
DESCRIPTION: In  Aesop’s  fable, the  Grasshopper  languished  while  the
busy  Ant  prepared  for  winter. Little  did  the  Ant  know
about the Grasshopper’s secret hooch stash.

3/4 ounce crème de cacao
3/4 ounce crème de menthe
3/4 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, crème de menthe, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CREAM PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: This will keep you awake for that late-night argument and
then dull the pain.

2 ounces cognac
1/4 teaspoon sugar
2 ounces cream
1/4 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce dark rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add cognac, sugar, cream, lemon juice, and rum.
 Shake.
 Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  CALM VOYAGE
description:
DESCRIPTION: For the traveler who knows no timetable.

1/2 ounce Galliano
1/2 ounce passion fruit syrup
2 teaspoons lemon juice
1/2 ounce light rum
1/2 egg 
1/3 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour  Galliano, passion  fruit  syrup, lemon  juice,

rum, egg half, and crushed ice into a blender.

 Blend at low speed for 15 seconds.
 Pour into a chilled deep saucer champagne glass.

 ST. LOUIS COCKTAIL

Fun  fact:  With  its  prominent  and  well-known  arch, St.
Louis is sometimes known as the “Gateway to the West.”
Wonder if travelers took this with them? 

1/2 peach or apricot
Southern Comfort

 Place peach or apricot into deep saucer champagne

glass.

 Add finely cracked ice.
 Fill with Southern Comfort.
 Serve with a spoon.

title: TITLE:  CAPPUCCINO COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ideal to mix and place on the bedside table, to sip while
enjoying a good read.

3/4 ounce coffee flavored brandy
3/4 ounce vodka
1 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, vodka, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MOONLIGHT MADNESS
description:
DESCRIPTION: What  the  “Werewolves  of  London” drink  with  their  big
bowls of beef chow mein.

1/2 ounce Frangelico
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce vodka
Splash of cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Frangelico, crème de cacao, vodka, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SAVOY HOTEL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Really gets you stomping.

1/3 ounce dark crème de cacao
1/3 ounce Benedictine
1/3 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer dark crème de cacao, Benedictine, and

brandy into a pousse café glass.

title: TITLE:  KING ALPHONSE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ahhh...it’s good to be the king!

2 ounces coffee liqueur
1 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour coffee liqueur into a cordial glass.
 Float cream on top.

—OR—

 Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Add coffee liqueur.
 Top with cream.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  KREMLIN COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A favorite of KGB agents after a long day of wiretapping.

1 ounce vodka
1 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  PANDA BEAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: When  the  zookeeper  isn’t  looking, the  pandas  love  to
sneak a few of these.

1 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce dark crème de cacao
5 ounces vanilla ice cream
1/4 ounce chocolate syrup
2 to 3 dashes vanilla extract
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour amaretto, crème de cacao, dark crème de
cacao, vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup, and
vanilla extract into a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a chilled goblet.

title: TITLE:  VELVET HAMMER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Smooth but hard-hitting. A sinful delight disguised as an
innocent milk shake.

1 tablespoon crème de cacao
1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 tablespoon light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, vodka, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CRICKET
description:
DESCRIPTION: When administered properly, it will make you (and your
paramour) rub your legs together. Chirping optional.

1 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce crème de menthe
1 ounce cream
Dash of brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, crème de menthe, cream,

and brandy.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.

title: TITLE:  GOOD AND PLENTY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink some Now, save some for Later. If you can stand it.

3/4 ounce ouzo
3/4 ounce anisette

Pour ouzo and anisette into a brandy snifter.

454. B & B

As comfortable as a good bed & breakfast, with none of
the curious breakfast companions.

1/2 ounce Benedictine
1/2 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Benedictine into a cordial glass.
 Float brandy on top.

title: TITLE:  DIRTY MOTHER
description:
DESCRIPTION: She was filthy, but she told a mean bedtime story.

1 1/2 ounces brandy
3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Add brandy and coffee liqueur.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  ALMOND JOY
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, peppermint schnapps, crème de

cacao, lemon juice, and sugar.

 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass.
 Add ice.
 Fill with club soda.
 Garnish with mint sprig.

 ALMOND JOY

Sometimes  you  feel  like  a  nut…and  sometimes  you  feel
like one of these.

1 ounce cream of coconut
1 ounce amaretto
1 ounce dark crème de cacao
2 ounces cream

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème of coconut, amaretto, dark crème de

cacao, and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

title: TITLE:  AUNT JEMIMA
description:
DESCRIPTION: All the sweetness of syrup without pancakes.

1/2 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce crème de cacao 
1/2 ounce Benedictine
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Layer ingredients in a pony glass.

title: TITLE:  BIG BLUE SKY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Best consumed while flat on one’s back, cloud-gazing.

1/2 ounce light rum
1/2 ounce blue curacao
1/2 ounce cream of coconut
2 ounces pineapple juice
3 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rum, curacao, cream of coconut, pineapple

juice, and crushed ice into a blender.

 Blend at low speed for 30 seconds or until smooth.
 Pour into goblet.

title: TITLE:  SICILIAN KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Receiving a kiss from a Sicilian has been a death sentence
in  many  a  gangster  movie. This  smooch  is  much  less
deadly.

1 1/2 ounces Southern Comfort
1/2 ounce amaretto
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Add Southern Comfort and amaretto.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  BLACK LACE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Delicate with a subtle hint of frill.

1/2 of a lemon
2 ounces sambuca
1 ounce crème de banana
1 ounce peach schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Squeeze lemon into shaker.
 Add sambuca, crème de banana, and peach

schnapps.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BLACK MONK
description:
DESCRIPTION: Communion never tasted so good.

1 1/4 ounce B&B
Coffee
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a sugar-rimmed coffee mug with B&B and

coffee.

 Top with whipped cream.

 CAFÉ ALPINE

No need to travel all the way to the ski slopes to enjoy this
minty mug—heat one up anytime.

Coffee
1 ounce peppermint schnapps

 Pour coffee into a mug.
 Add peppermint schnapps.
 Top with whipped cream.

title: TITLE:  HOT NUTTY IRISHMAN
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Soak sugar cube in a spoon with brandy.
 Light the sugar cube aflame.
 When flame dies, drop brandied cube into coffee.

 HOT NUTTY IRISHMAN

Quite  possibly  one  of  the  greatest  drink  names  ever. It’s
also delicious.

3/4 ounce Irish cream liqueur
3/4 ounce Frangelico
3/4 ounce coffee

 Fill coffee mug with Irish cream liqueur,

Frangelico, and coffee.

 Top with whipped cream.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  GODMOTHER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Finish this by midnight or turn into a pumpkin.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
3/4 ounce amaretto
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Pour vodka and amaretto.

title: TITLE:  CARA SPOSA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: “Cara sposa” is an aria from Handel’s Rinaldo,
in  which  the  title  character  laments  the  kidnapping  of  a
lost love.

1 ounce coffee liqueur
1 ounce curacao
1/2 ounce cream
1/3 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour coffee liqueur, curacao, cream, and crushed

ice into a blender.

 Blend at low speed for 15 to 30 seconds or until

smooth.

 Pour into a chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.

title: TITLE:  ORANGE COMFORT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Who knew Southern Comfort could taste any better?

1/2 ounce Southern Comfort
1/2 ounce anisette
3/4 ounce orange juice
1/2 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Southern comfort, anisette, orange juice, and

lemon juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  ORACABESSA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Named for a Jamaican city, this strong beverage is a deli-
cious night treat.

1 ounce banana liqueur
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce 151-proof rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add banana liqueur, lemon juice, and rum.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
 Garnish with banana and lemon slices.

title: TITLE:  BIRD OF PARADISE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: There are more than forty different members of
this  avian  family, thirty-five  of  which  reside  in  New
Guinea.

3/4 ounce tequila
3/4 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce amaretto
1 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, crème de cacao, amaretto, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PARISIAN BLONDE
description:
DESCRIPTION: As intoxicating as Brigitte Bardot. As alluring as Cather-
ine Deneuve.

1 ounce light rum
3/4 ounce curacao
3/4 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add light rum, curacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BLUE CARNATION
description:
DESCRIPTION: The only drink that looks good on a lapel.

1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce blue curacao
2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, blue curacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CLIMAX
description:
DESCRIPTION: When the rest of the evening goes badly, at least there’s
this to look forward to.

1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce banana liqueur
1 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, amaretto, triple sec, vodka,

banana liqueur, and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  FESTIVAL
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de noyaux, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a tulip glass.
 Garnish with a strawberry.

 FESTIVAL

You get all the fun of a carnival, without being hassled by
the carnies.

3/4 ounce dark crème de cacao
1 tablespoon apricot brandy
1 teaspoon grenadine
3/4 ounce heavy cream

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add dark crème de cacao, apricot brandy, grena-dine, and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  XYLOPHONE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Finally: The reward for all those summers at band camp.

1 ounce tequila
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce sugar syrup
1 ounce cream
3 ounces of ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila, crème de cacao, sugar syrup, cream,

and ice into a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into goblet.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  EVERGLADES SPECIAL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Bonus: Keeps the gators away.

1 ounce light rum
1 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce light cream
2 teaspoons coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, crème de cacao, cream, and coffee

liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Add ice.

title: TITLE:  EL MAGNIFICO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Magnificent, indeed. Mix it for your favorite Italian lover.

1 ounce vanilla liqueur
1 ounce curacao
1 ounce cream
3 ounces cracked ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vanilla liqueur, curacao, cream, and ice into

a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  WHITE ELEPHANT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  fact:  In  the  story  of  Buddha, the  white  elephant  is
associated with fertility and knowledge.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ITALIAN DELIGHT
description:
DESCRIPTION: A real Roman treasure.

1 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce orange juice
1 1/2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add amaretto, orange juice, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled stemmed glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  WHITE HEART
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mix this one up for the icy hearted date du jour, and see
your fortunes improve dramatically.

1/2 ounce sambuca
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
2 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sambuca, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled stemmed glass.

title: TITLE:  FROSTBITE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Like a childhood snowstorm for adults—sweet and nippy,
all the way out to your fingers and toes.

11/2 ounces white tequila
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
2 to 3 dashes blue curacao
2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add white tequila, crème de cacao, blue curacao,

and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a frosted sour glass.
 Add ice.

title: TITLE:  GOLDEN SLIPPER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Make plenty for Cinderella and her crazy stepsisters.

1 ounce apricot brandy
1 ounce yellow Chartreuse
1 egg yolk
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apricot brandy, Chartreuse, and egg yolk.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  RENAISSANCE 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: So you’re a Renaissance Man, eh? Mix me one of these and
prove it.

1/2 ounce gin
1/2 ounce dry sherry
1 tablespoon cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, sherry, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Dust with nutmeg

 WIDOW’S DREAM

For  those  still  in  mourning, this  makes  for  some  solid
woolgathering.

2 ounces Benedictine
1 ounce heavy cream
1 egg

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Benedictine, heavy cream, and egg.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  NIGHTCAP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Bedtime never tasted so relaxing.

3/4 ounce brandy
3/4 ounce curacao 
3/4 ounce anisette
1 egg yolk
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, curacao, anisette, and egg yolk.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MAI TAI
description:
DESCRIPTION: The queen of tropical libations.

1 ounce dark rum
Dash of orgeat
1 1/2 ounces sour mix
1/2 ounce heavy rum
Squeeze of lime
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a large old-fashioned glass with crushed ice.
 Add a cherry and a slice of pineapple.
 Pour dark rum, orgeat, and sour mix.
 Stir.
 Float heavy rum on top.
 Squeeze lime on top.
 Garnish with mint sprig and an orchid, if available.

title: TITLE:  FROZEN DAIQUIRI
description:
DESCRIPTION: A few of these on a tropical island and Stella won’t be the
only one getting her groove back.

1/2 ounce fresh lime juice
1 teaspoon sugar
2 ounces light rum
1/2 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour lime juice, sugar, rum, and ice into a blender.
 Blend for 15 seconds on low speed.
 Pour into chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.

Note: This drink can be made to taste more “rummy”
by floating a layer of rum on top.

title: TITLE:  BLUE HAWAII
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add coconut milk, pineapple juice, and rum.
 Shake.
 Strain into a blender half-filled with crushed ice.
 Blend.
 Serve in a hurricane glass.
 Garnish with a pineapple spear, a cherry and/or

shredded coconut.

 BLUE HAWAII

Where dreams come true, so sayeth the King.

1 ounce light rum
1 ounce pineapple juice
1 ounce sour mix
Dash cream
Dash blue curacao
3 ounces crushed ice

 Pour rum, pineapple juice, sour mix, cream, and

curacao into a blender.

 Blend.
 Garnish with tropical fruit.

title: TITLE:  BARRACUDA BITE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Call this one the tiger of the sea.

1 1/2 ounces 150-proof rum
1 1/2 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce lime juice
1 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Combine rum, vodka, lime juice, and grenadine in

a cocktail shaker.

 Shake lightly.
 Pour into a zombie glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  CHI CHI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink three. Say Aloha, Gracie.

2 ounces pineapple juice
2 ounces coconut cream
1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 teaspoon shredded coconut
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pineapple juice, coconut cream, vodka, and

shredded coconut.

 Shake.
 Strain into a tall glass.
 Garnish with pineapple spear and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  FIJI BLACKOUT
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink built for two to sip as Tiki torches flicker. Dare to
drink it solo and you will certainly experience a blackout
of your own.

1 1/2 ounces lime juice
1 ounce light maple syrup
4 ounces dark rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour lime juice, maple syrup, and rum into cock-tail shaker.

 Stir.
 Pour in two champagne glasses filled with finely

crushed ice.

(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  HULA MILKMAID
description:
DESCRIPTION: Eight hula maids a’shakin...and a monkey in a palm tree.

1 teaspoon sugar
1 1/2 ounces brandy, whiskey, or rum
8 ounces milk
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with scoop of ice.
 Add sugar, liquor of choice, and milk.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled highball glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  HULA HULA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Even the straitlaced can’t refuse a little grass skirt action
after one of these delectable devils.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1 ounce orange juice
1/4 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, orange juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  HAWAIIAN TORCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Take a sip or two and you’ll limbo like a limber Lucy.

1 teaspoon pineapple juice
1 teaspoon lemon juice
2 ounces whiskey
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour juices and whiskey into a highball glass with

a few ice cubes.

 Stir.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  SOUTH SEAS SLEEPER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Throw away the relaxation compact discs and tune in to a
most ambient delight.

1 ounce dark rum
2 ounces light rum
1/2 teaspoon honey
Juice of one lime
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rums, honey, and lime.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ZOMBIE SLEEPWALKER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Legend has it that naval men would drink these and then
proceed to stumble to the plank after lights out. The result:
honorable discharge.

1 ounce dark rum
1 ounce light rum
1 ounce Jamaican rum
4 dashes cherry brandy
4 dashes apricot brandy
Dash papaya juice
Juice of 1/2 lime
1/2 ounce 150-proof rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all rums, brandies, papaya, and lime juices

in a zombie glass with cracked ice.

 Top with 150-proof rum.
 Stir.
 Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.
 Serve with a long straw.

title:
TITLE:  COCONUT CANNON

BALL
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  drink  of  choice  for  tropical  monkeys  before  a  cross-
country jungle race.

2 ounces gin or vodka
2 ounces coconut milk
1 ounce lemon juice
1 teaspoon sugar
Dash curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Mix liquor of choice, coconut milk, lemon juice,

sugar, and curacao in a cocktail shaker.

 Shake.
 Serve in a coconut shell.

title: TITLE:  SCORPION
description:
DESCRIPTION: An enchantingly potent venom.

1 ounce light rum
1 ounce brandy
1 ounce sour mix
3 ounces orange juice
Dash Angostura bitters
2 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Mix light rum, brandy, sour mix, orange juice, and

bitters in a blender filled with crushed ice.

 Blend.
 Serve into a collins glass.

title: TITLE:  HAWAIIAN CARESS
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, whiskey, crème de menthe, and lemon.
 Shake well.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

 HAWAIIAN CARESS 

A gentle touch after a long day of sightseeing on Maui.

2 ounces Bacardi rum
2 ounces pineapple juice
5 drops maraschino liqueur
1 teaspoon grenadine

 Pour rum, pineapple juice, maraschino liqueur,

and grenadine in a cocktail shaker.

 Stir.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with crushed

ice.

title: TITLE:  YO HO HO
description:
DESCRIPTION: And a bottle of rum for the pirate with the black eye patch,
please.

Juice of 1/2 lime
1 1/2 ounces light rum
Cola soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Squeeze lime juice into a zombie glass.
 Drop in lime.
 Add rum.
 Add three ice cubes.
 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  PASSIONATE RUMMY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: The earliest form of gin rummy can be traced to
the  mid-nineteenth  century  Mexican  card  game  called
Conquian. Don’t drink too many of these while playing or
you just might lose your hand…

4 1/2 ounces passion fruit nectar
1 1/2 ounces lemon juice
1 1/2 ounce sugar syrup
7 1/2 ounces light rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour passion fruit nectar, lemon juice, sugar

syrup, and light rum in a cocktail shaker.

 Stir well until blended.
 Pour over cracked ices in deep-saucer champagne

glasses.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  LEI OF THE HOUR
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour brandy in a cordial glass.
 Float cream on top.

 LEI OF THE HOUR

And the award goes to: insert your best lover’s name here.

1 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce brandy
1 ounce cream

 Layer in above order in a cordial glass.

 MERMAID’S DELIGHT

The little mermaid’s drink of choice on her 21st birthday.

1 ounce crème de menthe
1 ounce cream

 Layer in above order in a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  SOUTH SEA SIREN
description:
DESCRIPTION: “Come to me, and indulge in my nightcap,” whispers the
South Sea Siren. Don’t be shy. Dive in.

1 ounce crème de menthe
1 ounce crème de cacao
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Layer in above order in a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  WHISPERING REEF
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hey, Fred. Did  that  reef  just  whisper  to  me?  No, Barney.
That’s your conscience telling you to lay off the gin.

1 ounce dry gin
1 ounce crème de menthe
2 ounces pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with cracked ice.
 Add gin, crème de menthe, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MISTY ISLAND
description:
DESCRIPTION: The scene of many a torrid romance. Drink and frolic.

Juice of 1/2 lemon
1 teaspoon sugar
1 1/2 ounces dry gin
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with cracked ice.
 Add lemon, sugar, and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled highball glass.
 Fill with cold club soda.
 Stir.
 Garnish with mint sprigs.

title: TITLE:  BLUE DEVIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Just  because  it’s  blue  doesn’t  mean  it’s  gentle. This  devil
wears a disguise.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce blue curacao
1/2 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, curacao, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon slice.

title: TITLE:  BAHAMA MAMA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Forget  the  PTA!  This  drink  will  make  any  soccer  mom
want to sign up for hula classes.

1/2 ounce dark rum
1/2 ounce coconut liqueur
1/4 ounce 151-proof rum
1/4 ounce coffee liqueur
Juice of half lemon
4 ounces pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rums, liqueurs, and juices in a cocktail

shaker.

 Stir gently.
 Pour into a highball glass with cracked ice.

title: TITLE:  FOG CUTTER
description:
DESCRIPTION: A misnomer: This is hardly the cocktail to make you see
clearly.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce gin
1 ounce orange juice
3 tablespoon lemon juice
1 1/2 ounces orgeat syrup
1 teaspoon sweet sherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, brandy, gin, juices, and orgeat syrup.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass with ice.
 Top with sherry.

title: TITLE:  HAVANA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  perfect  accompaniment  for  that  cigar  smuggler. You
know who you are.

1 1/2 ounces pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon lemon juice
1/4 ounce light rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pineapple juice, lemon juice, and rum.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  CRYSTAL BLUE 

PERSUASION
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink for lazy days by the pool that will make life appear
exactly as desired.

1/2 ounce Hypnotiq 
1/2 ounce orange vodka 
1/2 ounce vanilla vodka
1/4 ounce blue curacao
2 to 3 ounces pineapple juice
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Hypnotiq, vodkas, curacao, and pineapple

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a blue sugar-rimmed chilled martini

glass.

 Garnish with an orange twist or a blue rock candy

swizzle stick.

*Created  by Stephanie  Caruthers, Trio’s, Little  Rock,
Ark.

title: TITLE:  HURRICANE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Blows in fast, leaves a deadly aftermath.

1 ounce dark rum
1 ounce light rum
1/2 ounce Galliano
3/4 ounce lime juice
1 ounce passion fruit syrup
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
1 1/2 ounces pineapple juice
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rums, Galliano, lime juice, passion fruit

syrup, juices, and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice.
 Garnish with tropical fruit.

title: TITLE:  MIAMI
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  consummate  companion  for  the  bling  bling  of  South
Beach.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce white crème de menthe
Dash of lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, white crème de menthe, and lemon

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PASSION DAIQUIRI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Brings out the passion in even the stoniest curmudgeon.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
Juice of 1 lime
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
1 tablespoon passion fruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, lime juice, powdered sugar, and passion

fruit juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  RUM RICKEY
description:
DESCRIPTION: If you don’t like this one, you’ve got some splainin’ to do.

Juice of 1/2 lime
1/2 ounces light rum
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour lime juice and rum in a highball glass with

ice.

 Fill with club soda.
 Stir.
 Garnish with lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  SANTIAGO COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Make  like  an  old  Chilean  bartender  and  share  this  with
guests.

1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
1/4 teaspoon grenadine
Juice of 1 lime
1 1/2 ounces light rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add powdered sugar, grenadine, lime juice, and

rum.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  TAHITI CLUB
description:
DESCRIPTION: Not to be confused with Club Med, but feel free to indulge
and disrobe.

2 ounces light rum
1 tablespoon lemon juice 
1 tablespoon lime juice
1 tablespoon pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, juices, and maraschino liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Garnish with a lemon slice.

title: TITLE:  TROPICA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Take your baby and nestle in the nearest Tiki hut with a
couple of these tropical tipples.

1 1/4 ounces light rum
5 ounces pineapple juice
2 ounces grapefruit juice
Dash grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rum, juices, and grenadine in a collins glass

with ice.

 Stir.
 Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

title: TITLE:  ZOMBIE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Let your eyes roll back in your head and get ready for some
voodoo loving. Only one per customer, please.

1 ounce unsweetened pineapple juice
Juice of 1 lime
Juice of 1 small orange
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
1/2 ounce apricot brandy
2 1/2 ounces light rum
1 ounce Jamaican rum
1 ounce passion fruit syrup, if desired
1 ounce 151-proof rum
1/2 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all juices, powdered sugar, apricot brandy,

rums, and passion fruit syrup in a blender.

 Blend at low speed for 1 minute.
 Strain into a frosted highball glass.
 Garnish with a pineapple stick and a cherry.
 Float 151-proof rum on top.

title: TITLE:  WIKI WAKI WOO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Watch out for that wave, dude.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce rum
1/2 ounce 151-proof rum
1/2 ounce tequila
1/2 ounce triple sec
1 ounce amaretto
1 ounce orange juice
1 ounce pineapple juice
1 ounce cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients in a cocktail mixer filled with

ice.
 Stir.
 Pour into a hurricane glass.
 Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  EAST INDIA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t dare take a flask of these on your elephant ride. You
just might end up hugging the trunk.

1 1/2 ounces brandy
1/2 teaspoon pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon triple sec
1 teaspoon Jamaican rum
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, pineapple juice, triple sec, rum, and

bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel and a cherry.

title:
TITLE:  FROZEN BANANA

DAIQUIRI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mix these with a wild and crazy tropical shirt and let it all
hang out at the next company picnic.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce lime juice
1 ounce banana liqueur
1/4 sliced banana
1 teaspoon sugar
1/2 ounce cream
1/2 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour ingredients in blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into oversized wine glass.
 Garnish with lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  BANANA MANGO
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, orange juice, vermouth, and crème

de menthe.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 BANANA MANGO

A wondrous  concoction  of  tropical  flavors  sure  to  ease
your cares away.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/4 ounce banana liqueur
1/2 ounce mango nectar
1/2 ounce lime juice

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, banana liqueur, mango nectar, and lime

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  CONCH SHELL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Unlike its namesake, this drink does not blow.

4 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a double old-fashioned glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  GAUGUIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: This depressed post-Impressionist French painter
once worked as a stock broker. No wonder there’s a drink
named after him.

2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce passion fruit syrup
1/2 ounce lemon juice
4 ounces lime juice
1/3 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend for 15 seconds on low speed.
 Pour into a chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title:
TITLE:  ISLE OF THE BLESSED

COCONUT
description:
DESCRIPTION: In  this  episode:  You  and  your  friends  get  drunk. Again.
Tune in for more next week. Same time. Same channel.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce cream of coconut
1/2 ounce lime juice
1/4 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce orange juice
1/2 teaspoon sugar
1/3 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend for 15 seconds on low speed.
 Pour into a chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.
 Garnish with a toasted coconut slice.

title: TITLE:  ICE PALACE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Cool as an ice queen’s abode.

1 ounce light rum
1/2 ounce Galliano
1/2 ounce apricot brandy
2 ounces pineapple juice
1/4 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, Galliano, apricot brandy, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass over ice.
 Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  SAN JUAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: After you taste this, you’ll be a loyal and avid supporter of
Puerto Rican statehood.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1 ounce grapefruit juice
1 teaspoon cream of coconut
2 teaspoons lime juice
1/3 cup crushed ice
2 teaspoons 151-proof rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend for 15 seconds on low speed.
 Pour into chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.
 Float 151-proof rum on top.

title: TITLE:  HAWAIIAN EYE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The official drink of Hawaiian private investigators. Don’t
tell Jack Lord.

1 1/2 ounces bourbon
1 ounce coffee liqueur
1 ounce heavy cream
1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce banana liqueur
1 teaspoon Pernod
1 egg white
3 ounces cracked ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend for 15 seconds.
 Pour into chilled highball glass.
 Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

title: TITLE:  ACAPULCO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Elvis said when in Acapulco, bossa nova, baby.

1 3/4 ounces rum
1/4 ounce triple sec
1 egg white
1/2 ounce lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, triple sec, egg white, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Garnish with mint leaves.

title: TITLE:  COCO LOCO
description:
DESCRIPTION: The only good reason to be caught buying whole coconuts
at the grocery store.

1 whole coconut in shell
1 ounce tequila
1 ounce rum
1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce grenadine
1 lemon slice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Cut a hole in the top of the coconut, leaving juice

inside.

 Pour tequila, rum, gin, and grenadine into

coconut cup.

 Add several ice cubes.
 Stir.
 Squeeze a lemon slice into the coconut.
 Drop in the lemon.
 Serve with long straw.

title:
TITLE:  BARBARY COAST

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Arrrgh. Pour me another said the pirate to the barkeep.

1/2 ounce dry gin 
1/2 ounce rum
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
1/2 ounce scotch 
1/2 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, rum, crème de cacao, scotch, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CHIQUITA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Dare to embrace your inner-Carmen Miranda. Drink these,
and wear bananas on your head.

1/2 ounce banana liqueur
1/2 ounce Cointreau
1/2 ounce light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add banana liqueur, Cointreau, and light cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sour glass half-filled with crushed ice.

title: TITLE:  GORILLA MILK
description:
DESCRIPTION: It takes a brave man to milk a gorilla. Well worth the risk.

1 ounce light rum
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce crème de banana
1 ounce light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, liqueurs, crème de banana, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a hurricane glass.
 Garnish with a banana slice.

title: TITLE:  CASABLANCA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Bogie and Bacall. They had it all. Pour it again, Sam.

2 ounces light rum
1 1/2 teaspoon triple sec
1 1/2 teaspoon lime juice
1 1/2 teaspoon cherry liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add light rum, triple sec, lime juice, and cherry

liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  PINEAPPLE DREAM

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Serve these up while roasting the whole hog at the next
family luau.

1/2 ounce pineapple juice
Juice of 1/2 lime
1 ounce rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pineapple juice, lime juice, and rum.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CALYPSO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Day-o. Day-ay-ay-o. Daylight come but me no wanna go
home.

3/4 ounce Tia Maria
3/4 ounce Jamaican rum
Hot coffee
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Tia Maria and rum into a coffee mug.
 Fill with hot coffee.
 Top with whipped cream, if desired.

title: TITLE:  PINEAPPLE FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Beware: Too  much  of  this  concoction  will  leave  you  with
dancing pineapple hallucinations.

1 ounce pineapple juice
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces rum
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pineapple juice, powdered sugar, and rum.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  BRASS MONKEY
description:
DESCRIPTION: That funky monkey…you can be a brass monkey junkie.
Try one and see.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce light rum
5 ounces orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill highball glass with ice.
 Add vodka, rum, and orange juice.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  SHANGHAI COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A (Shanghai) surprise in every drop.

Juice of 1/4 lemon
1 teaspoon anisette
1 ounce Jamaican rum
1/2 teaspoon grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, anisette, rum, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BEE STUNG LIPS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Think Angelina Jolie and Mick Jagger. Pout accordingly.

2 ounces light rum
1 teaspoon honey
1 teaspoon heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, honey, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ASTRONAUT
description:
DESCRIPTION: After  a  few  of  these, Major  Nelson  calls  Genie “master.”
Master of the bottle, that is.

1 1/2 ounces Jamaican rum
1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice
1 1/2 teaspoon passion fruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, vodka, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass with ice.

title: TITLE:  FROZEN MARGARITA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Buffett. Wastin’ Away. You get the picture.

1 1/2 ounces tequila
1/2 ounce triple sec
1 ounce sour mix
Dash Rose’s lime juice
4 ounces ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour ingredients into a blender.
 Blend for 15 seconds until smooth.
 Pour into large wine glass or margarita goblet.
 Garnish with a lime slice.

title: TITLE:  BANANA MAMA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Say a toast. Nani Wahine: To a beautiful woman.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce dark rum
1 ounce banana liqueur
1 ounce cream of coconut
1 ounce fresh strawberries
2 ounces pineapple juice
3 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a goblet.

title: TITLE:  BANANA BOAT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Gilligan made one of these to leave the island. Mr. Howell
gulped it down and fell asleep in a hammock. Foiled again!

1 1/2 ounces tequila
1/2 ounce banana liqueur
1 ounce lime juice
2 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a sour glass.

title: TITLE:  RUM JULEP
description:
DESCRIPTION: The sassy Caribbean cousin to the famous Mint Julep.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1 teaspoon sugar
1 ounce water
8 mint sprigs
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Muddle four mint sprigs, sugar, and water in a

collins glass.

 Fill glass with crushed ice.
 Stir until glass frosts.
 Add four mint springs to glass.
 Add rum.

title: TITLE:  PSYCHO TSUNAMI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Also called The Ex-girlfriend.

1/2 ounce blue curacao
1/2 ounce fresh lime juice
1/2 ounce tequila
2 dashes Tabasco sauce
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer curacao, lime juice, tequila, and Tabasco

sauce in shot class.

 Allow Tabasco to settle before drinking.

title: TITLE:  SHARK BITE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Not as deadly as the Great White. Consider this the Jab-
berjaw of rum drinks.

1 1/2 ounces dark rum
3 ounces orange juice
1/2 ounce sour mix
3/4 ounce grenadine
3 ounces ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a goblet.

 COBBLER’S COOLER

Geppetto, the  cobbler, and  Pinocchio, the  real  boy, drank
these on tropical holidays in the later years.

2 1/2 ounces white rum
1 ounce vodka
Dash Grand Marnier
1 banana
Dash Angostura bitters
Dash nutmeg
3 ounces cracked ice
Orange juice

 Pour rum, vodka, Grand Marnier, and banana into

a blender with ice.

 Blend until smooth.
 Add bitters and nutmeg.
 Top with orange juice.
 Pour into a zombie glass.
 Garnish with an orange slice and an edible flower.
 Serve with a straw.

title: TITLE:  COCOTINI
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, juices, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with club soda.

 COCOTINI

A fave of Malibu Barbies. Perfect for relaxing poolside at
the Dream House.

3 ounces coconut flavored rum
1 ounce triple sec
Coconut shavings

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum and triple sec.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with

coconut shavings.

 Garnish with a lime wheel.

title: TITLE:  TROPICAL ITCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink up! This one is worth the Calamine lotion.

1 ounce vodka
1 ounce light rum
1/2 ounce orange curacao
4 ounces passion fruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, light rum, orange curacao, and passion

fruit juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a double old-fashioned with ice.

title: TITLE:  LAVA FLOW
description:
DESCRIPTION: This lava flow will send people stampeding…toward the
bar.

1 ounce light rum
1 ounce coconut-flavored rum
2 ounces strawberries
1 ripe banana
2 ounces unsweetened pineapple juice
2 ounces coconut cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour strawberries and rums into a blender.
 Blend until a smooth paste.
 Pour paste into a hurricane glass.
 Rinse blender.
 Add banana, pineapple juice, and coconut cream

into the blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Slowly pour blender mix into the hurricane glass.

title: TITLE:  BLUE DIABLO
description:
DESCRIPTION: What Satan looks like when hell freezes over.

1 1/4 ounces tequila
4 ounces lemon-lime soda
Splash blue curacao
Salt
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila and lemon-lime soda into a salt-rimmed old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

 Add splash of curacao.

title: TITLE:  SEX ON THE BEACH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Confession time...Have you had it? 

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1 1/2 ounces cranberry juice
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build vodka, peach schnapps, and juices into a

highball with ice.

title: TITLE:  BEACHCOMBER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ah, a fitting end to a hard day of shell seeking.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/2 ounce grenadine
1 ounce sour mix
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, triple sec, grenadine, and sour mix.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  RUMBAS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink two and get out on the dance floor. Clap, clap.

1/4 cup fresh papaya cubes (or chunks)
1/4 cup fresh cantaloupe cubes (or chunks)
3/4 cup pineapple juice
3/4 cup orange juice
6 ounces light rum
1 tablespoon grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Fill blender with ice.
 Blend until slushy.
 Pour into highball glasses.
 Garnish with orange slices and cherries.
(Serves 4)

title:
TITLE:  TROPICAL PINEAPPLE

PARADISE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  Shangri-la  of  tropical  drinks. Tastes  best  when  con-
sumed in the presence of palm trees, sand, and plenty of
bikinis.

2 ounces pineapple liqueur
1 ounce coconut rum
Cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour pineapple liqueur and rum into a tall glass.
 Fill with cranberry juice.
 Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

title: TITLE:  REEF RUNNER
description:
DESCRIPTION: The ideal drink for a three-hour tour.

1 ounce dark rum
1/2 ounce blackberry brandy
1/2 ounce apricot brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum and brandies.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glace filled with ice.
 Fill with a favorite tropical juice. Bartender’s

choice.

title: TITLE:  TEQUILA SUNRISE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink this while the sun is coming up… 

2 ounces tequila
4 ounces orange juice
1 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila into a highball glass with ice.
 Top with orange juice.
 Stir.
 Add grenadine by tilting the glass and pouring

down the side.

 Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  TEQUILA SUNSET
description:
DESCRIPTION: …and drink this while the sun is going down.

1 ounce tequila
Orange juice
1/2 ounce blackberry brandy
1 cherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila into a collins glass filled with ice.
 Fill with orange juice.
 Stir.
 Top with blackberry brandy.
 Stir lightly.
 Add cherry on top.

title: TITLE:  POLYNESIAN PARADISE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A sure-fire gateway drink to nirvana.

1 1/2 ounces golden rum
1 teaspoon brown sugar
3/4 ounce lime juice
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
1/4 ounce triple sec
1/3 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients into a blender.
 Blend for 15 seconds on low speed.
 Pour into a chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.

title: TITLE:  FLAMINGO COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: After three, it’s guaranteed: You’ll be standing on one leg.
Turning pink optional.

1/2 ounce lime juice
1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce apricot brandy
1/4 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lime juice, gin, brandy, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ROSEATE SPOONBILL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  fact:  This  pink  Caribbean  bird  has  a  wing-span  of
over five feet and a bill shaped like a spoon. Guard that
drink! 

1/2 ounce rum
1/2 ounce spiced rum
1/2 ounce Licor 43
1 ounce grapefruit juice
1 ounce guava nectar
2 dashes grenadine
3 ounces ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rums, Licor 43, grapefruit juice, and guava

nectar into a blender.

 Place a dash of grenadine in a chilled margarita

glass.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into the glass.
 Add second dash of grenadine.
 Swirl with swizzle stick or piece of sugar cane.

title: TITLE:  JAMAICA GLOW
description:
DESCRIPTION: Are you part firefly, baby? Cause Jamaican me glow.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry red wine
1/2 ounce orange juice
1 teaspoon dark Jamaican rum
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, wine, orange juice, and rum.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lime slice.

title: TITLE:  PINK CREOLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: King Creole’s little sister.

1 1/2 ounces golden rum
1/2 ounce lime juice
1 teaspoon cream
1 teaspoon grenadine
1 rum-soaked black cherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, lime juice, cream, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Add black cherry.

title:
TITLE:  RUM AND PINEAPPLE

COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Be nice to the cabana boy, and he’ll put in an extra shot of
rum for you.

2 1/2 ounces light rum
2 ounces pineapple juice
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1 teaspoon 151-proof rum
1 teaspoon sugar
Dash Angostura bitters
Iced club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rums, juices, sugar, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass.
 Add splash of club soda and ice to fill glass.
 Garnish with a spear of pineapple and papaya

chunks.

title:
TITLE:  RUM AND COCONUT

COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: If castaways indulge in this drink, they may never want to
leave the island.

2 1/2 ounces light rum
1 ounce cream of coconut
1/2 ounce lemon juice
Iced club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, cream of coconut, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass half-filled with ice.
 Add splash of club soda.
 Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  SLEEPY LAGOON
description:
DESCRIPTION: One  relaxes. Two  sedates. Three, indeed, will  make  you
meditate.

1 ounce brandy
1 ounce dry gin
1/2 ounce orange juice
Dash lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, gin, orange, and lemon juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  A LITTLE DINGHY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Have a few of these and your friends just might call you
“a little dinghy.” Take it as a compliment.

3 ounces of Captain Morgan’s Parrot Bay rum 
3 ounces of Malibu coconut rum 
1 part cranberry juice 
1 part pineapple juice 
1 part orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rums into a highball glass filled with ice.
 Fill the glass with equal parts cranberry, pineapple,

and orange juices.

 Garnish with a pineapple wedge, an orange slice,

and a cocktail umbrella.

title: TITLE:  CARIBBEAN ROMANCE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Popular with match-making cruise ship directors. Sure to
spark a kiss or two under the moonlight.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1 ounce amaretto
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
1 1/2 ounces pineapple juice
Splash of grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, amaretto, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Float grenadine on top.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  A DAY AT THE BEACH
description:
DESCRIPTION: …never felt so good.

1 ounce coconut flavored rum
1/2 ounce amaretto
4 ounces orange juice
1/2 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, amaretto, orange juice, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Top with grenadine.
 Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a strawberry.

title: TITLE:  RUM ROYALE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The king of all tropical drinks.

1 ounce light rum
2 ounces Sauternes
1 1/2 ounces lemon juice
2 ounces pineapple juice
1 teaspoon sugar
Dash Peychaud’s bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, Sauternes, juices, sugar, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled collins glass.
 Add ice to fill glass.
 Garnish with a pineapple cube and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  POKER COCKTAIL
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

 POKER COCKTAIL

Deal these and you’re guaranteed a full house.

1 1/2 ounces sweet vermouth
1 1/2 ounces light rum

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth and rum.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MANHATTAN HAWAII
description:
DESCRIPTION: For the vacationing city slicker who can’t bear to leave the
metropolis behind.

1 1/2 ounces whiskey
3/4 ounce sweet vermouth
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, vermouth, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PINEAPPLE BOOMERANG
description:
DESCRIPTION: The drink that returns with a knockout punch.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce vermouth
1/2 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  TAHITI MILKMAID
description:
DESCRIPTION: Her name is Lola, and she mixes the most wicked cocktails
on the isle of Tahiti. This creation will leave you wanting
more.

2 ounces gin
1 ounce grenadine
1 teaspoon cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, grenadine, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SWEET LEILANI
description:
DESCRIPTION: One  look  at  Sweet  Leilani  and  Dave  knew  he  wasn’t  in
Kansas anymore.

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce grenadine
1/2 ounce lemon juice
2 dashes Angostura bitters
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, grenadine, lemon juice, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball cocktail glass with ice.
 Top with club soda.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  AUSSIE BEACH BLOND
description:
DESCRIPTION: As author Anita Loos once remarked, “Gentlemen always
seem to remember blondes.” Indeed, this cocktail is one to
remember.

2 1/4 ounces white rum
2 ounces Cointreau
1 1/2 teaspoon sugar
3/4 ounce lime juice
1 1/4 ounces orange juice
Juice of 1 passion fruit
1/4 cup crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rum, Cointreau, juices, and sugar in a

blender with ice.

 Blend until slushy.
 Pour into a hurricane glass.
 Garnish with lemon, lime, and orange slices.

title: TITLE:  AFTER FIVE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Another sweet reason to finish your TPS reports on time.

1/3 ounce coffee liqueur
1/3 ounce peppermint schnapps
1/3 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer coffee liqueur, peppermint schnapps, and

Irish cream liqueur in a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  AFTER EIGHT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Clarification: Drink’s name is not an invitation to demon-
strate what great tricks you can do after eight servings.

1/3 ounce coffee liqueur
1/3 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/3 ounce white crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, and

crème de menthe in a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  ALABAMA SLAMMER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink four, say name three times fast, win a prize.

1 1/2 ounces sloe gin
1 1/2 ounces amaretto
1 1/2 ounces Southern Comfort
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sloe gin, amaretto, Southern Comfort, and

orange juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into four shot glasses.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  ANTIFREEZE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Proper system maintenance is critical to maximizing your
engine’s performance.

1/2 ounce green crème de menthe
1/2 ounce vodka
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de menthe and vodka.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title:
TITLE:  PURPLE HOOTER

SHOOTER
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, Grand

Marnier, and vodka into a shot glass.

 PURPLE HOOTER

SHOOTER

Note:  In  the  event  hooters  remain  purple  for  more  than
four hours, seek immediate medical attention.

3 ounces vodka
1 ounce Rose’s lime juice
Dash of Chambord

 Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, Rose’s lime juice, and Chambord.
 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  JOLLY RANCHER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Like a trip to the candy store. A candy store where you get
carded.

3/4 ounces vodka
1/4 ounce melon liqueur
1/4 ounce peach schnapps
Splash of cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add  vodka, melon  liqueur, peach  schnapps, and

cranberry juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  BABY RUTH
description:
DESCRIPTION: In  the  1927 World  Series, Babe  Ruth  called  his  shot  and
homered. Time for you to call yours.

1/2 ounce Frangelico
1/2 ounce vodka
Three peanuts
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer Frangelico and vodka in a shot glass.
 Add peanuts.

title: TITLE:  BUTTERY NIPPLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: “The  lady  will  have  the  linguine  with  white  clam  sauce
and a Buttery Nipple.” Who says chivalry can’t be fun?

1/2 ounce butterscotch schnapps
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer  butterscotch  schnapps  and  Irish  cream

liqueur.

title: TITLE:  MELTDOWN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Designed to thaw even the iciest of hearts. Recommended
for standoffish blind dates.

1 ounce chilled vodka
1/2 ounce peach schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour chilled vodka into a shot glass.
 Top with peach schnapps.

title: TITLE:  PURPLE HAZE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Actin’ funny, and you don’t know why? S’cuse me while
I…

1/2 ounce sambuca
1/2 ounce Chambord
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sambuca into shot glass.
 Slowly add Chambord.

title: TITLE:  HAWAIIAN PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Please resist the urge to smack the guy who requests this
drink. It  just  means  you’re  old  enough  to  remember  the
commercial.

1/4 ounce crème de almond
1/4 ounce Southern Comfort
1/4 ounce vodka
1/4 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de almond, Southern Comfort, vodka,

and pineapple juice.

 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  BEAM ME UP SCOTTY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t  be  a  Klingon—passing  this  one  up  is  simply  not
logical.

1/3 ounce coffee liqueur
1/3 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/3 ounce banana liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer  coffee  liqueur, Irish  cream  liqueur, and

banana liqueur.

title: TITLE:  KAMIKAZE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tora! Tora! Tora! 

2 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/4 ounce Rose’s lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, triple sec, and Rose’s lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into two shot glasses.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  BLOW JOB
description:
DESCRIPTION: Makes Monday morning’s break room recounting of Friday
night a lot more interesting.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce coffee-flavored brandy
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, coffee-flavored brandy, and coffee

liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.
 Top with whipped cream.

title: TITLE:  MISSION ACCOMPLISHED
description:
DESCRIPTION: Banner not included.

2 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/4 ounce Rose’s lime juice 
Dash of grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, triple sec, Rose’s lime juice, and

grenadine.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

 E.T.

Serve with side order of Reese’s Pieces.

3/4 ounce melon liqueur
3/4 ounce vodka
3/4 ounce Irish cream liqueur

 Layer melon liqueur, vodka, and Irish cream

liqueur.

title:
TITLE:  PEANUT BUTTER AND

JELLY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mmm…just  like  Mom  used  to  make  when  you  weren’t
looking.

3/4 ounce Frangelico
3/4 ounce Chambord
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Frangelico and Chambord.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  LEMON DROP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Giggly coeds frequently lose their grip on this one.

1/2 ounce chilled tequila
1/2 ounce chilled vodka
Lemon slice
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Moisten inside of a shot glass with lemon slice.
 Coat inside of shot glass with sugar.
 Add tequila and vodka.

title: TITLE:  CANDY BAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  bouncer  at  the  Candy  Bar?  A  surly, aging  Willy
Wonka.

1/2 ounce Frangelico
1/2 ounce vodka
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Frangelico and vodka.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  MEXICAN FLAG
description:
DESCRIPTION: Order  one  for  the  Mexican  head  of  state, win  additional
NAFTA  concessions. Never  underestimate  the  power  of
drunken diplomacy.

1/2 ounce sloe gin 
1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce melon liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sloe gin into a shot glass.
 Float vodka on top of sloe gin.
 Float melon liqueur on top of vodka.

title: TITLE:  PANCHO VILLA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Pancho Villa was a tough, hardcore Mexican revolutionary.
No better way to salute this brave man than with a fruity
cocktail.

1 ounce light rum
1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce apricot brandy
1 teaspoon cherry brandy
1 teaspoon pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add light rum, gin, brandies, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.

title: TITLE:  TO THE MOON
description:
DESCRIPTION: “One of these days, Alice, one of these days…POW!” Pour
a little out for Jackie Gleason, RIP.

1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/2 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce 151-proof rum
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add coffee liqueur, amaretto, Irish cream liqueur,

and 151-proof rum.

 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  BLOODY CAESAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: “Et tu? Okay, you got the first round, I’ll pick up this one.
Who wants peanuts?”

1 littleneck clam
2 drops Worcestershire sauce
2 drops Tabasco sauce
Dash of horseradish
1 ounce vodka
1 1/2 ounces tomato juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Place littleneck clam in bottom of shot glass.
 Add Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, and

horseradish.

 Add vodka and tomato juice.
 Sprinkle celery salt on top.
 Garnish with lime juice.

title: TITLE:  PIGSKIN SHOT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Soon  to  be  the  official  stadium  smuggled  drink  for
Arkansas Razorback fans everywhere. Woo Pig Sooiee!

1 ounce vodka
1 ounce melon liqueur
1/2 ounce sour mix
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, melon liqueur, and sour mix.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  SNOW CAP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Like a favorite hat, this one will keep your head nice and
warm.

1/2 ounce tequila
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer  tequila  and  Irish  cream  liqueur  into  a  shot

glass.

title: TITLE:  WOO WOO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hard to order this one with a straight face, but give it a try.
Well worth the bartender’s raised eyebrow.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1/2 ounce cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, peach schnapps, and cranberry juice.
 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  ROCK LOBSTER
description:
DESCRIPTION: A shout out to one of the best dance songs ever.

1/3 ounce Irish cream liqueur 
1/3 ounce amaretto
1/3 ounce white crème de cacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer Irish cream liqueur, amaretto, and crème de

cacao in a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  TEQUILA POPPER
description:
DESCRIPTION: This one has scarred many a bachelor party table.

1 ounce tequila
1/2 ounce 7-up
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila into a shot glass.
 Add 7-Up.
 Place napkin over top of glass.
 Bang glass on table.
 Drink immediately.

title: TITLE:  NUTTY PROFESSOR
description:
DESCRIPTION: Consumed by wildhaired academics around the globe.

1/2 ounce Grand Marnier
1/2 ounce Frangelico
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add  Grand  Marnier, Frangelico, and  Irish  cream

liqueur.

 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  SILVER SPIDER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Like the übercool Italian car, this one handles like a champ.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce rum
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/2 ounce white crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, rum, triple sec, and crème de menthe.
 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  WOMBAT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  Fact:  The  wombat  is  the  world’s  largest  burrowing
mammal—and now a delicious beverage.

2 ounces dark rum 
1/2 ounce strawberry liqueur
2 ounces orange juice
3 ounces pineapple juice
6 ounces fresh watermelon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail shaker with dark rum, strawberry

liqueur, orange juice, pineapple juice, and water-
melon juice.

 Shake.
 Pour into shot glasses.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  RUSSIAN QUAALUDE
description:
DESCRIPTION: How do you say “duuuude…look at my hand…” in Russian? 

1/3 ounces Frangelico
1/3 ounces Irish cream liqueur
1/3 ounces vodka
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer Frangelico, Irish cream liqueur, and vodka

in a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  TIDY BOWL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink the Tidy Bowl now and hug the bowl later. Perfect!

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 to 2 drops blue curacao
2 raisins
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka and blue curacao.
 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.
 Plop in raisins.

title: TITLE:  SILK PANTIES
description:
DESCRIPTION: Get these down as fast as possible.

3/4 ounce peach schnapps
3/4 ounce sambuca
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add peach schnapps and sambuca.
 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  GREEN DEMON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Seen this guy on your shoulder once or twice? Fun guy, ter-
rible adviser.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce rum
1/2 ounce melon liqueur
1/2 ounce lemonade
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, rum, melon liqueur, and lemonade.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  SNACK BITE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Word around the campfire is that former Girl Scouts like
these. Enjoy with a box of cookies.

2 ounces Canadian whiskey
1 ounce Rose’s lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Canadian whiskey and Rose’s lime juice in a

shot glass.

 Garnish with a lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  TEDDY BEAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: At last: The real reason Paddington got lost.

1/2 ounce root beer schnapps
1/2 ounce vodka
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer root beer schnapps and vodka in a shot

glass.

title: TITLE:  SNOW SHOE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Surely, Santa  has  downed  a  few  of  these  on  his  annual
journey.

1 1/2 ounce Wild Turkey
1/2 ounces peppermint schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a rocks glass with ice.
 Add Wild Turkey and peppermint schnapps.
 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  MONKEY SHINE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Why Curious George hangs around that man in the yellow
hat.

1/2 ounce Southern Comfort
1/2 ounce crème de banana
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Southern Comfort, crème de banana, and

Irish cream liqueur.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  MELON BALL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Rumored  around  frat  houses  to  be  the  real  last  name  of
John Cougar.

1 ounce melon liqueur
1 ounce vodka
1 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add melon liqueur, vodka, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  GALACTIC ALE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Set phasers to “stun”…a drink for terrestrials and extra-
terrestrials alike.

1 1/4 ounces vodka
1 1/4 ounces blue curacao
1 ounce lime juice 
1/2 ounce Chambord
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, blue curacao, lime juice, and Cham-bord.

 Shake.
 Strain into two shot glasses.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  ORGASM
description:
DESCRIPTION: You  know  what  they  say:  Even  when  it’s  bad, it’s  still
pretty good.

1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add  Irish  cream  liqueur, amaretto, and  coffee

liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  SCREAMING ORGASM
description:
DESCRIPTION: This  is  why  the  neighbors  in  the  next  apartment  giggle
when they see you. The walls have ears.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, Irish cream liqueur, amaretto, and cof-fee liqueur.

 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  IRISH FROST
description:
DESCRIPTION: Begorrah! With this drink handy, who needs to find the end
of the rainbow?

1 1/2 ounces Irish cream liqueur
Splash cream of coconut
Splash half and half
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Irish cream liqueur, cream of coconut, and

half and half.

 Shake.
 Strain into cordial glass.
 Garnish with cinnamon.

title: TITLE:  OATMEAL COOKIE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Just like Grandma used to make. After you went to bed.

1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce Goldschlager
1/2 ounce butterscotch schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Irish cream liqueur, Goldschlager, and 

butterscotch schnapps.

 Shake.
 Strain into rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  ORIENTAL RUG
description:
DESCRIPTION: The man who drinks too many of these ends up flat on the
floor.

1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce Frangelico
1/2 ounce Jagermeister
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
Dash of cola
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Irish cream liqueur, Frangelico, Jagermeister,

coffee liqueur, and cola.

 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass.

title:
TITLE:  INTERNATIONAL 

INCIDENT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Some drinks are not worth causing trouble over. Here’s an
exception. Thank heavens for diplomatic immunity.

1/4 ounce vodka
1/4 ounce coffee liqueur
1/4 ounce amaretto
1/4 ounce Frangelico
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, coffee liqueur, amaretto, Frangelico,

and Irish cream liqueur.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

 OH MY GOSH!

“Oh  My  Gosh”: A popular  sorority  often  linked  with  the
frat boys from I Tappa Kegg.

1 ounce amaretto
1 ounce peach schnapps

 Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add amaretto and peach schnapps.
 Stir.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  MIND ERASER
description:
DESCRIPTION: There’s  something  to  be  said  for  truth  in  advertising.
Kudos to this drink for telling it like it is.

3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
1 1/4 ounces vodka
1 ounce tonic water
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a rocks glass with ice.
 Add coffee liqueur and vodka.
 Top with tonic water.
 Stir gently.
 Drink through a straw in one shot.

title: TITLE:  JELLY BEAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Some  would  say  this  should  be  the  after-dinner  drink  of
the Reagan Presidential Library.

1 ounce anisette
1 ounce blackberry brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour anisette and blackberry brandy into cordial

glass.

 Stir.
 Add ice, if desired.

title: TITLE:  WINDEX
description:
DESCRIPTION: Whether drinking it or using it to clean windows, one firm
rule: no streaking.

3/4 ounce vodka
3/4 ounce triple sec
3/4 ounce blue curacao
3/4 ounce Rose’s lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, triple sec, blue curacao, and Rose’s

lime juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  SCOOBY SNACKS
description:
DESCRIPTION: “That’s not a real bartender! It’s....Mr. Johnson!!??” Drink
up, meddling kids.

3/4 ounce vodka
3/4 ounce melon liqueur
3/4 ounce coconut rum liqueur
1 ounce pineapple juice
1/2 ounce of cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, melon liqueur, coconut rum liqueur,

pineapple juice, and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  SLIPPERY NIPPLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A real mouthful for gutter boys.

2 ounces sambuca
1 1/2 ounces Irish cream liqueur
Drop grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour sambuca into a cocktail glass.
 Float Irish cream liqueur on top of sambuca.
 Pour a drop of grenadine in the middle.

title: TITLE:  MEXICAN ROSE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Watch out for the golden thorn.

3/4 ounce Chambord
1/4 ounce gold tequila
Sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Chambord and gold tequila.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sugar-frosted chilled cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  HONOLULU SHOOTER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t you know Don Ho-wannabees are all about drinking
these  with  the  ladies? Add  ukulele  music  at  bartender’s
discretion.

1 ounce gin
1 teaspoon pineapple juice
1 teaspoon orange juice
1 teaspoon lemon juice
1 teaspoon pineapple syrup
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add gin, juices, pineapple syrup, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  KALASHNIKOV SHOT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Liquor, fire, and a famed Russian weapon? Count me in!

3/4 ounce vodka
1/4 ounce absinthe
1 slice Lemon
Pinch of cinnamon
Pinch of sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a shot glass with vodka.
 Place a lemon slice halfway across the top of the

glass.

 Fill the rest of the shot glass with absinthe, pour-ing so that it passes through the lemon.
 Add cinnamon and sugar to the lemon.
 Ignite the lemon.
 When it extinguishes itself, down the shot and

eat the lemon.

title: TITLE:  BARBIE SHOT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Note:  1  ounce  +  1  ounce  +  1  ounce  +  1  ounce…math  is
hard!

1 ounce coconut rum liqueur
1 ounce vodka
1 ounce cranberry juice
1 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add coconut rum liqueur, vodka, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into two rocks glass.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  FUZZY SCREW SHOT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sounds like some sort of porno script direction. Drink up
before the director (or bartender) yells, “Cut!”

1 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1/2 ounce triple sec
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour a double shot glass half full of vodka.
 Pour the peach schnapps into the next quarter.
 Pour the triple sec in the remaining quarter.
 Stir and shoot.

title: TITLE:  THE FIG
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ever  heard  that  expression, “I  don’t  give  a  fig”?  Taste
this—it’s so good, you’d surely keep it, too.

1 1/2 ounces coconut rum liqueur
1 ounce pineapple juice
1 ounce cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add coconut rum liqueur and juices.
 Shake.
 Pour into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  BABY ASPIRIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: You can’t drink this without wanting to stay home from
school and watch game shows.

1/2 ounce orange juice
1/2 ounce sour mix
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/2 ounce raspberry schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour equal parts into cocktail mixer, mix and

pour into shot glass.

title: TITLE:  BLACK LEATHER WHIP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Crraack! Get me another, bartender.

1/4 ounce sour mix
1/4 ounce triple sec
1/4 ounce Grand Marnier
1/4 ounce gold tequila
1 splash orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add  sour  mix, triple  sec, Grand  Marnier, tequila,

and orange juice.

 Shake.
 Pour into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  BLUE POLAR BEAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: What  the  Great  White  One  drinks  when  the  Coca-Cola
people aren’t looking. Mmmmm....

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 1/2 ounces chilled peppermint schnapps
1 ounce crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka and peppermint schnapps.
 Shake until well-mixed.
 Add ice.
 Shake lightly.
 Strain.
 Pour into two shot glasses.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  COCAINE SHOOTER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Consumed  by good  girls  who  want  to  be  bad  girls. For
tonight, anyway.

1/2 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce dark crème de cacao
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/4 ounce cream
1 splash cola
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add amaretto, Irish cream liqueur, dark crème de

cacao, coffee liqueur, cream, and cola.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  FRUITY PEBBLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Yabba Dabba Doo—dibs on the prize!

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce blue curacao
Dash grenadine
1 ounce milk
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, curacao, grenadine, and milk.
 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  GEISHA RECIPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Here’s a good reason to emigrate.

1 part Canadian whiskey
2 parts melon liqueur
Pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Canadian whiskey and melon liqueur.
 Shake.
 Fill with pineapple juice.

title: TITLE:  GOLDEN EYE
description:
DESCRIPTION: 007  might  quaff  this  tasty  shot, careful  to  dodge  the
peanut. Beware!

1 ounce Goldschlager
1 peanut
1 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Goldschlager into a cordial glass.
 Add a peanut.
 Top with Irish cream liqueur.

title: TITLE:  GREEN VOODOO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Come do...the voodoo...that you do...so well.

1 ounce melon liqueur
1 ounce coconut rum liqueur
Splash triple sec
Splash sour mix
1 ounce lemon-lime soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add melon liqueur, coconut rum liqueur, triple

sec, sour mix, and lemon-lime soda.

 Shake.
 Strain into a two shot glasses.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  HAWAIIAN VOLCANO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Oh  great  God  of  Liquor!  Shower  us  with  your  blessings!
Make it a double!

2 ounces vodka
2 ounces Southern Comfort
2 ounces sloe gin
2 ounces Grand Marnier
Splash or two of orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, Southern Comfort, sloe gin, Grand

Marnier, and orange juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a four shot glasses.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  HONEYDEWME
description:
DESCRIPTION: More wives should add this to their hubbies’ chore lists.

1/2 ounce Barenjager liqueur
1/4 ounce melon liqueur
1 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Barenjager liqueur, melon liqueur, and

orange juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  KINKY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Handcuffs and leather pants optional.

1/3 ounce cranberry vodka
1/3 ounce raspberry vodka
1/3 ounce peach schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer vodkas and peach schnapps into a shot

glass.

title: TITLE:  MAD HATTER
description:
DESCRIPTION: If  Lewis  Carroll  was  drinking  this  while  writing,
explains everything.

it

1 ounce vodka
1 ounce peach schnapps
1 ounce lemonade
1 ounce cola
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, peach schnapps, lemonade, and cola.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  MAD SCIENTIST
description:
DESCRIPTION: It’s alive, it’s alive! A great one to whip up in the labora-
tory for that special…specimen.

3/4 ounce blueberry schnapps
3/4 ounce raspberry schnapps
Grenadine
Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Add blueberry and raspberry schnapps to a shot

glass.

 Slowly top with grenadine.
 Dribble a small amount of Irish cream liqueur on

top.

title: TITLE:  MEXICAN STANDOFF
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  party  game:  Make  one  shot, quickdraw  for  it  with
your nemesis.

1/3 ounce vodka
2/3 ounce gold tequila
1/3 ounce Passoa
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Layer into a shot glass in order.

title: TITLE:  MORANGUITO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Be enamored of any drink that combines the twin evils, er,
“joys,” of absinthe and tequila.

2/3 ounce absinthe
2/3 ounce tequila
1/3 ounce grenadine
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Layer the ingredients in a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  RATTLESNAKE RECIPE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Truth be told, it’s more scared of you than you are of it.

1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/2 ounce crème de cacao
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Carefully layer into a shot glass or test tube.

title: TITLE:  SANGRITA
description:
DESCRIPTION: New  England  and  Mexico…two  great  tastes  that  taste
great together.

1 ounce gold tequila
1 ounce Clamato juice
Tabasco sauce
Dash of Worcestershire sauce
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill one shot glass with tequila.
 Fill second shot glass with Clamato juice
 Add two drops Tabasco and Worcestershire sauce.
 Shoot the tequila.
 Chase it with the second shot.

title: TITLE:  SMARTY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sweet as a mother’s love.

1 ounce amaretto
1 ounce Southern Comfort
1 ounce blackberry brandy
1/2 ounce sour mix
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add amaretto, Southern Comfort, blackberry

brandy, and sour mix.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  SOLARIS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Spicy and sweet, like a pirate with a heart of gold.

3/4 ounce spiced rum
3/4 ounce grenadine
1 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Measure the parts so the shot glass is 2/3 full.
 Skim sugar on top.
