 Stir slightly.

title: TITLE:  SOUTHERN BONDAGE
description:
DESCRIPTION: This one will have you tied up in knots. But in a good way.

1/4 ounce Southern Comfort
1/4 ounce amaretto
1/4 ounce peach schnapps
1/4 ounce triple sec
1 splash cranberry juice
1 splash sour mix
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Southern Comfort, amaretto, peach

schnapps, triple sec, cranberry juice, and sour
mix.

 Shake.
 Strain into a rocks glass.

title: TITLE:  SPRINGBOK
description:
DESCRIPTION: A creamy moon beam dream.

3/4 ounce white crème de menthe
1/4 ounce Amarula cream liqueur
Dash cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour crème de menthe into a cordial glass.
 Gently layer Amarula cream liqueur.
 Add a thin layer of cream.

title: TITLE:  STARDUST
description:
DESCRIPTION: Surely created by a hippie mixologist inside the lime green
VW van, named in honor of his soul mate.

1/2 ounce citrus vodka
1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1/2 ounce blue curacao
1 ounce sour mix
1 ounce pineapple juice
1 splash grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, peach schnapps, curacao, sour mix,

pineapple juice, and grenadine.

 Shake.
 Strain into two rocks glasses.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  THE LADY IN RED
description:
DESCRIPTION: Best ordered by a dashing, tuxedoclad gentleman, for his
smoldering chanteuse.

1/2 ounce peppermint schnapps
1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour  the  schnapps, vodka, and  grenadine  into

rocks glass.

 Let stand for 30 seconds.

title:
TITLE:  THE LIQUEURICE

DREAM
description:
DESCRIPTION: An unusual concoction that shoots back but leaves a sweet
aftertaste.

1/4 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1/4 ounce scotch whiskey
1/4 ounce tequila
1/4 ounce Galliano
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Irish cream liqueur, scotch whiskey, tequila,

and Galliano into a shot glass.

 Stir.

title: TITLE:  THE PERNOD DEMON
description:
DESCRIPTION: France  and  Switzerland  banned  Pernod  (and  true
absinthe) for part of the early twentieth century, fearing its
hallucinogenic effects. Bottoms up, you madmen.

1 lemon wedge
Sugar
6 dashes Tabasco sauce
1 1/2 ounces Pernod
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Coat the lemon wedge with sugar.
 Add dashes of Tabasco sauce to lemon.
 Suck the lemon.
 Shoot the Pernod.

title: TITLE:  TROPICAL PASSION
description:
DESCRIPTION: One  might  think  that  “passion” and  “shots” are  polar
opposites. Think again, pal. Nothing says romance like a
fruity shooter.

1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1/2 ounce rum
1/2 ounce sloe gin
1/2 ounce triple sec
Splash of orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add peach schnapps, rum, sloe gin, triple sec, and

orange juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  YELLOW CAKE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Not the uranium, silly. The drink!

1/3 ounce vanilla vodka
1/3 ounce triple sec
1/3 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vanilla vodka, triple sec, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  INDULGENCE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Doesn’t get much better than this. One delicious mistress.

1/3 ounce dark crème de cacao
1/3 ounce amaretto
1/3 ounce Amarula cream liqueur
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Layer in above order in a shot glass.

title:
TITLE:  VANILLA CREAM

SHOOTER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Even white boys got to shout!

1/3 ounce amaretto
1/3 ounce Amarula cream liqueur
1/3 ounce vanilla vodka
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Layer in above order in a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  BANANA SPLIT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Even better than that crazy 70s kids TV show.

1/3 ounce amaretto
1/3 ounce white crème de cacao
1/3 ounce crème de banana
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Layer in above order in a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  LITTLE RED TEDDY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Whether  in  a  shot  glass  or  a  lingerie  store, everyone’s
happy to see this little number. Rowr.

4 ounces vodka
1 ounce Chambord
1 ounce white crème de cacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, Chambord, white crème de cacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into four shot glasses.
(Serves 4)

title: TITLE:  ORANGE CRUSH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Better than the soft drink, naturally, since it has a certain
kick courtesy of Russia.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/2 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, triple sec, and orange juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  ZAMBODIAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: If Zambo were a country, this would be its national drink.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce blackberry brandy
1/2 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add vodka, blackberry brandy, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  SOUTHERN BEACH
description:
DESCRIPTION: The perfect accompaniment for a day of shell seeking and
romping in the sand.

1 ounce Southern Comfort
1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1/4 ounce crème de noyaux
1 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Southern Comfort, peach schnapps, crème

de noyaux, and orange juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  AQUA TIDAL WAVE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hang ten, Spicoli. This one’s for you.

1/3 ounce blue curacao
1/3 ounce vodka
1/3 ounce melon liqueur
Dash pineapple juice
Dash cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add curacao, vodka, melon liqueur, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  MEMPHIS BELLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: As reliable as the World War II B17 for which this drink is
named, and much more tolerable than the film version.

3/4 ounce Southern Comfort 
3/4 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Southern Comfort and Irish cream liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title:
TITLE:  TIE ME TO THE 

BEDPOST
description:
DESCRIPTION: If your date orders this without blushing, things are going
very well indeed.

1/2 ounce melon liqueur
1/2 ounce citrus vodka
1/2 ounce coconut flavored rum
Splash of sour mix
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add melon liqueur, citrus vodka, coconut flavored

rum, and sour mix.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  SKIP AND GO NAKED
description:
DESCRIPTION: While weary students have been operating under this phi-
losophy for years, your version is much less drafty.

1 ounce gin
Dash grenadine
Splash sour mix
Splash draft beer
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add gin, grenadine, sour mix, and beer.
 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  ESKIMO KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Be  warned:  Rubbing  noses  over  this  sweet  delight  may
melt even the sturdiest igloo.

1/2 ounce Swiss chocolate liqueur
1/2 ounce cherry brandy 
1/2 ounce amaretto
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add Swiss chocolate liqueur, cherry brandy, and

amaretto.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  FUNKY MONKEY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Official drink of Koko the Gorilla.

1/2 ounce peach schnapps
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add peach schnapps, coffee liqueur, and Irish

cream liqueur.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  ALIEN SECRETION
description:
DESCRIPTION: Trekkies: Set phasers to yum and call the mother ship.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce melon liqueur
1/2 ounce coconut rum
1/2 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add  vodka, melon  liqueur, rum, and  pineapple

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a shot glass.

title: TITLE:  ABSINTHE COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Indulge, relax, and witness the magic of wicked little green
fairies dancing in your glass.

1 1/2 ounces absinthe 
3/4 ounce water
1/4 ounce anisette
Dash orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add absinthe, water, anisette, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  AMARETTO ALEXANDER
description:
DESCRIPTION: A nutty nightcap for a willing pleasure victim.

1 1/2 ounces amaretto
1 1/2 ounces crème de cacao
1 1/2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add amaretto, crème de cacao, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a brandy snifter.
 Garnish with sprinkled nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  BLANCHE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A vintage potable for tragically flawed Southern belles.

3/4 ounce anisette
1/2 ounce Cointreau
1/2 ounce triple sec
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add anisette, Cointreau, and triple sec.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BANFF
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  Fact:  With  snow-capped  mountains  and  sparkling
glaciers, Banff National Park is Canada’s oldest and most
famous national park.

2 ounces Canadian whiskey
1 ounce Grand Marnier
1 ounce Kirsch
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, Grand Marnier, Kirsch, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  THE LILY
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apple brandy, yellow Chartreuse, Benedictine,

and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a strawberry.

 THE LILY

A drink for those who prefer purity.

3/4 ounce dry gin
3/4 ounce crème de noyaux
3/4 ounce Lillet Blonde
Dash lemon juice

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de noyaux, and Lillet.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  FALLEN ANGEL
description:
DESCRIPTION: (FROM THE VENDOME CLUB IN HOLLYWOOD 1930)

Drink of choice for the good girl gone bad who tossed her
shiny halo in a ditch and never looked back.

2 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce white crème de menthe
1/4 ounce lemon juice
2 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add gin, white crème de menthe, lemon juice,

and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  VIOLET FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Purple: a color that symbolizes Lent. Good luck giving this
one up for forty days.

1 ounce lemon juice
1/2 teaspoon sugar
1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce crème de violette
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, sugar, gin, and crème de violette.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  SOPHIA LOREN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Two of these and your inner Italian starlet shines.

1 teaspoon vermouth
1 ounce orange juice
2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce Campari
2 teaspoons Cointreau
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vermouth in a tall glass.
 Swirl to coat inside of glass.
 Toss out extra vermouth.
 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add orange juice, gin, Campari, and Cointreau.
 Shake.
 Strain into the glass filled with ice.

title: TITLE:  NAKED LADY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Odd to begin the night with one of these rather than end it
that way.

1 ounce light rum
1 ounce sweet vermouth
4 dashes apricot brandy
2 dashes grenadine
4 dashes lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, vermouth, apricot brandy, grenadine,

and lemon juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  THE PEGU
description:
DESCRIPTION: Signature drink of Burma’s Pegu Club. The club fell victim
to World War II, but the drink lives on.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce Cointreau
3/4 ounce lime juice
2 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Cointreau, lime juice, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

 MAIDEN’S PRAYER

COCKTAIL

Maidens always pray for a nice boy. With a nice car. And
a flask handy.

1/4 teaspoon orange juice
1/4 teaspoon lemon juice
1/4 teaspoon triple sec
2 ounces dry gin

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add juices, triple sec, and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  JACK ROSE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Named for a mysterious chap who created an intoxicating
elixir. Kudos to Jack Rose.

1 1/2 ounces apple jack or calvados
1 ounce sugar syrup
3/4 ounce lemon juice
2 dashes grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apple jack (or calvados), sugar syrup, lemon

juice, and grenadine.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  AVIATION
description:
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy while sitting on the dunes of Kitty Hawk.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/4 ounce apricot brandy
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
1/2 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apricot brandy, maraschino liqueur, and

lemon juice.

 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  FRISCO SOUR
description:
DESCRIPTION: The official drink of any earthquake party.

2 ounces bourbon
1/2 ounce grenadine
Juice of 1/2 lime
Juice of 1/4 lemon
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, grenadine, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sour glass.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  CONTINENTAL
description:
DESCRIPTION: When  you  dance, you’re  charming, and  you’re  gentle.
While you’re up, get me another Continental.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce lime juice
1/4 ounce green crème de menthe
1/4 teaspoon sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, lime juice, crème de menthe, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SCOFFLAW
description:
DESCRIPTION: True scofflaws drink wherever they want. Whenever they
want.

1 ounce Canadian whiskey
1 ounce dry vermouth
Dash orange bitters
Dash grenadine
1/4 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, vermouth, bitters, grenadine, and

lemon juice.

 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ASTORIA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Stately and classic like the hotel that bears its name.

1 1/2 ounces gin
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
Dash orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  HI HO COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Starlets  and  leading  men  lollygagged  and  indulged  in
these at Hollywood’s Hi Ho Club. Recapture the moment.

2 ounces gin
1 ounce white port
4 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add gin, port, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  HONEYMOON COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: (FROM THE BROWN DERBY, HOLLYWOOD CIRCA 1930)

Created in Hollywood, the town that practically invented
“happily ever after.”

2 ounces apple jack
1/2 ounce Benedictine
1/2 ounce orange curacao
1/2 ounce fresh lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a cocktail mixer with ice.
 Add apple jack, Benedictine, curacao, and lemon

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  DOUGLAS FAIRBANKS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Guaranteed to play a leading role in your night’s activities.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1 ounce apricot brandy
1/2 ounce lime juice
3/4 ounce egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, brandy, lime juice, and egg white.
 Shake very well.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PARK AVENUE COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: First choice of the poodle crowd.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce pineapple juice
1/4 ounce sweet vermouth
1/4 ounce orange curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, pineapple juice, vermouth, and curacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  FLORIDITA
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, honey, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 FLORIDITA

A favorite of Papa Hemingway and other old men by the
sea.

1 ounce lime juice
2 ounces light rum
1/4 ounce grapefruit juice
1/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
1/2 teaspoon sugar

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lime juice, rum, grapefruit juice, maraschino

liqueur, and sugar.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  EL DIABLO
description:
DESCRIPTION: The Mexican devil that will cha-cha on your head.

1 1/2 ounces tequila
1/2 ounce crème de cassis
1/2 ounce lime juice
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, crème de cassis, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with ginger ale.
 Garnish with lime wedge.

title:
TITLE:  BROWN DERBY 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: In the 1945 cinema classic Mildred Pierce, Joan Crawford
said  of  this  Hollywood  hot  spot, “People  have to  drink
somewhere. Why not here?”

1/2 ounce whiskey
1/4 ounce grapefruit juice
1/4 ounce honey
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail glass with ice.
 Add whiskey, grapefruit juice, and honey.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  WHEEL OF FORTUNE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Raise  a  glass  to  Lady  Luck  and  hope  she  bestows  a  free
spin on the golden wheel.

1 1/2 ounces sambuca
1 ounce brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sambuca and brandy.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  WHISKEY DAISY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Oopsy Daisy! I’m drunk!

2 ounces blended whiskey
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
1 teaspoon grenadine
Juice 1/2 lemon
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, powdered sugar, grenadine, and

lemon juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a beer mug with one ice cube.
 Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

title:
TITLE:  MARLENE DIETRICH

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: “No girly drinks for this starlet. I am, at heart,” said Ms.
Dietrich, “a gentleman.”

3/4 wineglass of rye or Canadian whiskey
2 dashes Angostura bitters
2 dashes curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, bitters, and curacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Squeeze orange and lemon peel on top.

 DEVIL’S TORCH

Go toward the flame…burns a little, but it’s well worth the
pain.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1 1/2 ounces dry vermouth
3 dashes grenadine

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, vermouth, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  DIXIE WHISKEY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Old  times  here  are  not  forgotten. At  least  not  until  the
fourth glass.

1 1/2 ounces bourbon
1/2 ounce orange curacao 
1/4 ounce white crème de menthe
2 dashes Angostura bitters
3/4 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, orange curacao, white crème de

menthe, bitters, and lemon juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a martini glass.

title: TITLE:  EMBASSY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: The drink that launched a thousand treaties.

3/4 ounce brandy
3/4 ounce Cointreau
3/4 ounce Jamaican rum
1/2 ounce lime juice
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, Cointreau, rum, lime juice, and

bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  WHIZ BANG
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink this, and you get a very pleasant whiz-bang feeling
bouncing around in your head. Do not be alarmed.

2 ounces scotch
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
2 dashes grenadine
2 dashes Pernod
2 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add scotch, vermouth, grenadine, Pernod, and

bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.

title: TITLE:  SAVANNAH COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink these at midnight in the garden of good and evil.

Juice of 1 orange
1 1/2 ounces dry gin
1 egg white
Dash crème de cacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add orange, gin, egg white, and crème de cacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a claret glass.

title: TITLE:  VENDOME
description:
DESCRIPTION: The Vendome was a Los Angeles nightclub to remember.
One  suspects  that  this  cocktail  selection  has  made  more
than one person forget.

1 ounce red Dubonnet
1 ounce gin
1 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Dubonnet, gin, and vermouth.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  STORK CLUB COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Opened in 1929 as an NYC speakeasy, this swanky night
spot  was  the  site  of  many  cagey  shenanigans  and  illicit
romances. Toast it!

1 1/2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/4 ounce lime juice
1 ounce orange juice
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, triple sec, juices, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel.

title:
TITLE:  SOUTH COAST 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink for any coastal tourist or those luckless enough to
be landlocked.

2 1/2 ounces scotch
1/2 ounce curacao
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce sugar syrup
2 1/2 ounces club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add scotch, curacao, lemon juice, sugar syrup,

and club soda.

 Stir.
 Strain into two chilled martini glasses.
 Garnish with a flame orange peel.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  LOS ANGELES COCKTAIL
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, Grand Marnier, orange juice,

and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel.

 LOS ANGELES COCKTAIL

One sip, and you’ll see why L.A. is known as the City of
Angels.

1 1/2 ounces bourbon
1/4 ounce sweet vermouth
1 ounce sugar syrup
1 small egg
1/2 ounce lemon juice

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, sweet vermouth, sugar syrup, egg,

and lemon juice.
 Shake extra well.
 Strain into a chilled port glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  HONOLULU COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Okole Maluna! (Bottoms Up!)

2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce pineapple juice
1/2 ounce orange juice
1/4 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce sugar syrup
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, juices, sugar syrup, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a sugar-rimmed chilled martini glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  CHARLIE CHAPLIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: This little tramp will make your mustache wiggle.

1 1/2 ounces lime juice 
1 1/2 ounces sloe gin
1 1/2 ounces apricot brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lime juice, sloe gin, and brandy.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CREOLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Spicy and feisty…a drink that fights back.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
Dash Tabasco sauce
1 teaspoon lemon juice
1 1/2 ounces beef bouillon 
Salt and pepper to taste
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, Tabasco sauce, lemon juice, beef

bouillon, salt, and pepper.

 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

 CORONATION ‘37

Created to commemorate the crowning of King George VI,
who became King of England after the unexpected abdica-
tion of his brother, King Edward VIII. Lucky devil.

1 1/8 ounces gin
1 1/8 ounces orange curacao
1 1/8 ounces rum
1 1/8 ounces lemon juice

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, curacao, rum, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  FLORIDA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Believe  it  or  not, this  drink  has  no  oranges. Crazy, but
good.

1 1/2 ounces grapefruit juice
3/4 ounce Galliano
1 ounce gin
1/4 ounce Campari
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add grapefruit juice, Galliano, gin, and Campari.
 Shake.
 Strain into cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  HARVARD
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink this one and start talking like a Hah-vahd grad.

1 1/2 ounces brandy
3/4 ounce sweet vermouth
Dash Angostura bitters
1 teaspoon grenadine
2 teaspoons lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, vermouth, bitters, grenadine, and

lemon juice.

 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MARCONI WIRELESS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: Guglielmo Marconi first offered his radio signal
invention  to  the  Italians. They  turned  him  down. So  he
moved to England where in 1898, he flashed the results of
the Kingstown Regatta to a Dublin newspaper.

1 1/2 ounces apple brandy
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
2 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apple brandy, vermouth, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  METROPOLITAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sipped in the dark confines of sophisticated urban water-
ing holes everywhere.

1 1/4 ounce brandy
1 1/4 ounce sweet vermouth
1/2 teaspoon sugar syrup
Dash of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, vermouth, sugar syrup, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BABY TITTY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Order and proceed to giggle.

2/3 ounce anisette
2/3 ounce crème de yvette
2/3 ounce whipped cream
Cherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer the ingredients in the above order in a

sherry glass.
 Add a cherry.

title:
TITLE:  CHRYSANTHEMUM

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  fact:  In  Japanese  culture, the  chrysanthemum  is  a
symbol of perfection.

1 ounce Benedictine
1 ounce dry vermouth
1 teaspoon absinthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Benedictine, vermouth, and absinthe.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GILROY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Not to be confused with Kilroy.

Juice of 1/4 lemon
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
3/4 ounce cherry brandy
3/4 ounce dry gin
Dash of orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon, vermouth, brandy, gin, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 GIN & IT

It, presumably, being vermouth.

2 ounces dry gin
1 ounce sweet vermouth

 Pour gin and vermouth in a cocktail shaker.
 Stir with no ice.
 Pour into cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GOLDEN GATE COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Cool as an October night on the bay.

1 1/2 ounces dry gin
1 scoop orange sherbet
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and sherbet.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MOON RAKER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Share this with her, and you just might fly to the moon.
Careful not to burn up on re-entry.

3/4 ounce brandy
3/4 ounce red Dubonnet
3/4 ounce peach brandy
1/4 ounce pastis
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, Dubonnet, brandy, and pastis.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MONKEY GLAND
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: Believe it or not, this drink is named for a late-
nineteenth-century practice of transplanting simian testi-
cles into impotent men. No word on whether it worked, but
a Russian doctor became very rich.

3 ounces dry gin 
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
2 dashes absinthe
2 dashes grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, orange juice, absinthe, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  RED DEVIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: “The devil is most devilish when respectable.” —Elizabeth
Barrett Browning

2 ounces Irish whiskey
Dash Worcestershire sauce
1 1/2 ounces clam juice
1 1/2 ounces tomato juice
1/4 ounce lime juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, Worcestershire sauce, and all juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Sprinkle with pinch of pepper.

title:
TITLE:  SYMPHONY OF MOIST

JOY
description:
DESCRIPTION: One  really  cool  aspect  of  being  a  composer:  getting  an
entire orchestra to perform in harmonious rhythm, about
any subject you choose.

1/4 ounce grenadine
1/4 ounce green crème de menthe
1/4 ounce yellow Chartreuse
1/4 ounce cognac
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Build grenadine, crème de menthe, Chartreuse,

and cognac in a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  LOVING CUP
description:
DESCRIPTION: Winner takes all! 

6 ounces shaved ice
1 1/2 ounces passion fruit
2 ounces dry vermouth
4 ounces white rum
4 ounces champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with 6 ounces ice.
 Add passion fruit, vermouth, and rum.
 Shake.
 Fill a loving cup with ice.
 Add passion fruit mixture into the loving cup.
 Decorate with a half peach, red and green cherries,

and 4 colored straws.

 Add 4 ounces champagne.

title: TITLE:  SIX FEET UNDER
description:
DESCRIPTION: You’d have to be six feet under to refuse another glass of
this.

1 1/2 ounces Bacardi rum 
1 1/2 ounces Swedish punch
1 1/2 ounces calvados
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, Swedish punch, and calavdos.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Squeeze orange peel on top.

title: TITLE:  HOT TODDY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Classic cure for the flu.

1 teaspoon sugar
3 whole cloves
1 cinnamon stick
1 thin lemon slice
1 ounce bourbon
4 ounces boiling water
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Put sugar, cloves, cinnamon stick, and lemon slice

in a heat-resistant mug.

 Add 1 ounce boiling water.
 Stir.
 Let stand for 5 minutes.
 Add bourbon and 3 ounces boiling water.
 Stir.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  ZAZA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Made famous by the Astoria Hotel, this drink was a pop-
ular Depression-era cocktail.

1 3/4 ounces gin
3/4 ounce red Dubonnet
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and Dubonnet.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PRINCESS MARY
description:
DESCRIPTION: A drink for ladies who fancy the lush life.

1 1/2 ounces crème de cacao 
1 1/2 ounces cream
1 1/2 ounces dry gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de cacao, cream, and gin.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ROYAL SMILE
description:
DESCRIPTION: “Grin, wave  to  the  subjects…turn…grin, wave  to  the
subjects…”

1 ounce apple jack
1/2 ounce gin
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apple jack, gin, lemon juice, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  WEDDING BELLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: A true southern belle serves this at each of her weddings.

3/4 ounce gin
3/4 ounce red Dubonnet
1/2 ounce orange juice
1/2 ounce cherry brandy
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, Dubonnet, orange juice, and cherry

brandy.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GIGOLO COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: The go-to drink for gigolos of all eras.

1 teaspoon honey
1 ounce cream
1 ounce parfait amour
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour honey and cream into a cocktail glass.
 Stir.
 Add parfait amour.
 Stir.
 Dust with freshly grated nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  COCONUT GROVE
description:
DESCRIPTION: (FROM 1940S HOLLYWOOD NIGHTCLUB, THE
COCONUT GROVE)

Indulge  in  these  in  a  private  cabana. No  one  will  know
you’re being naughty.

1 1/2 ounces sweet vermouth
1 1/2 ounces dry vermouth
1 1/2 ounces dry gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouths and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a pineapple slice.

title: TITLE:  MAX BAER COCKTAIL
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, juices, grenadine, pastis, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 MAX BAER COCKTAIL

Named  for  a  heavyweight  boxing  champion  with  an
equally famous son, Max Baer, Jr. —Jethro on The Beverly
Hillbillies.

1 ounce gin
1 ounce apple brandy
1/4 ounce grenadine
1/4 ounce pastis

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apple brandy, grenadine, and pastis.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  MONTMARTRE SPECIAL

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A fitting tribute to the highest hill in Paris.

3 ounces Bacardi rum 
1 1/2 ounces cream
Dash grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, cream, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CABLEGRAM
description:
DESCRIPTION: Order up. STOP. Drink. STOP. Order another. DON’T STOP.

2 ounces blended whiskey
Juice of 1/2 lemon
1/2 teaspoon sugar
4 ounces ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with crushed ice.
 Fill with ginger ale.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  CORONATION
description:
DESCRIPTION: King me!

8 ounces sherry
8 ounces vermouth
Dash maraschino liqueur
2 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sherry, vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and

bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a pint glass.

title: TITLE:  HUNTRESS COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: For all modern-day Dianas, mistresses of the hunt.

3/4 ounce bourbon
3/4 ounce cherry liqueur
1 teaspoon triple sec
1 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, cherry liqueur, triple sec, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  ETHEL DUFFY
description:
DESCRIPTION: For brazen women everywhere who won’t take no for an
answer.

1 ounce apricot brandy
3/4 ounce white crème de menthe
3/4 ounce curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, crème de menthe, and curacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PEGGY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: The early twentieth century song says, “Peg o’ my heart, I
love  you, We’ll  never  part  for  I  love  you, dear  little  girl,
sweet little girl, sweeter than the Rose of Erin.” This drink
will have you echoing those sentiments.

1 1/2 ounces gin
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
1/4 ounce pastis
1/4 ounce red Dubonnet
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, pastis, and Dubonnet.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  PRESIDENT ROOSEVELT

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Both President Roosevelts enjoyed a cocktail. This one calls
for a fireside chat about world affairs.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1 ounce orange juice
Dash grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, orange juice, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  ROSCOE TURNER

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Named for the greatest air racing pilot of the Golden Age.
On your mark, get set…Jet!

1 1/2 ounces lemon juice
3 ounces gin
2 dashes of maraschino liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, gin, and maraschino liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  GINGER ROGERS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Dances gracefully across your palate.

1 1/2 ounces dry vermouth
1 1/2 ounces dry gin
1 1/2 ounces apricot brandy
4 dashes of lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth, gin, apricot brandy, and lemon

juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  HESITATION COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: This  will  buy  you  a  few  more  seconds  to  decide  which
direction to go—down the aisle or out the door.

Dash of lemon juice
1 ounce whiskey
3 ounces Swedish punch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon juice, whiskey, and Swedish punch.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  JOHNNY WEISMULLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Me Tarzan. You Jane. Want drink?

1 1/2 ounces gin 
1 1/2 ounces Bacardi rum
1 1/2 ounces lemon juice
Dash of grenadine
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, rum, lemon juice, grenadine, and pow-dered sugar.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  JEAN HARLOW 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Spencer Tracy said of her, “A square shooter if there ever
was one.” Raise your glass to this silent film diva.

2 ounces Bacardi rum
2 ounces sweet vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum and vermouth.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title: TITLE:  SAUCY SUE COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: We like ’em like this. The saucier, the better.

1/2 teaspoon apricot brandy
1/2 teaspoon absinthe
2 ounces apple jack
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apricot brandy, absinthe, and apple jack.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  FIFTH AVENUE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Finish this one up and head to Saks.

1/3 ounce crème de cacao 
1/3 ounce apricot nectar
1/3 ounce cream
directions: DIRECTIONS:  Carefully layer in a cordial glass.

title: TITLE:  HAVANA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Made  especially  for  enjoying  on  snow  white  Cuban
beaches.

1 1/4 ounces pineapple juice
3/4 ounce rum
1/2 teaspoon lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BRANDY MILK PUNCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: Who knew you could visit the bar and build healthy teeth
and bones at the same time? Does a body good! 

1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 ounces brandy
1/2 pint milk
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add powdered sugar, brandy, and milk.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title:
TITLE:  FRANKENJACK 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Not nearly as frightening as the name might suggest. Just
don’t turn your back on it.

1 ounce dry gin
3/4 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce apricot brandy
1 teaspoon triple sec
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, apricot brandy, and triple sec.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with triple sec.

title: TITLE:  HOT BUTTERED RUM
description:
DESCRIPTION: A winter  classic  best  sipped  by  the  fire  with  family  and
friends.

2 ounces rum
Square of butter
1 sugar cube
Water, boiling
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Place sugar cube into heat-resistant mug.
 Fill two-thirds with boiling water.
 Add butter and rum.
 Stir.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title:
TITLE:  MERRY WIDOW 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: As Helen  Rowland  once  said, “A  widow  is  a  fascinating
being with the flavor of maturity, the spice of experience,
the piquancy of novelty, the tang of practiced coquetry, and
the halo of one man’s approval.” We couldn’t have said it
any better.

1 1/4 ounces dry gin
1 1/4 ounces dry vermouth
1/2 teaspoon Benedictine
1/2 teaspoon absinthe
Dash of Orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, Benedictine, absinthe, and

bitters.

 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a lemon peel.

title:
TITLE:  MILLION DOLLAR

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: If your name is Rockefeller, you get to run a tab.

1 1/2 ounces bourbon
1/2 ounce curacao
1/4 teaspoon grenadine
1 egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add bourbon, curacao, grenadine, and egg white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MIKADO COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: For intermission at the opera house.

2 ounces brandy
1/2 teaspoon crème de cacao
1/2 teaspoon curacao
2 dashes of Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, crème de cacao, curacao, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  MORNING GLORY FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: What’s the story, Morning Glory?

2 ounces scotch
1/2 teaspoon absinthe
1 egg white
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
Juice of 1/2 lemon
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add scotch, absinthe, egg white, powdered sugar,

and lemon.

 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  POLLYANNA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Go  ahead  and  order  it. The  glass  is  half  full, and  every-
thing will work out just fine.

3 slices pineapple
3 slices orange
2 ounces dry gin
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
1/2 teaspoon grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Muddle pineapple and orange slices.
 Put mixture into a cocktail glass.
 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into the cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SEVILLA COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A delicious delight from southern Spain.

1 ounce rum
1 ounce port
1 egg
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, port, egg, and powdered sugar.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  UNION JACK COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Hail, Britannia!

1 1/2 ounces dry gin
3/4 ounce crème de yvette
1/2 teaspoon grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de yvette, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  CHARLIE ROSE
description:
DESCRIPTION: If we ever get invited onto his talk show, we’ll be sure to
bring some of these to break the ice.

1 ounce brandy
Lemon slice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour brandy into a pony glass.
 Add lemon slice on top.

title: TITLE:  FAIRY BELLE COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: A magical, pixie-dusted  place  where  fairy  dreams  come
true. The drinker will float there on gossamer wings.

1 egg white
1 teaspoon grenadine
1 ounce apricot liqueur
3 ounces dry gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add egg white, grenadine, apricot liqueur, and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  JUPITER COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: This  largest  of  the  planets  features  one  big  red  eye. You
may end up with two.

1 teaspoon orange juice
1 teaspoon parfait amour
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
1 1/2 ounces dry gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add orange juice, parfait amour, vermouth, and

gin.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SABBATH CALM
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sip liberally on the day of rest.

1 ounce brandy
1 ounce coffee
1 ounce port
1 whole egg
1/2 teaspoon sugar
2 ounces cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, coffee, port, egg, and sugar.
 Add cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a goblet.
 Dash with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  PANZERWAGEN
description:
DESCRIPTION: A model  of  German  efficiency. Smooth  as  silk  and  purrs
like a kitten.

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce gin
1/2 ounce Cointreau
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, gin, and Cointreau.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Serve with side of green olives and almonds.

title: TITLE:  LOTUS CLUB COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: Lotus flowers, native to Asia, have long symbol-
ized spiritual enlightenment.

1 lump sugar
2 to 3 drops Angostura bitters
Dash Pernod
2 ounces whiskey
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Muddle a lump of sugar with a few drops of bitters

in cocktail shaker.

 Add a dash of Pernod and whiskey.
 Stir.
 Pour over one ice cube in an old-fashioned glass.
 Garnish with lime peel.

title: TITLE:  TANGO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Named after the tango craze of 1915, certainly meant to
make you hit the dance floor. In more ways than one.

1 1/2 ounces gin
1 1/2 ounces sweet vermouth
1 egg white
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and egg white.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  POINSETTIA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Unlike its namesake, this cocktail is hardly poisonous to its
drinker.

2 ounces lemon-flavored vodka 
8 ounces cranberry juice 
Splash champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and cranberry juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a martini glass.
 Splash with champagne.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  SHERRY COBBLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Santa Claus likes for a sherry to greet him in England on
Christmas Eve. Not milk.

2 ounces club soda
1 teaspoon sugar
2 1/2 ounces sherry
1/2 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill a double old-fashioned glass with crushed ice.
 Add club soda, sugar, sherry, and orange juice.
 Garnish with fruit.

title: TITLE:  SNOW BUNNY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Every man hopes to find one of these on his ski weekend
getaway.

1 1/2 ounces triple sec
Hot chocolate
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour triple sec into a heavy mug.
 Fill with hot chocolate.
 Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

title: TITLE:  PEPPERMINT STICK
description:
DESCRIPTION: If you’ve been good, maybe you’ll find one of these waiting
for you before bedtime on Christmas Eve.

1 ounce peppermint schnapps
1 1/2 ounces white crème de menthe
1 ounce light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add schnapps, crème de menthe, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a champagne flute.

title: TITLE:  ICEBALL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Avoid getting hit in the head with one of these in a snow-
ball fight, but be sure to mix one up for an evening relax-
ing by the fire.

1 1/2 ounces gin
3/4 ounce white crème de menthe
3/4 ounce sambuca
2 to 3 teaspoons cream
3 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour gin, crème de menthe, sambuca, cream, and

ice in a blender.

 Blend for 15 seconds at medium speed until

smooth.

 Pour into a goblet.

title: TITLE:  WASSAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: If  some  yells  “wassail” during  the  holidays, the  proper
reply is “be in good health.”

2 quarts apple cider
1/2 cup brown sugar
1 1/3 cups lemon juice
6 cinnamon sticks
12 whole cloves
12 whole allspice
1 1/2 teaspoons nutmeg
2 fifths dry sherry
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Place apple cider, brown sugar, lemon juice, and

all spices in a pot.

 Bring to a boil.
 Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
 Remove spices from mixture.
 Add sherry.
 Heat until just below boiling.
 Fill a punch bowl with boiling water.
 Let stand for one minute to heat bowl.
 Pour water out of punch bowl.
 Pour wassail mixture from stove to punch bowl.
 Garnish with orange or lemon slices studded

with cloves.

(Serves 25)

title: TITLE:  WINTER SPARKLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: A bubbly  concoction  designed  to  lighten  up  any  family
festivity.

Juice of 1 lemon
Juice of 1 lime
8 ounces Southern Comfort
8 ounces peach schnapps
2 fifths brut champagne
3 peaches
30 whole cloves
Ice block
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Place ice in punch bowl.
 Add juices.
 Add peach schnapps and Southern Comfort.
 Stir.
 Stud peach skins with cloves and add to bowl.
 Add champagne.
 Stir gently.
(Serves 25)

title: TITLE:  MULLED WINE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  Fact:  Mull  is  an  old  English  word  for  “dust,” which
explains why the drink is dusted with so many spices.

3/5 red wine
Juice of one orange
1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
1/2 teaspoon cinnamon 
1/2 teaspoon powdered cloves
2 tablespoons whole cloves
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour wine, juice of the orange, and all spices into a

pot.

 Heat until warm.
 Pour into mugs.
 Add honey or brown sugar to taste.
(Serves 12–15)

title: TITLE:  BLIZZARD
description:
DESCRIPTION: Floridian  snow  birds  can  enjoy these  frosty  nips  on  the
patio at Christmas while the rest of the country freezes.

3 ounces bourbon
1 ounce cranberry juice
1 tablespoon lemon juice
2 tablespoons sugar syrup
3 ounces crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour bourbon, juices, sugar syrup, and ice into

blender.

 Blend on low speed until smooth.
 Pour into a large wineglass or a highball glass.

title: TITLE:  CHRISTMAS CHEER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ready? Okay! Give me an S! A! N! T! A! Go Santa!

1 gallon apple cider
8 cinnamon sticks
1 1/2 cups rum
1 cup applejack
3/4 cup apple schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Bring cider and cinnamon to a boil in a pot.
 Reduce heat and add rum, applejack, and apple

schnapps.

 Stir until heated.
 Serve in pousse café glasses.
5 .Garnish with cinnamon sticks.
(Serves 50)

title:
TITLE:  CHRISTMAS 

WONDERLAND
description:
DESCRIPTION: It’s a beautiful sight, we’re drinking tonight…stumbling in
a Christmas wonderland.

1 ounce vanilla vodka
1 ounce crème de cacao
1 ounce green crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, crème de cacao, and crème de menthe.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SILK STOCKINGS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Mrs. Claus’s  preferred  nightcap  after  Santa’s  big  sleigh
ride.

2 ounces tequila
1 ounce crème de cacao
2 ounces light cream 
Dash grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, crème de cacao, cream, and grenadine.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Dust with cinnamon.

title: TITLE:  SNOWBALL
description:
DESCRIPTION: No need to cross your fingers. You do have a chance in hell
of tasting one of these.

1 ounce gin
1/4 ounce white crème de cacao
1/4 ounce Pernod
1/4 ounce crème de yvette
1/4 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de cacao, Pernod, crème de yvette,

and cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled deep-saucer champagne glass.

title: TITLE:  GLUHWEIN
description:
DESCRIPTION: A German “glowing wine” to share with your fräulein.

5 ounces claret wine or sweet red wine 
1 sugar cube 
Dash Angostura bitters
Juice of 1/2 lemon
Dash cinnamon 
Dash nutmeg
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Simmer all ingredients in a pot on the stove until

just boiling.

 Pour into a glass coffee mug.

title: TITLE:  GLOGG
description:
DESCRIPTION: A classic Scandinavian hot spiced wine punch that warms
the soul at Christmas.

1 bottle full-bodied red wine
1/3 cup raisins
1/3 cup blanched almonds
5 crushed cardamom
5 whole cloves
1 cinnamon stick
1 peel of a small orange
4 ounces vodka or cognac (bartender’s choice)
Sugar to taste
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Mix wine, raisins, almonds, and spices in a con-tainer with a lid. Reserve a few raisins and
almonds for garnish.

 Let the mixture stand in a closed container at

room temperature for 24 hours.

 Before serving, heat the mixture on the stove on

medium-high heat until boiling.

 Add vodka and sugar.
 Serve hot with a few raisins and blanched

almonds in each cup.

(Serves 6)

title: TITLE:  COOL YULE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: For the hip kids who crave Rat Pack status during the hol-
idays.

3 ounces vodka 
1/2 ounce dry vermouth 
1 teaspoon peppermint schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, vermouth, and peppermint schnapps.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a small candy cane.

title: TITLE:  STAR
description:
DESCRIPTION: I wish  I  may, I  wish  I  might, have  another  sip  of  this
tonight.

1 1/2 ounces apple brandy
1 1/2 ounces sweet vermouth 
2 dashes orange bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apple brandy, vermouth, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  PEPPERMINT PATTY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sir, can I pour you another?

1/2 ounce peppermint schnapps
1/2 ounce dark crème de cacao
1 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour peppermint schnapps and crème de cacao

into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

 Add cream.
 Stir.

title: TITLE:  MISTLETOE MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: Instructions: Hold over your head. Hope for the best.

1 ounce vodka
3/4 ounce melon liqueur
Dash of grenadine syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka and melon liqueur.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with

red sugar.

 Float with red grenadine.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  EGGNOG FOR TWO
description:
DESCRIPTION: A snuggle bunny drink to share while watching the lights
twinkle on the tree.

3 eggs
4 ounces sugar
1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1/2 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce dark rum
8 ounces heavy cream
8 ounces milk
Note: Keep all ingredients refrigerated in advance of
making this drink.
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Beat the eggs and sugar until thick.
 Add vanilla and nutmeg.
 Continue to beat mixture.
 Add brandy, rum, heavy cream, and milk.
 Stir.
 Chill before serving.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title:
TITLE:  EGGNOG CARIBBEAN

STYLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Bring  out  the  nog  and  the  Christmas  calypso  music  and
watch Aunt Margo shimmy the night away.

3 eggs
1/2 cup sugar
1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1 ounce light rum
8 ounces heavy cream
4 ounces milk
4 ounces of coconut milk
Note: Keep all ingredients refrigerated in advance of
making this drink.
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Beat the eggs and sugar until thick.
 Add vanilla and nutmeg.
 Continue to beat mixture.
 Add rum, heavy cream, milk, and coconut milk.
 Stir.
 Chill before serving in highball glasses.
 Garnish with coconut flakes.
(Serves 2)

title: TITLE:  CHRISTMAS MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: ’Tis the season to act like Dean Martin and the gang. Baby,
it’s cold outside, but we’ve got our love to keep us warm.

3 ounces gin
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
1 teaspoon peppermint schnapps
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and peppermint schnapps.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a candy cane.

title:
TITLE:  SANTA CLAUS IS 

COMING TO TOWN
description:
DESCRIPTION: And he’ll be expecting this by the fireside. Don’t disappoint
him.

1 1/2 ounces peppermint schnapps
1 1/2 ounces cinnamon schnapps
1 1/2 ounces melon liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour schnapps and melon liqueur in a chilled

deep-saucer champagne glass.

 Top with whipped cream.

title: TITLE:  CAROLING WINE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  carols  sound  quite  different  at  the  tenth  house  than
they did at the first when carolers take a thermos of this
along.

8 ounces water 
8 ounces brown sugar 
16 ounces pineapple juice 
8 ounces orange juice 
6 whole cloves 
3 whole allspice berries 
2 cinnamon sticks
Rind of 2 oranges
1/2 teaspoon salt 
32 ounces red wine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour water, brown sugar, pineapple juice, and

orange juice in a large nonaluminum saucepan.
 Add cloves, allspice, 2 cinnamon sticks, and salt.
 Add orange rinds.
 Bring mixture to a boil.
 Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
 Add wine.
 Heat to just boiling and remove from heat.
 Serve hot with a cinnamon stick for garnish.
(Serves 8)

title: TITLE:  HOLIDAY CHEER
description:
DESCRIPTION: Good tidings to you and all of your kin.

1 bottle champagne
1 can frounceen cranberry juice concentrate, thawed
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour champagne and cranberry juice concentrate

into a punch bowl.

 Stir.
 Decorate with lime slices.
(Serves 10)

title: TITLE:  SIBERIAN SLEIGH RIDE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Giddy up, giddy up, let’s go.

1 1/4 ounces vodka
3/4 ounce créme de cacao 
1/2 ounce white créme de menthe 
3 ounces light cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, crème de cacao, crème de menthe,

and light cream.

 Shake.
 Strain into a snifter.
 Sprinkle with chocolate shavings.

title: TITLE:  NEW YEAR MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: It’s almost midnight. Hang on to this one with your right
hand. Grab someone to kiss with your left.

Blue curacao 
Champagne
1 ounce vodka 
1 sugar cube
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Soak the sugar cube in blue curacao in a small

bowl.

 Pour the champagne into a cocktail shaker.
 Let stand for 5 seconds.
 Add vodka.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled martini glass.
 Drop in the curacao-soaked sugar cube.

title: TITLE:  RESOLUTION MARTINI
description:
DESCRIPTION: This year I promise to behave…Another one please. It’s not
midnight yet.

3 ounces gin
1 ounce apricot brandy
1/2 ounce lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, apricot brandy, and lemon juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  BLACK TURNCOAT
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tis the season to toast the treason.

2 ounces chilled tequila
Juice of 1/2 lime
Splash water 
Chilled cola
2 ice cubes
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour chilled tequila and lime juice into a rocks

glass with ice cubes.

 Add a splash of water.
 Stir.
 Top with chilled cola.
 Garnish with lime twists.

title: TITLE:  THE COCKROACH
description:
DESCRIPTION: La  Cucaracha!  Nothing  says  a  party  like  flaming  cock-
roaches.

1 1/2 ounces tequila
1 ounce coffee liqueur
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass.

 Flame with a lighter.

title: TITLE:  THE GIRAFFE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun fact: Giraffes have 18-inch prehensile tongues. Guard
drink accordingly.

1 1/2 ounces tequila
Grapefruit juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila into an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Swirl.
 Fill with grapefruit juice.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  SWEET TEQUILA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sip slowly. Have deep thoughts.

2 ounces tequila
1 ounce Pernod
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila and Pernod in a cocktail shaker.
 Stir.
 Pour into a brandy snifter.

title: TITLE:  COCKTAIL ATTACK
description:
DESCRIPTION: Take  cover!  When  cocktails  attack...Next  on  the  Food
Channel.

2 ounces tequila
1 ounce triple sec
1 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 lime 
Crushed ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour tequila, triple sec, and vermouth into a cocktail

glass.

 Squeeze in the juice from the lime.
 Add crushed ice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled champagne glass.
 Garnish a lime twist.

title: TITLE:  LA TUNA
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sorry Charlie. This drink is mine.

4 dashes of Angostura bitters
1 1/2 ounces tequila
1 teaspoon lime juice
Club soda
Salt
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour bitters, tequila, and lime juice into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

 Fill with club soda.
 Sprinkle salt on top.

title: TITLE:  TEQUILA DRY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Ssssh. Don’t tell anyone. Top secret info says super spies
love to indulge in these “Mexican martinis” when looking
for bad guys south of the border.

1 1/2 ounces tequila
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
1/4 ounce grenadine 
2 ice cubes
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour the tequila, vermouth, and grenadine into a

cocktail shaker.

 Stir.
 Add the two ice cubes.
 Garnish with lime or orange wheel.

title: TITLE:  TURBO
description:
DESCRIPTION: Grab the handle bars and buckle up. Zero to sixty in five
seconds flat.

1 ounce tequila
1 ounce vodka
4 ounces tropical fruit punch
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, vodka, and fruit punch.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass.

title: TITLE:  TEQUILA FURNACE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Turn up the heat.

5 to 10 drops Tabasco sauce 
1 1/2 ounces tequila
Salt
Lime wedge
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Drip Tabasco into a shot glass.
 Top with tequila.
 Consumed in the classic style: lick the salt, shoot

the tequila, and suck the lime.

title: TITLE:  NUBE NUEVE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Cloud Nine…Up, up and away.

1 ounce tequila
1 ounce brandy
1 egg beaten
Juice of 2 limes
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, brandy, egg, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a mint sprig.

title: TITLE:  SENORITA
description:
DESCRIPTION: A staple at Rose’s Cantina consumed by many a victim of
Felina’s enchanting charms.

6 ounces tequila
6 ounces lime juice
4 1/2 ounces curacao
Salt
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add tequila, lime juice, and curacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into salt-rimmed goblets.
(Serves 6)

title: TITLE:  EL PRESIDENTE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Worthy of a head of state.

1 1/2 ounces light rum
1/2 ounce vermouth
2 dashes of grenadine
Juice of 1/2 lime
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rum, vermouth, grenadine, and lime juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  INCOME TAX
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fill out the forms. Write the check. Drink until you forget.

1 ounce gin
1 teaspoon dry vermouth
1 teaspoon sweet vermouth
1/2 ounce orange juice
2 to 3 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouths, orange juice, and bitters
 Shake.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

EARTH DAY

title: TITLE:  SAVE THE PLANET
description:
DESCRIPTION: You have the whole world in your glass.

1 ounce vodka
1 ounce melon liqueur
1/2 ounce blue curacao
1 to 2 dashes green Chartreuse
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, melon liqueur, blue curacao, and

green Chartreuse.

 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  BLARNEY STONE

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun  Fact:  Kissing  the  Blarney  Stone  gives  the  kisser  the
gift of great persuasiveness.

2 ounces Irish whiskey
1/2 teaspoon absinthe
1/2 curacao
1/4 teaspoon maraschino liqueur
Dash Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, absinthe, curacao, maraschino

liqueur, and bitters.

 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel twist and an olive.

title: TITLE:  CHILLY IRISHMAN
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de menthe, Chartreuse, whiskey, and

bitters.

 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 CHILLY IRISHMAN

Begorrah! Get this man a scarf.

3 ounces cold espresso
1 ounce Irish whiskey
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
1 scoop vanilla ice cream
Dash sugar syrup
4 cups crushed ice

 Combine all ingredients in a blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a parfait glass.
 Garnish with a three-leaf clover.

title: TITLE:  IRISH DREAM
description:
DESCRIPTION: An  iridescent  vision  of  rainbows  and  lush  green  hills
where fairies scamper.

1/2 ounce hazelnut liqueur
1/2 ounce Irish cream liqueur
3/4 ounce crème de cacao
4 ounces vanilla ice cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Combine all ingredients in a blender.
 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a frosted pilsner glass.
 Top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

 EVERYBODY’S IRISH

COCKTAIL

At least on March 17th they are.

1 teaspoon green crème de menthe
1 teaspoon green Chartreuse
2 ounces Irish whiskey

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add crème de menthe, Chartreuse, and whiskey.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a green olive.

title:
TITLE:  CLOVER LEAF 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: I’m looking over a four-leaf clover. Oh, maybe it’s my glass.

Juice of 1 lime
2 teaspoons grenadine
1 egg white
1 1/2 ounces gin
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lime, grenadine, egg white, and gin.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with a mint leaf.

title: TITLE:  DUBLIN COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: If you order two, is it a double Dublin?

2 ounces Irish whiskey
1 teaspoon green Chartreuse
3 dashes green crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, Chartreuse, and crème de menthe.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  EMERALD ISLE COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: As  William  Drennan  said  in  1795, “Nor  one  feeling  of
vengeance presume to defile/The cause, or the men, of the
Emerald Isle.”

2 ounces dry gin
1 teaspoon green crème de menthe
3 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add dry gin, crème de menthe, and bitters.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  GREEN FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Pink hearts, yellow moons, orange stars…green fizz.

2 ounces dry gin
1 teaspoon green crème de menthe
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
1 egg white
Juice of 1/2 lemon
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de menthe, powdered sugar, egg

white, and lemon.

 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  GREEN ROOM COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Where  leprechauns  wait  before  their  Tonight  Show
appearance.

3/4 ounce brandy
1 1/2 ounces dry vermouth
1/2 teaspoon curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, dry vermouth, and curacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SHAMROCK COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: The  man  who  has  luck  in  the  morning  has  luck  in  the
afternoon. And a shamrock never hurts either.

1 1/2 ounces Irish whiskey
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
1 teaspoon green crème de menthe
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, vermouth, and crème de menthe.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an olive.

title: TITLE:  GREEN SWIZZLE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Here’s to the old lady up on the hill. If she won’t drink it,
oh, well—I will!

2 ounces dry gin
2 dashes Angostura bitters
1 tablespoon green crème de menthe
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
Juice of 1 lime
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour gin, bitters, crème de menthe, powdered

sugar, and lime in a collins glass with shaved ice.

 Stir.
 Fill with club soda.
 Stir again.

title: TITLE:  LEPRECHAUN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Magically delicious, so sayeth one lucky pixie.

2 ounces Irish whiskey
Tonic water
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour whiskey in an old-fashioned glass with ice.
 Fill with tonic water.
 Stir.
 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  LEPRECHAUN LIBATION
description:
DESCRIPTION: A popular favorite in leprechaun haunts all over Erin.

1 ounce green crème de menthe
2 1/2 ounces Irish whiskey
3 1/2 ounces ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour crème de menthe, whiskey, and ice into a

blender.

 Blend.
 Pour into a goblet or large wine glass.

title: TITLE:  PADDY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: As my uncle Paddy once said, “May the enemies of Ireland
never meet a friend.”

1 1/2 ounces Irish whiskey
3/4 ounce sweet vermouth
3 dashes Angostura bitters
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, vermouth, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  EMERALD ISLE COOLER
description:
DESCRIPTION: May  the  leprechauns  be  near  you  to  spread  luck  along
your way.

3 scoops vanilla ice cream
1 ounce green crème de menthe
1 ounce Irish whiskey
1 ounce club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vanilla ice cream, green crème de menthe,

and Irish whiskey into a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a chilled highball glass.
 Add club soda.
 Stir gently.

title: TITLE:  TOP OF THE MORNING
description:
DESCRIPTION: A good laugh and a long sleep are the two best cures for
all that ails you. Along with this drink.

1 ounce brandy
1/2 ounce apple brandy
1/2 ounce sweet vermouth
Dash of lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandies, vermouth, and lemon juice.
 Stir well from bottom.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Serve with one olive.

title: TITLE:  LITTLE GREEN FAIRY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Tinkerbell’s tipple of choice.

2 ounces green Chartreuse
2 ounces Benedictine
1/5 bottle white dinner wine
2 ounces blue curacao
2 ounces cherry brandy
2/5 bottle brut champagne
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour Chartreuse, Benedictine, wine, curacao, and

brandy in a pitcher.

 Stir and chill.
 When ready to serve, pour into a champagne bowl.
 Add champagne.
(Serves 25)

title: TITLE:  GREEN FIRE
description:
DESCRIPTION: The burning  ring  of  green  fire. It’s caused  many a good
Irishman to chase the rainbow.

1 1/2 ounces gin
2 teaspoons green crème de menthe
2 teaspoons kummel
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, crème de menthe, and kummel.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Add ice.

title: TITLE:  AMERICAN FLAG
description:
DESCRIPTION: When mixed properly, these colors don’t run.

1/2 ounce grenadine 
1/2 ounce cream
1/2 ounce blue curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer in above order carefully in pousse café glass

or a pony.

title: TITLE:  LIBERTY COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Take this cocktail to your tired, poor, huddled masses.

1 1/2 ounces apple brandy
3/4 ounce light rum
1/4 teaspoon sugar syrup
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add apple brandy, rum, and sugar syrup.
 Stir.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  FIREWORKS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Toss one back and prepare to witness mental pyrotechnics.
Kaboom!

1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce light rum
1/2 ounce tequila
3 ounces pineapple juice
1 ounce cream of coconut
2 teaspoons milk
1 drop grenadine
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, rum, tequila, pineapple juice, cream

of coconut, milk, and grenadine.

 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass half filled with ice.
5 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  BETSY ROSS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Fun Fact: Betsy Ross was excommunicated by the Quak-
ers. Maybe because she enjoyed too much brandy.

1 1/2 ounces brandy
1 1/2 ounces port
2 dashes Angostura bitters
2 dashes blue curacao
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add brandy, port, bitters, and blue curacao.
 Stir.
 Strain into a brandy snifter.

title:
TITLE:  YANKEE DOODLE

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: One word: Dandy.

1 3/4 ounces gin
1/4 ounce cream
1/4 ounce lemon juice
1/4 ounce crème de yvette
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, cream, lemon juice, and crème de Yvette.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  AMERICAN GLORY

HIGHBALL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Keep your eye on the grand old flag. Hard to do after an
afternoon of these.

1 1/2 ounces champagne
1 1/2 ounces orange juice
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour champagne and orange juice into a highball

glass with ice.

 Stir.
 Fill with club soda.

title:
TITLE:  STARS AND STRIPES

POUSSE CAFE
description:
DESCRIPTION: Every heart beats true for this red, white, and blue.

2/3 ounce grenadine
2/3 ounce white crème de menthe
2/3 ounce crème de yvette
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer carefully in above order in a pousse café

glass.

VALENTINE’S DAY

title: TITLE:  THE KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Sweet as your first.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
1/2 ounce chocolate liqueur
1/4 ounce cherry liqueur
3/4 ounce heavy cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, liqueurs, and cream.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title:
TITLE:  HANKY PANKY 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Too little hanky panky can leave your mate very cranky.

1 3/4 ounces gin
3/4 ounce sweet vermouth
1/4 ounce Fernet Branca
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, and Fernet Branca.
 Stir.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Garnish with an orange peel.

title: TITLE:  RED HOT PASSION
description:
DESCRIPTION: A sure-fire recipe for afternoon delight.

1/2 ounce bourbon
1/2 ounce amaretto
1/2 ounce Southern Comfort
1/4 ounce sloe gin
Splash triple sec 
Splash orange juice
Splash pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour all ingredients over ice into a hurricane glass.
 Stir gently.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

title: TITLE:  KISS IN THE DARK
description:
DESCRIPTION: A nice way to end the day. Or begin the night.

3/4 ounce gin
3/4 ounce cherry brandy
1/4 ounce dry vermouth
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, cherry brandy, and vermouth.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  SWEETIE BABY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Serve with a side of candy hearts and say “I love you.”

2 ounces amaretto
5 ounces vanilla ice cream
1/2 ounce milk (optional)
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour amaretto, ice cream, and milk into a blender.
 Blend at medium speed until smooth.
 Pour into a goblet.
 Garnish with crushed almonds.

title: TITLE:  SOUL KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: The best way to kiss your soul mate.

1 ounce whiskey
1 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce Dubonnet
3/4 ounce orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add whiskey, vermouth, Dubonnet, and orange

juice.

 Stir.
 Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

title:
TITLE:  CHOCOLATE COFFEE

KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: The consummate accent to a snowy Valentine’s Day spent
watching An Affair to Remember.

3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
3/4 ounce Irish cream liqueur
Splash crème de cacao
Splash Grand Marnier
1 1/2 ounces chocolate syrup
Hot coffee
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour liqueurs into an Irish coffee glass.
 Add chocolate syrup.
 Fill with coffee.
 Top with whipped cream.
 Garnish with shaved chocolate and a cherry.

title: TITLE:  HOT KISS
description:
DESCRIPTION: e.e. Cummings said it best: “Kisses are a better fate than
wisdom.”

1/2 ounce white crème de menthe
1 ounce Irish whiskey
1/2 ounce white crème de cacao
6 ounces hot coffee
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour liqueurs and whiskey into an Irish coffee

glass.

 Add coffee.
 Stir.
 Top with whipped cream.
 Garnish with a chocolate-covered mint.

 LOVER’S DELIGHT

COCKTAIL

Sky rockets in flight...

1/2 ounce dry gin
1 teaspoon orange sherbet

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin and orange sherbet.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.
 Dust with nutmeg.

title: TITLE:  AMOROUS DUO
description: DESCRIPTION:
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add sherry, egg, powdered sugar, and pepper.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

 AMOROUS DUO

Antony and Cleopatra. Romeo and Juliet. Tracy and Hep-
burn. Are you next?

1 ounce raspberry schnapps
1/4 ounce amaretto
1 scoop vanilla ice cream
2 ounces crushed ice

 Pour raspberry schnapps, amaretto, vanilla ice

cream, and ice into a blender.

 Blend until smooth.
 Pour into a brandy snifter.

title:
TITLE:  GODDESS OF LOVE

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Aphrodite’s favorite concoction for lovers in love.

1 3/4 ounces pastis
3/4 ounce anisette
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add pastis and anisette.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  KISS ME QUICK
description:
DESCRIPTION: Before I change my mind.

2 ounces Pernod
2 dashes Angostura bitters
1 teaspoon Cointreau
1 ounce club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Add Pernod, bitters, and Cointreau to an old-fash-ioned glass with ice.

 Stir.
 Top with club soda.

title: TITLE:  PINK ROSE FIZZ
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink this rose and think sweet thoughts.

Juice of 1/2 lemon
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
1 egg white
1/2 teaspoon grenadine
2 teaspoons cream
2 ounces dry gin
Club soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add lemon, powdered sugar, egg white, grena-dine, cream, and gin.

 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass.
 Fill with club soda.

title: TITLE:  WILD FLING
description:
DESCRIPTION: Everybody should have at least one in their lifetime.

1 1/2 ounces wilderberry schnapps
4 ounces pineapple juice
Splash cranberry juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour schnapps in a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with pineapple juice.
 Splash with cranberry juice.
 Stir.

title:
TITLE:  FRANKENSTEIN 

COCKTAIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Don’t be surprised if the villagers chase you around with
torches.

1 ounce dry gin
1 ounce dry vermouth
1/2 ounce apricot liqueur
1/2 ounce Cointreau
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vermouth, apricot liqueur, and Cointreau.
 Shake.
 Strain into a cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  RED DEVIL
description:
DESCRIPTION: Keeper of the “spirits” of the dead.

1/2 ounce sloe gin
1/2 ounce vodka
1/2 ounce Southern Comfort
1/2 ounce triple sec
1/2 ounce banana liqueur
2 tablespoon Rose’s lime juice
2 ounces orange juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add gin, vodka, Southern Comfort, triple sec,

banana liqueur, and juices.

 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass.

title: TITLE:  BLACK MAGIC
description:
DESCRIPTION: Only devil women with evil on their minds partake in this
libation.

1 1/2 ounces vodka
3/4 ounce coffee liqueur
1 to 2 dashes lemon juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka, coffee liqueur, and lemon juice into

an old-fashioned glass with ice.

 Garnish with a lemon twist.

title: TITLE:  INCANTATIONS
description:
DESCRIPTION: Take a lesson from the witches of Macbeth. Double, double
toil and trouble. Fire burn and cauldron bubble. Repeat as
needed.

1 ounce vodka 
1/2 ounce green curacao 
2 ounces lemonade 
2 to 3 drops grenadine
3 ounces ice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Add vodka, curacao, and lemonade in a blender

with ice.

 Blend until slushy.
 Pour into extra large martini glass or goblet.
 Drip grenadine over glass.
 Garnish with sugar-coated lime wedge.

title: TITLE:  BLACK WITCH
description:
DESCRIPTION: She’s no Glenda the Good Witch.

1 1/2 ounces gold rum
1/4 ounce dark rum
1/4 ounce apricot brandy
1/2 ounce pineapple juice
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add rums, apricot brandy, and pineapple juice.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

 CAT’S EYE

Fun fact: Legend has it that when you see a one-eyed cat,
you  should  spit  on  your  thumb, stamp  it  in  the  palm  of
your hand, make a wish, and it will come true. What can
it hurt?

2 ounces dry vermouth
1/2 ounce yellow Chartreuse
2 dashes orange bitters

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vermouth, Chartreuse, and bitters.
 Shake.
 Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: TITLE:  HEADLESS HORSEMAN
description:
DESCRIPTION: Throw back a few of these while you still have a noggin.

2 ounces vodka
3 dashes Angostura bitters
Ginger ale
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour vodka and bitters into a collins glass with ice.
 Fill with ginger ale.
 Stir.
 Garnish with an orange slice.

 VAMPIRE’S DELIGHT

Dracula  enjoys  these  for  a  change  of  pace. Love  at  first
bite, indeed.

2 ounces rum 
1 banana 
2 scoops vanilla ice cream 
Grenadine 

 Place banana, rum, and ice cream in blender.
 Blend on low for about 15 seconds until smooth.
 Swirl grenadine into two champagne flutes until

it coats the inside of the glasses.

 Add banana mixture.
 Serve with cherry.

title: TITLE:  BLACK WIDOW
description:
DESCRIPTION: Less  deadly  than  the  spider’s  venom. At  least  in  small
doses.

1/2 ounce strawberry liqueur
1/2 ounce sambuca
1/2 ounce cream
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Layer in above order in a shot glass.

 WITCH’S BREW

The  popular  year-around  drink  in  Salem. Bottoms  up,
Esmeralda.

2 ounces Strega
1/2 ounce crème de menthe
1 ounce lemon juice
1 ounce orange juice 
Pernod

 Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add Strega, crème de menthe, and juices.
 Shake.
 Strain into a collins glass with shaved ice.
 Float three or four drops Pernod.
 Decorate with fresh mint.

title: TITLE:  DEMON POSSESSION
description:
DESCRIPTION: This one may make your head spin.

1 ounce citrus vodka
1 ounce light rum
1/4 ounce blue curacao 
Lemonade
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add vodka, rum, and curacao.
 Shake.
 Strain into a highball glass with ice.
 Fill with lemonade.
 Garnish with a cherry.

title: TITLE:  SKELETON
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink in place of barium for your next X-ray.

1/2 ounce white rum
1/2 ounce sour apple vodka
Lemon-lime soda
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Pour rum and vodka into an old-fashioned glass

filled with crushed ice.

 Top off with soda.

title: TITLE:  GREEN GHOST
description:
DESCRIPTION: Yellow and Blue makes Green.

1 ounce blue curacao 
1 ounce gin 
1/2 ounce peach schnapps 
2 ounces lemonade 
Squeeze of an orange wedge
directions:
DIRECTIONS:  Fill cocktail shaker with ice.
 Add curacao, gin, peach schnapps, lemonade, and

orange juice.

 Shake.
 Strain into a hurricane glass with ice.
 Garnish with a lime wedge.

ELECTION DAY

title: TITLE:  VICTORY
description:
DESCRIPTION: Drink  early  and  often  while  you  wait  for  the  results  to
come in.

1 1/2 ounces Pernod
3/4 ounce grenadine
